root:
sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet |
bodhisattvavratadharaṃ mahāyānārthakovidam || 5.102 ||
commentary:
yad uktaṃ kalyāṇamitrān utsargād iti tadāha.

kalyāṇakarmaṇy abhyudayaniḥśreyasaprāptilakṣaṇe mitram asādhāraṇo bandhuḥ, tat kāyajīvitavipraṇāśabhayabhīto 'pi na tyajet. kalyāṇamitrānuśaṃsāś ca prajñāpāramitāyām āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ sadāpraruditaparivartād veditavyāḥ. caturdharmakasūtre 'py uktam—

	kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvajjīvaṃ na tyaktavyam api jīvitahetoḥ.

iti. aparityājyasya kalyāṇamitrasya lakṣaṇam āha bodhisattvaśikṣāsaṃvare vyavasthitam. mahāyānārthapaṇḍitam. etādṛśaṃ sudurlabham.

root:
dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ  
sandeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ |  
ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce  
kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu ||
commentary: nanu cetana sādhyam arthaṃ katham acetanena kārayituṃ pravṛtta ity apekṣāyāṃ kaviḥ samādhatte—dhūmeti || dhūmaś ca jyotiś ca salilaṃ ca marudvāyuś ca teṣāṃ sannipātaḥ saṅghāto meghaḥ kva | acetanatvāt sandeśānarha ity arthaḥ | paṭukaraṇaiḥ samarthendriyaiḥ || "karaṇaṃ sādhakatamaṃ kṣetragātrendriyeṣv api" ity amaraḥ || prāṇibhiś cetanaiḥ || "prāṇī tu cetano janmī" ity amaraḥ || prāpaṇīyāḥ prāpayitavyāḥ | sandiśyanta iti sandeśāsta evārthāḥ kva | ity evam autsukyād iṣṭārthodyuktatvāt || "iṣṭārthodyukta utsukaḥ" ity amaraḥ || sampradānatvāt kuśalapraśnenābhimukhīcakārety arthaḥ | aparigaṇayann avicārayan guhyako yakṣas taṃ meghaṃ yayāce yācitavān || "yācṛ yācñāyām" || tathā hi | kāmārtā madanāturāś cetanāścācetanāś ca teṣu viṣaye prakṛtikṛpaṇāḥ svabhāvadīnāḥ | kāmāndhānāṃ yuktāyuktavivekaśūnyatvād acetanayācñā na virudhyata ity arthaḥ || atra meghasandeśayor virūpayor ghaṭanād viṣamālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ—"viruddhakāryasyotpattir yatrānarthasya vā bhavet | virūpaghaṭanā cāsau viṣamālaṅkṛtis tridhā" || iti | sā cārthāntaranyāsānuprāṇitā tatsamarthakatvenaiva caturthapāde tasyopanyāsāt ||

root:
māmiyaṃ calitā vilokya vṛtaṃ vadhūnicayena |
sāparādhatayā mayāpi na vāritātibhayena |
hari hari hatādaratayā gatā sā kupiteva ||
commentary: iyaṃ rādhā māṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ vilokya dṛṣṭvā calitā nirgatā | kimbhūtam | vṛtaṃ parivṛtam | kena | vadhūnicayena | gopavadhūnāṃ nicayaḥ samūhastena | mayā na nivāritā atibhayena | kayā | sāparādhatayā | saha aparādhena vartata iti sāparādhastasya bhāvaḥ sāparādhatā tayā | sā rādhikā kupiteva kruddheva gatā yātā | kayā | hatādaratayā | hato vinaṣṭo ādaraḥ satkārastasya bhāvastayā | hari hari śiva śiva khede 'rthe dvau śabdau bhavataḥ |

root:
sā cāha |
aho madīyaṃ yat padmaṃ sarvasukhasamanvitam |
sevayed yo vidhānena tasyāhaṃ siddhidāyinī || 3.27 ||
commentary:
tathāpi nātrābhiniveśaḥ kārya ity āha.

ācchidyeti balāt. bhavato gṛhītvā niṣkṛpo mṛtyus tava kāyaṃ gṛdhrebhyo dāsyati. tadāpi na kaścit pratikāro bhaviṣyati ity abhiprāyaḥ.

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudrāto vipāko jagadātmatā |
sthairyaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tatra vimardo jagadīkṣaṇam || SeNi 28 ||
commentary: caturānandasvabhāvā kāyikī karmamudroktaiva | vācasīṃ dharmamudrāṃ caturānandasvabhāvām āha—vicitram ityādi | karmamudrāto nimittāt sadgurūpadeśena vacasā pratīyamānā jagadātmatā citrollekhatvād vicitram | saiva ca bhāvanayā nirvedhābhimukhyā citrollekhāpagamād vipākaḥ | tatra jagadātmatāyāṃ bhāvanāprakarṣād yad anullekhasya sthairyaṃ tad vilakṣaṇam | itthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatākhyajagadātmatāyāṃ sthairye 'pi bhāvakasya yogino 'pratiṣṭhānādhimokṣeṇa tathaiva vyavaharamāṇasya yaj jagadīkṣaṇam ālocanaṃ sa vimardaḥ | eṣu vicitrādiṣv ānandacatuṣṭayaṃ kramato yojyam | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tatheti" caturthaṃ pūrvavat | yadā "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvicchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt sarvaṃ sahajarūpaṃ tadā dharmamudrā caturānandarūpaika eva paramānandaḥ ||

root:
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā |  
paścāt trividhaṃ yānti kāyavākcittabhedanaiḥ || 9 ||
commentary: viditaitajjñānasya yogino niṣṭhām āha—jñānāmṛtetyādi | subodham ||

root:
hanyāt khaḍgena cākṣobhyaṃ pitaraṃ paścāt prabhakṣayet |
māmakyāpi tatas taṃ ca bhakṣitaṃ vai prakalpayet || 4.17 ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mādhavikāparimalalalite | mādhavikāyāḥ kusumitavāsantyāḥ parimalo gandhaḥ tena lalitaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | navamālatijātisugandhau | navā nūtanāśca tā mālatyaśca tāsāṃ jātiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ | janī prādurbhave ityasya jādeśe atipratyayaḥ | tathā śobhano gandho yasmin sa tathā athavā navamālikayā kāraṇabhūtayā puṣpaviśeṣeṇa atisugandhau | navā ca mālikā ceti tayā | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mohanakāriṇi | mohanaṃ vaicityaṃ kartuṃ śīlamasyeti sa tathā tasmin | keṣāṃ | munimanasāmapi | munayo jitendriyāḥ vanavāsino vikārahīnāḥ nityanaimittikādivratācāravantasteṣāmapi | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | taruṇākāraṇabandhau | taruṇānāṃ yuvajanānāṃ akāraṇena upakāraṃ vinaiva bandhuḥ hitakārī kuṭumbasahāyaḥ kāmoddīpanatvāt |

root:
mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānurūpam  
sandeśaṃ me tad anu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam |  
khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra  
kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya ||
commentary: iti manasi nidhāya tathaiva saṃyatātmā tiṣṭhet. trapādarabhayānvitaḥ—apratirūpe karmaṇi trapā lajjā, śikṣāyām ādaraḥ, tadatikrame bhayam. buddhabodhisattveṣv eva vā trapādayaḥ. evaṃ sati aparo 'pi viśeṣaḥ syād ity āha—buddhetyādi. tad evaṃ viharatas tasya pratikṣaṇam akāmata eva buddhānusmṛtiḥ syāt.

root:
gambhīrārthām udārārthāṃ mahārthām asamāṃ śivāṃ |
ādimadhyāntakalyāṇīṃ nāmasaṃgītim uttamāṃ || 11 ||
commentary:
ataḥ idam api prātimokṣaniṣiddhaṃ nācaraṇīyam ity āha.

kheṭasya śleṣmaṇo visarjanam apāvṛtaṃ na kuryāt. jale sthale bhogya upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāder api kutsitam. atrāpi devatādyavadhyānād apuṇyaṃ prasavet.

root:
rakṣasīmaṃ manaḥ kasmād ātmīkṛtya samucchrayam |
tvattaś cet pṛthag evāyaṃ tenātra tava ko vyayaḥ || 5.60 ||
commentary:
evaṃ sarvathānupayogini kāye sāpekṣatāṃ nirasyann āha.

he manaḥ, anātmakam eva ātmatvena svīkṛtya māṃsāsthipuñjaṃ kāyasaṃjñakaṃ kasmāt kāraṇāt tvaṃ rakṣasi? kim evam iti cet, bhavato yadi bhinna evāyaṃ kāyaḥ. tena asyāpacaye tava kim apacīyate?

root:
sādhu vajradhara śrīmān sādhu te vajrapāṇaye |
yat tvaṃ jagaddhitārthāya mahākaruṇayānvitaḥ || 20 ||
commentary: sādhu vajradharetyādi | te tava vajrapāṇeḥ sādhu | śrīmān he vajradhara yat yasmāt tvaṃ mañjuśrījñānakāyasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ mattaḥ śrotuṃ samudyatas tat tasmāt he guhyakādhipa te tava sādhu deśayāmīti saṃbandhaḥ || kimarthaṃ tvayāhaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ | jagaddhitārthāyeti | jagadanugrahāya mahākaruṇayānvitaḥ san ||

root:
yogādhyāye 'pi—
jñānāmṛtena tṛptasya kṛtakṛtyasya yoginaḥ |
naivāsti kiñcit kartavyam asti cen na sa tattvavit || SiNe 11 ||
commentary: viditaitajjñānasya yogino niṣṭhām āha—jñānāmṛtetyādi | subodham ||

root:
tat sādhu deśayāmy eṣa ahaṃ te guhyakādhipa | 
śṛṇu tvam ekāgramanās tat sādhu bhagavann iti || 22 ||
commentary: tvayīti || kṛṣer halakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sasyaṃ tvayi || adhikaraṇavivakṣāyāṃ saptamī || āyattam adhīnam || "adhīno vighna āyattaḥ" ity amaraḥ || iti hetoḥ prītyā snigdhaiḥ | akṛtrimapremārdrair ity arthaḥ | bhrūvikārāṇāṃ bhrūvilāsānām anabhijñaiḥ | pāmaratvād iti śeṣaḥ | janapadavadhūnāṃ pallīyoṣitāṃ locanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ san | mālaṃ mālākhyaṃ kṣetraṃ śailaprāyam unnatasthalam || "mālam unnatabhūtalam" ity utpalamālāyām || sadyas tatkālam eva sīrair halair utkaṣaṇena karṣaṇena surabhi ghrāṇatarpaṇaṃ yathā tathā āruhya || tatrābhivruṣyety arthaḥ || "surabhir ghāṇatarpaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || kiñcit paścāl laghugatis tatra nivṛṣṭatvāt kṣipragamanaḥ san "laghu kṣiprataraṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || bhūyaḥ punar apy uttareṇaivottaramārgeṇaiva vraja gaccha || tṛtīyāvidhāne "prakṛtyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam" iti tṛtīyā || yathā kaścid bahuvallabhaḥ patiḥ kutracit kṣetre kalatre gūḍhaṃ vihṛtya || "kṣetraṃ śarīre kedāre siddhasthānakalatrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dākṣiṇyabhaṅgabhayān nīcamārgeṇa nirgatya punaḥ sarvādhyakṣa iva sañcarati tad vaditi dhvaniḥ ||

root:
anābhogaṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ tac cācintyaṃ pracakṣate |
sañcintya yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi || SeNi 30 ||
commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

root:
bhagavan jñānakāyasya mahoṣṇīṣasya gīṣpateḥ |
mañjuśrījñānasattvasya jñānamūrteḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 10 ||
commentary: mukhaṃ pūritaṃ kṛtvā mahatkavalagrahaṇāt. saśabdaṃ sukasunikādiśabdena. prasṛtānanaṃ dūraṃ vidāritamukham. pralambapādaṃ bhūmyādyalagnapādaṃ khaṭvādyārohaṇe sati nāsīta. dvāv api bāhū samamekasmin kāle na mardayet. kramamardane na doṣaḥ. sati pratyaye.

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudraiva dharmamudrā vipākajā |
vilakṣaṇaṃ mahāmudrā vimardaḥ samayo bhavet || SeNi 38 ||
commentary: vidyāgurūṇām idānīṃ stutinamaskārau karoti abhivandyeti | śiṣyadhīpadminīnāṃ ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūnādau vande | tato vārttikaṃ kariṣye | teṣām eva prasādena dṛṣṭenārthatattvopadeśenādṛṣṭena ca stutinamaskārabhuvā | gurvanugamanādayo 'pi hy ācārapramāṇakā eva | vārttikagrahaṇena ca duruktabhaṅgam anuktavacanaṃ ca samādhatte | mīmāṃsāśabdena nyāyaśāstram idam ato nyāyānusāreṇādhikaraṇabhaṅgādyadūṣaṇam iti darśayati | ślokapadena ca lāghavavikāsaṃ kṣipāma iti darśayati | tataś ca sūtritaprāyam imam artham avahitā jijñāsavo bhāvayiṣyantīti tātparyārtha iti ||

root:
labdhatvatsaṃpadāṃ bhaktimatāṃ tvatpuravāsinām  |
sañcāro lokamārge 'pi syāttayaiva vijṛmbhayā || 1.3 ||
commentary: labdhatvaditi | ye samāveśamayapraśastabhaktiyuktāḥ ata eva labdhatvatsaṃpadaḥ tvatpureviśvapūrake tvatsvarūpe vasanti tacchīlāḥ teṣāṃ lokamārge api yaḥ sañcāraḥ vyavahāraḥ, sa tayaiva samāveśarasānandamayyā, vijṛmbhayā vikasvaratayā syāt bhavatyeva | atha ca ye labdhalaukikaśriyaḥ tvadbhaktāḥ tvanmaṇḍalavāsinaḥ te sarve spṛhaṇīyatvāt sadā vibhūtimuditā iti samāsoktyā gamayati |

root:
evaṃ te rakṣataś cāpi mṛtyur ācchidya nirdayaḥ |
kāyaṃ dāsyati gṛdhrebhyas tadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi || 5.67 ||
commentary: he deva he hare tvaṃ jaya jaya | svaśaraṇāgatasakalajanaramaṇa tvaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatayā vartasva | he śritakamalākucamaṇḍala | śritamāśritaṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ kucamaṇḍalaṃ kucābhogaḥ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | he śritakamalākucamaṇḍala | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he dhṛtakuṇḍala | dhṛtaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he kalitalalitavanamāla | kalitā svīkṛtā lalitā manoharā vanamālā yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | he kalitalalitavanamāla | he hare he deva jaya jaya jayayukto bhava | sarvotkarṣeṇa vartasva |

root:
karatalatālataralavalayāvalikalitakalasvanavaṃśe |
rāsarase saha nṛtyaparā hariṇā yuvatī praśaśaṃse ||
commentary: rāsarase gopī krīḍāyāṃ kāpi yuvatiḥ hariṇā śrīkṛṣṇena praśaśaṃse tuṣṭuve | kimbhūtā | tena saha nṛtyaparā | kimbhūte | karatalatālataralavalayāvalikalitakalasvanavaṃśe | karāṇāṃ talāni teṣāṃ tālāḥ vādyaprakārāḥ taistaralāścañcalāśca valayāvalayo bhūṣaṇaviśeṣarājayaśca | tābhiḥ kalito viśeṣitaḥ kalasvano madhuradhvanirvaśo yatra tathā tasmin |

root:
gurau bhaktaḥ kṛpāluś ca mantrayānaparāyanaḥ |
bhaktaś caṇḍeśvare nityaṃ tasya tantraṃ pradarśayet || 1.10 ||
commentary: gurau upadeśadātari | bhaktaḥ | gurvārādhanakrameṇa kāyavākcittoḥ sevanāt | kṛpāluḥ sarvasattvaduḥkhoddharaṇamānasaḥ | mantrayānaṃ mantranayaḥ | tantraparāyaṇas tadekāśaktaḥ | caṇḍeśvare caṇḍamahāroṣaṇe ||

root:
bhagavadgītāyām api—
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'nto hy anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ || SeNi 18 ||
commentary:
ataḥ idam api prātimokṣaniṣiddhaṃ nācaraṇīyam ity āha.

kheṭasya śleṣmaṇo visarjanam apāvṛtaṃ na kuryāt. jale sthale bhogya upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāder api kutsitam. atrāpi devatādyavadhyānād apuṇyaṃ prasavet.

root:
śikṣāsamuccayo 'vaśyaṃ draṣṭavyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ |
vistareṇa sadācāro yasmāt tatra pradarśitaḥ || 5.105 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:
ānandarūpaṃ svavid aprakampyaṃ
vedāntinaḥ sādhyam uṣanti śāntam |
saśrāvakāḥ khaḍgajināś ca sādhyam
icchanti rūpādyupadher virāmam || 4 ||
commentary: prakṣiptam api vyākhyāyate—ambha iti || ambhobindūnāṃ varṣodabindūnāṃ grahaṇe | "sarvaṃ sahāpatitam ambu na cātakasya hitam" iti śāstrād bhūspṛṣṭodakasya teṣāṃ rogahetutvād antarāla eva svīkāre caturāṃś cātakān vīkṣyamāṇāḥ kautukāt paśyantaḥ śreṇībhūtā baddhapaṅktiḥ || abhūtatadbhāve cviḥ || balākā bakapaṅktīḥ parigaṇanayaikā dve tisra iti saṅkhyānena nirdiśanto hastena darśayantaḥ siddhāḥ stanitasamaye tvaṅgarjitakāle sotkampāny utkampapūrvakāṇi priyasahacarīṇāṃ saṃbhrameṇāliṅgitāny āsādya | svayaṃ grahaṇāśleṣasukham anubhūyety arthaḥ || tvāṃ mānāyaṣyanti | tvannimittatvāt sukhalābhasyeti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaś caturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo ‘haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||1.2||
commentary:
evaṃ mayetyādyāha saṅgītikāraḥ | nidānavākyaṃ etat | yasmāt saṅgītikāreṇa sūtratantrādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ | bhagavato vacanāt | tathā ca | evaṃ mayā śrutam iti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgātavyam ityādi | evaṃ sati | 

śraddhāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstā parṣac ca sākṣiṇi | 
deśakālau ca nirdiṣṭau svaprāmāṇyaprasiddhaye || iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati ||

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā | 
vajrasattva iti | vajram abhedyaṃ sattvam arthakriyākāritvam asyeti | athavā vajra iva vajraḥ sa cāsau sattvaḥ prāṇī ceti | sarvetyādi | sarve ca te tathāgatāś ca teṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ jīvaccharīra tasya hṛdayam atyantābhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | tad eva vajradhātvīśvarībhagam ||

vajro liṅgaṃ tasya dhātuḥ sāṃvṛtavivṛtatvalakṣaṇaḥ | bodhicittaṃ tasyeśvarī vā prajñā vajradhātunā sevitatvāt tasyāḥ | tadvarāṅge bhage vijahāreti | vihṛtavān vajrapadmasaṃyogena sampuṭayogena sthitavān ity arthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vihāraḥ prākṛtajanasyāpy atyantagupto bhavati kiṃ punar bhagavato vajrasattvasya | tataś cārthād uktaṃ bhavati | sumerugirimūrdhnivajrasatvabhūmau vajramaṇiśikharakūṭāgāre viharati smeti | etena śāstrā kālo deśaś coktaḥ ||

parṣadaṃ vaktum āha | anekaiścetyādi | vajrayoginaḥ | śvetācalādayaḥ | vajrayoginyo mohavajryādayaḥ | teṣām tāsāṃ ca gaṇāḥ samūhā ekarasāktāḥ bahuvacanaṃ tv ekavacanasyāpi pañcatathāgatātmatvāt ||

tadyathetyupadarśane | śvetācaleneti bhagavato bhagavatīdehagatarūpajñānena | evaṃ pītācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatagandhajñānena | raktācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatarasajñānena | śyāmācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatasparśajñānenana || 

mohavajryā ceti | bhagavatyo bhagavaddehagatarūpajñānena | piśunavajryā ceti bhagaddehagatagandhajñānena | rāgavajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatarasajñānena | īrṣyāvajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatasparśajñānena | svayaṃ tu bhagavān bhagavatīdehagataśabdajñāne rūpaḥ | bhagavatī tu bhagavaddehegataśabdajñānarūpā ato naitat prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

evaṃ pramukhair iti | evaṃprakāraiḥ | cakṣuṣā ghrāṇena rasanayā kāyena śrotreṇa rūpeṇa vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskāreṇa vijñānena pṛthivyā jalena tejasā vāyūnā ākāśena ityādibhir ityarthaḥ | etenaivamvidhe vihāre parṣaddevyopyetāddṛśyo bodhicitte tu kathitaṃ bhavati ||

root:
tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
ubhe styānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja || SeNi 17 ||
commentary:
īrṣyāmalaprakṣālanām āha.

parakīyaguṇavardhanavacaneṣu tatparitoṣaṇāya sādhu sādhu bhadrakam idam iti śabdam adhyāśayenoccārayet. kuśalakarmakāriṇam api dṛṣṭvā sādhu kṛtam dhanyo bhavān sukṛtakarmakārītyādibhiḥ stutivacanaiḥ protsāhayet.

root:
kāye naubuddhim ādhāya gatyāgamananiścayāt |
yathākāmaṅgamaṃ kāyaṃ kuru sattvārthasiddhaye || 5.70 ||
commentary:
saṃprajanyasya utpattisthairyayoḥ smṛtireva kāraṇamiti kathayann āha.

yadā smṛtir manogṛhadvāri kleśataskarasaṃghātānupraveśanivāriṇī dauvārikavadavasthitā bhavati, tadā saṃprajanyam ayatnata evotpadyate. utpannaṃ ca sat sthirībhavati.

root:
nodāradharmapātraṃ ca hīne dharme niyojayet |
na cācāraṃ parityajya sūtramantraiḥ pralobhayet || 5.90 ||
commentary:
tad eva dauṣprajñavikṣepāsamyakpraṇidhivipakṣābhibhūtirahitatvenāha mahādhyānetyādi |

tatrāsyāṃ gāthāyāṃ dhyānaprajñayor vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | mahāprajñāśarīradhṛg iti vajradhūpā | mahati prajñā mahāprajñā saiva śarīraṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk || mahādhyānasamādhistha iti vajrapuṣpā | samādhiś cittasyaikāgratālakṣaṇas tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti samādhisthaḥ | mahac ca tad dhyānaṃ ca mahādhyānaṃ mahattvaṃ caturdhyānātmakatvāt | teṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu samādhisthaḥ || praṇidhir iti vajradīpā | praṇidhīyata iti praṇidhiḥ | bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānavaśād utpatteḥ || mahopāya iti vajragandhā | mahāṃś cāsāv upāyaś ca mahopāyaḥ | tata evopāyabalenāśeṣānavaśeṣasya sattvadhātor yathāśayābhiprāyaparipūraṇāt || 

ata eva prajñādhyānapraṇidhyupāyapāramitālakṣaṇatayā bāhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakam iti ||

sāmbhogikamārgaprītihetubhāvena balajñānayor dharmadhātvavatārasvabhāvatvāt tayor eva balajñānayoḥ pravibhāgaḥ | tatra balaṃ śraddhādipañca | jñānaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca | tatra darśanamārge bodhyaṅgeṣu | bhāvanāmārga āryāṣtāṅgeṣu || 

tataś ca śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhirūpatayā dvārapālacatuṣṭayātmakaṃ mahāyānābhisampratyayapravṛttitannairantaryasantuṣṭikāraṇatvāt ||

root:
yadātmotkarṣaṇābhāsaṃ parapaṃsanam eva ca |
sādhikṣepaṃ sasaṃrambhaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā || 5.50 ||
commentary: ātmotkarṣaṇaṃ svaguṇātiśayaprakāśanam. tadābhāsaṃ tatpratibhāsaṃ tadvikalpanāt. parapaṃsanaṃ paravigrahaḥ doṣāviṣkaraṇaṃ vā, tadyuktam. adhikṣepaḥ parasya vacanatiraskāraḥ. saṃrambhaḥ sadākalivivādanimittacittapradoṣaḥ. ubhayatra saha tena vartata iti vigrahaḥ. evaṃ yadā paśyet svakaṃ manaḥ, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti sāmānyoktam abhisaṃbadhyate.

root:
vajrāvalīṃ tu tenaiva aṣṭastambhāṃś ca kalpayet |
dvārāt triguṇitaṃ kuryāt dvāratoraṇam uttamam || 2.6 ||
commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

root:
evaṃ buddhvā parārtheṣu bhavet satatam utthitaḥ |
niṣiddham apy anujñātaṃ kṛpālor arthadarśinaḥ || 5.84 ||
commentary:
tasmāt sarvakalmaṣaparityāgena iyam ucitā karmakāritā śikṣaṇīyety āha.

sarvāvadyavinirmuktatvād viśvastam. ānupūrvyā vyavasthitapadam. asaṃdigdhārtham. manaḥprahlādanakaram. śravaṇāpy āyakam. karuṇārasaniṣyandabhūtaṃ na rāgādinidānam. mṛdusvaramakarkaśavacanam. mandasvaraṃ yāvatā dhvaninā pratipādyasya pratītiḥ syāt, na tato nyūnaṃ nātiriktam udīrayan.

root:
vinipātagatānāthavratasthān saṃvibhajya ca |
bhuñjīta madhyamāṃ mātrāṃ tricīvarabahis tyajet || 5.85 ||
commentary: he amalakamaladalalocana | amalaṃ śuddhaṃ yat kamalaṃ tasya dalaṃ tadvallocane yasya tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | bhavamocana | bhavāt saṃsārānmocayatīti muktiṃ prāpayatīti tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | tribhuvanabhavananidhāna | trayāṇāṃ bhuvanānāṃ samāhārastribhuvanaṃ tasya bhavanam utpattiḥ tasya yā avidyā tayā parikalpitaṃ tasya nidhānam ādhāraḥ tasya saṃbodhanam | athavā tribhuvanameva bhavanamiva bhavanam āśrayaḥ |

root:
atha bhagavān āha | 
ādau triśaraṇaṃ dadyāt pañcaśikṣāś ca poṣadham |
tataḥ pañcābhiṣekaṃ tu guhyaṃ prajñāṃ ca śeṣataḥ || 3.2 ||
commentary: ādāv ityādikam uddeśaḥ ||

root:
sahāpi vākcharīrābhyāṃ mandavṛtter na tat phalam |
yat paṭor ekakasyāpi cittasya brahmatādikam || 5.15 ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtavāmanarūpa | dhṛtaṃ vāmanaṃ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | he adbhutavāmana | tvaṃ baliṃ chalayasi pravañcayasi | kasmin viṣaye | vikramaṇe | viḥ pakṣī viruddhaḥ tasyākramaṇaṃ tasmin iti dhvaniḥ | vikramaṇaviṣaye he padanakhanīrajanitajanapāvana | padasya nakhāḥ padanakhāḥ teṣāṃ nīraṃ jalaṃ tena janitaṃ utpāditaṃ janāya pāvanaṃ pavitrībhāvo yenaṃ sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam |

root:
jñānajñeyāsamārope manyanā tatra nānyathā |
sarvaṃ tathā yathā pūrvaṃ yathā buddhis tathā na hi || SeNi 33 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ punar evam ity uktam evārthaṃ spaṣṭayann āha.

taskarāś caurāḥ, teṣāṃ saṃghāto avatāragaveṣakaḥ piśācavad avatāramārgaprekṣī, chidrānveṣaṇatatpara ityarthaḥ. prāpyāvatāraṃ praveśamārgam āsādya muṣṇāti. tato hanti śobhanagataye jīvitapratilambhaṃ kuśalapātheyābhāvāt.

root:
bhaktānāṃ bhavadadvaitasiddhyai kā nopapattayaḥ |
tadasiddhyai nikṛṣṭānāṃ kāni nāvaraṇāni vā || 1.15 ||
commentary: utpaśyāmīti || he sakhe megha, matpriyārthaṃ yathā tathā drutaṃ kṣipram || "laghu kṣipram araṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || yiyāsor yātum icchor api || yāteḥ sann antād upratyayaḥ || te tava kakubhaiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ surabhau sugandhini || "kakubhaḥ kuje 'rjune" iti śabdārṇave || parvate parvate pratiparvatam || vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || kālakṣepaṃ kālavilambam || "kṣepo vilambe nindāyām" iti viśvaḥ || utpaśyāmy utprekṣe || vilambahetuṃ darśayan nāśugamanaṃ prārthayate—śukleti || sajalāni sānandabāṣpāṇi nayanāni yeṣāṃ taiḥ śuklāpāṅgair mayūraiḥ || "mayūro barhiṇo barhī śuklāpāṅgaḥ śikhāvalaḥ" iti yādavaḥ || kekāḥ svavāṇīḥ || kekā vāṇī mayūrasya" ity amaraḥ || svāgatīkṛtya svāgatavacanīkṛtya pratyudyātaḥ pratyudgataḥ | mayūravāṇīkṛtātithya ity arthaḥ | bhavān katham api yathākathañcid āśu gantuṃ vyavasyed udyuñjīta || prārthane liṅ | "śeṣe prathamaḥ" iti prathamapuruṣaḥ | śeṣaś cāyaṃ bhavacchabdo yuṣmadasmacchabdavyatirekāt || "svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ" ity atra kekāsvāropyamāṇasya svāgatavañcanasya prakṛtapratyudgamanopayogāt pariṇāmālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktam alaṅkārasarvasve—"āropyamāṇasya prakṛtopayogitve pariṇāmaḥ" iti ||

root:
dantakāṣṭhasya kheṭasya visarjanam apāvṛtam |
neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeś cāpi garhitam || 5.91 ||
commentary:
ataḥ idam api prātimokṣaniṣiddhaṃ nācaraṇīyam ity āha.

kheṭasya śleṣmaṇo visarjanam apāvṛtaṃ na kuryāt. jale sthale bhogya upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāder api kutsitam. atrāpi devatādyavadhyānād apuṇyaṃ prasavet.

root:
kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet |
cikitsāpāṭhamātreṇa rogiṇaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati || 5.109 ||
commentary: ātmotkarṣaṇaṃ svaguṇātiśayaprakāśanam. tadābhāsaṃ tatpratibhāsaṃ tadvikalpanāt. parapaṃsanaṃ paravigrahaḥ doṣāviṣkaraṇaṃ vā, tadyuktam. adhikṣepaḥ parasya vacanatiraskāraḥ. saṃrambhaḥ sadākalivivādanimittacittapradoṣaḥ. ubhayatra saha tena vartata iti vigrahaḥ. evaṃ yadā paśyet svakaṃ manaḥ, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti sāmānyoktam abhisaṃbadhyate.

root:
aprakāśyam idaṃ tantram adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya hi |
nānyamaṇḍalapraviṣṭasya tantrarājaṃ tu darśayet || 1.8 ||
commentary: hārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyāḥ | rajobhuvam iti | maṇḍalapradhānarekhātaḥ pañcarekhābhuvaṃ | hārārdhahārapaṭṭikānantaraṃ ca māṇikyapaṭṭikādibhuvaṃ | vedikāhārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyās tu madhyaṃ yathāśobhaṃ kuryāt ||

root:
tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ  
prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ |  
kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ  
na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ ||
commentary: madarthaṃ prasthitasya te pathikāṅganājanāśvāsam amānuṣaṅgikaṃ phalam ity āha—tvām iti || pavanapadavīm ākāśam ārūḍhaṃ tvām | panthānaṃ gacchanti te pathikāḥ || "pathaḥ ṣkan" iti ṣkanpratyayaḥ || teṣāṃ vanitāḥ proṣitabhartṛkāḥ| pratyayāt priyāgamanaviśvāsāt || "pratyayo 'dhīnaśapathajñānaviśvāsahetuṣu" ity amaraḥ || āśvasyatyāḥ viśvasitāḥ || śvasidhātoḥ śatrantāt "ugitaś ca" iti ṅīp | tathodgṛhītālakāntā dṛṣṭiprasārārtham unnamayya dhṛtālakāgrāḥ satyaḥ prekṣiṣyante | atyutkaṇṭhatayā drakṣyantīty arthaḥ || madāgamanena pathikāḥ katham āgamiṣyantīty atrāha—tathā hi | tvayi saṃnaddhe vyāpṛte sati viraheṇa vidhurāṃ vivaśāṃ jāyāṃ ka upekṣeta | na ko 'pīty arthaḥ | anyo 'pi madvyatirikto 'pi yo jano 'ham iva parādhīnavṛttiḥ parāyattajīvanako na syāt | svatantras tu na ko 'py upekṣeteti bhāvaḥ || atrārthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktam—"kāryakāraṇasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ parasparam | samarthanaṃ yatra so 'rthāntaragyāsa udāhṛtaḥ ||" iti lakṣaṇāt ||

root:
kandarpajvarasaṃjvarāturatanorāścaryamasyāściraṃ cetaścandanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu saṃtāmyati |
kintu klāntivaśena śītalatanuṃ tvāmekameva priyaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā kathamapi kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti ||
commentary: idānīṃ yatra yatra sthāne yo yo vādī bhavati tad darśayati—boletyādi | bolagarbhe sākāraṃ tadagrato nirākāram | yadvā tadagrataḥ sākāraṃ tadgarbhe nirākāram | ittham eva ca yan madhyamāvarṇanaṃ tad asmadgurūṇāṃ na darśanam ||

root:
uttarottarataḥ śreṣṭhā dānapāramitādayaḥ |
netarārthaṃ tyajec chreṣṭhām anyatrācārasetutaḥ || 5.83 ||
commentary:
pāramitābhyāse 'narthavivarjanāyānupūrvakāritām āha.

uparyuparito dānāc chīlaṃ śreṣṭham, śīlāt kṣāntir ityādayaḥ. ato 'varapāramitāhetor uttaraṃ na tyajet. tadvirodhena na seveteti bhāvaḥ. kiṃ sarvathā? nety āha—anyatreti. bodhiattvānāṃ ya ācāraḥ śikṣāsaṃvaralakṣaṇaḥ sa eva kuśalajalarakṣaṇāya setubandho vihitaḥ, tasmād anyatra taṃ vihāya. sa yathā na bhidyate ity arthaḥ.

root:
yovanavuṇttim upekhia niṣphala śunnae ditti |
śunnasahāva vigoia karahi tu mea sama ghiṭṭi || īrṣyāvajryāḥ || 4.30 ||
commentary: yauvanayuktām mām upekṣya niṣphalaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ | ayam abhiprāyaḥ | śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ hi mahāsukhajñānaṃ nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyadvayavyatirekeṇopalabhyate | nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyau tu bhujamukhasaṃsthānamayau strīpuruṣarūpau tau ca bhāvanālabhyau | bhāvanā ca yuvativyatirekeṇa na bhavati | anyathā vikṣiptacittatvād iti yata evaṃ tasmāc chūnyasvabhāvaṃ viśeṣeṇa garhitvā nindatvā kuru tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ ghṛṣṭim āliṅganacumbanādikam ity arthaḥ |

root:
samyaksekaṃ vidhāyaitad dhaṭhaduḥsekavarjitam |
yat sādhitaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ tenāstu jagataḥ sukham || SeNi 41 ||
commentary: samyaksekam ityādi | subodham ||

root:
atha śākyamunir bhagavān sakalaṃ mantrakulaṃ mahat |
mantravidyādharakulaṃ vyavalokya kulatrayaṃ || 23 ||
commentary:
saṃkleśasamudācāre saṃprajanyakāritāṃ yadety ādibhiḥ saptabhiḥ ślokaiḥ śikṣayitum āha.

prathamata eva svacittaṃ nirūpya. uktam. asaṃkliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ karaṇīyam uktam.

root:
satsukhatvena tattvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanād rateḥ |  
dehe sambhavatīty asmād devateti nigadyate || 14 ||
commentary: satsukhatvenety anāsravadhruvottamasukhatvena. bodhanād rater iti tasyaiva niruttarasya sukhasya vedanād yo hi taṃ na vedayate, nidrāṇa evāsau. brahmāditvaṃ yad uddiṣṭaṃ tad iyatā nirdiṣṭam—deha ityādinā. anyad apy āha sa eva devatā dehasambhavād ity arthaḥ. pūrvapade halopaḥ, uttarapade sambhalopaḥ. svārthe talā deva eva devatā. dehasambhavatvena sulabhatvam asya sūcayati.

root:
śastrāṇi kena narake ghaṭitāni prayatnataḥ |
taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāś ca tāḥ striyaḥ || 5.7 ||
commentary:
ittham evaitan nānyatheti prasādhayann āha.

narakapālānāṃ kuntāsimusalādīni, asipatravanasamudbhūtāni vā kena kṛtāni? na tatra kaścit kartāstīśvarādiḥ, tatkartṛtvasya anyatra niṣiddhatvāt, ihāpi niṣetsyamānatvāt. taptalohamayī ca bhūmiḥ kena ghaṭitā? tāś ca striyaḥ kutaḥ kāraṇasāmagrīto jātāḥ, yāḥ pāradārikaiḥ śālmalīvṛkṣasyādhastād upari ca dṛśyante? sa ca śālmalir vā? ato nānyat kāraṇam atra cittād upakalpanīyam. yad uktam—

	sattvalokam atha bhājanalokaṃ cittam eva racayaty aticitram |
	karmajaṃ hi jagaduktam aśeṣaṃ karma cittam avadhūya ca nāsti || (Madhyamakāvatāra 6.89)

iti.

root:
sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtam  
toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ |  
revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ  
bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya ||
commentary: vijayakalaśaṃ sarvacihnātmakaṃ pañcaratnapañcavrīhipañcauṣadhiparikṣiptaṃ sahakārādipallavācchāditaṃ | tasmāt sahakārapallavety upalakṣaṇaṃ tadabhāvād anyo ’pi pallavo boddhavyaḥ ||

root:
kiṃ kariṣyati kiṃ vadiṣyati sā ciraṃ viraheṇa |
kiṃ janena dhanena kiṃ mama jīvitena gṛheṇa ||
commentary: tathatāyāṃ gata iti suviśuddhatathataikarase dharmakāye sthitaḥ. śrīmān iti sarvabuddhadharmeśvaraḥ, na tu śrāvakādiḥ. āgataś ceti tasyā eva tathatāyāḥ sakāśād āgatas tanniṣyandābhyāṃ sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyāṃ jagadarthakaraṇāya. evaṃ tathatāgataśabdayor ekaśeṣo madhyatakārasya nairukto lopaḥ. evaṃ tāvat sarve tathāgatāḥ. teṣām ādarśajñānādīni pañcakulāni.

root:
prathamaṃ bhāvayen maitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ vibhāvayet |
tṛtīye bhāvayen muditām upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ || 4.3 ||
commentary:
evaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyākṣāntikausīdyapratipakṣatayā tad eva dānaśīlakṣāntivīryapāramitātmakam iti | ata āha mahādānetyādi ||

tatra mahādānapatiḥ śreṣṭha iti vajralāsyā | pūjānugrahakāmyayā dīyata iti dānaṃ | tasya dānasya patir dānapatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau dānapatiś ca mahādānapatiḥ | āmiṣābhayadharmābhiṣekātmakacaturdānotsṛjanatayā śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokotkṛṣṭatvāt || mahāśīladharo 'graṇīr iti vajramālā | kāyavākcittānāṃ samādhānāc chīlaṃ | śīla samādhāv iti dhātvarthatvāt | daśākuśalaviratilakṣaṇaṃ prātimokṣasvabhāvaṃ ca | tad dhārayatīti śīladharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau śīladharaś ca mahāśīladharaḥ | ata evāgraṇīḥ purahsara ity arthah || mahākṣāntidharo dhīra iti vajragītā | kṣamaṇaṃ kṣāntis titikṣā tāṃ dhārayatīti kṣāntidharaḥ | mahaṃś cāsau kṣāntidharaś ca mahākṣāntidharaḥ | tataś ca dhīraḥ | mahatsv api duḥkheṣu dhairyāvalambanatvāt || mahāvīryaparākrama iti vajranṛtyā | vīryaṃ kuśala utsāhaḥ | pāpādau tūtsāhaḥ kusīdatvāt kausīdyam eva na vīryaṃ | tasya parākramaḥ sarvalaukikalokottarakuśalamūlaparipūraṇāt | 

ataś ca guhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakaṃ yathākramam ādarśādijñānaniṣpattau svavimokṣamukhaviśuddhibalenānābhogābhirativiśeṣotpādakatvāt ||

root:
yathā capalamadhyastho rakṣati vraṇam ādarāt |
evaṃ durjanamadhyastho rakṣec cittavraṇaṃ sadā || 5.19 ||
commentary: tasmādityupasaṃharati | cāru śobhanam | vratī mantranayoktavratayogāt | praveśyābhiṣiñcya | pūrvam abhiṣekāt prathamam | parīkṣitān śrāddhān yatnagauravaparāyaṇatvena ||

commentary:
yasya tasyaiveti | svarṇarūpyarājāvartapravālamaraktalakṣaṇasya pañcaratnasya kaṭhinīpiṣṭakagaurīsindūraharitālaharidrākaṭhinīmiśrakajjalakajjalamiśraharitālāder vā tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ | yathecchayācāryaḥ ||

root:
pūjayen manasā taṃ ca puṣpadhūpādibhir budhaḥ |
tadagre deśayet pāpaṃ sarvapuṇyaṃ pramodayet || 4.5 ||
commentary: suniścitaṃ saṃdehaviparyāsarahitam. suprasannaṃ sadā prītisaumanasyabahulam. dhīram acañcalam. ādaraḥ kathita eva. gauravaṃ ārādhyeṣu cittasya namratā. tābhyāṃ saha vartate. salajjaṃ pūrvavat. sabhayaṃ skhalitam ālokya bhītam. śāntaṃ saṃyatendriyam, sattvārādhanayatnavat.

root: tataḥ sādhaka ātmānaṃ caṇḍamahāroṣaṇākāreṇa dhyātvā prajñāṃ ca dveṣavajrīrūpeṇa saṃpuṭaṃ kṛtvā caturānandān lakṣayet || 3.29 ||
commentary: idaṃ gītam | śrījayadevabhaṇitam adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā manasā hṛdayena naṭanīyamasti | tarhi bhaktajanaiḥ paṭhanīyam | kiṃ harivirahākulaballavayuvatisakhī | tasyāḥ vacanam | śeṣamarthaṃ ślokena saṃpādayati |

root:
abhivandya gurūnādau śiṣyadhīpadminīravīn |
tatprasādāt kariṣye 'haṃ mīmāṃsāślokavārttikam || 1.2 ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtaraghupatirūpa | dhṛtaṃ raghupateḥ śrīrāmasya rūpaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | he dhṛtaraghupatirūpa | tvaṃ raṇe saṃgrāme dikṣu āśāsu daśamukhamaulibaliṃ vitarasi dadāsi | daśamukhāni yasya tasya maulayaḥ mūrdhānaḥ sa eva baliḥ pūjopahārastam | kiṃbhūtam | dikpatikamanīyam | diśāṃ patayaḥ indrādayaḥ teṣāṃ kamanīyam abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ tam | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | ramaṇīyaṃ śobhanam |

root:

api bhrāmyadbhṛṅgīraṇitaramaṇīyā na mukulaprasūtiścūtānāṃ sakhi śikhariṇīyaṃ sukhayati ||
commentary: nāryaḥ striyaḥ | sarvastrīṇāṃ dehaḥ puruṣasamparkonmukhaḥ tasmin sthitā ||

commentary: tata iti prajñāvacanāvasānāt ||

root:
śṛṇu vakṣye mahātantraṃ tantrarājeśvaraṃ param |
nāmnā caikallavīraṃ tu sattvānām āśusiddhaye ||1.7||
commentary: mahātantram iti | trividhaṃ tantraṃ | hetuphalopāyabhedena tatra hetur anādinidhanasahajaikasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ mahāsukhaṃ | bhāvyamānatvāt | tad eva phalam āgantukakleśādimalāpagamena sādhyatvāt | upāyas tv āgantukamalāpakarṣaṇe utpattyutpannakramabhāvenaiva | tanpratipādako ’pi granthasandarbhaḥ prabandhaḥ tantraśabdenocyate | upacārāt | tantraḥ kriyātantraḥ tasya rājā tad ukto mantradevatābhāvanādividhiḥ | tasyeśvaraṃ prabhuṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ āśu śīghram ||

root:
tad yathā bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃbuddho 'kārasaṃbhavaḥ |
akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ || 28 ||
commentary:
niyamena śikṣādarśane 'pi sākalyena sarveṣām upayogam āha.

yato heyād akaraṇīyān nivāryate, na karaṇīyam etad iti pratiṣidhyate yatra śikśāsamuccaye sūtrasamuccaye vā. yad eva karma kartavyatayā niyujyate vidhīyate, tat prasiddhaṃ vihitaṃ vā. lokānāṃ cittam āśayaḥ tasya rakṣārtham, tadyathā vikopitaṃ na syāt. śikṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā śikṣāsamuccayādiṣu. pratipādaṃ samācaret, yatra yad yathā yujyate, tatra tathā vyavaharet. anyathā arthasaṃmūḍhavyavahārasyāpattikaśmalatā syāt.

etāvatā ātmabhāvasya śuddhir ākhyātā. yad āha-

	ātmabhāvasya kā śuddhiḥ pāpakleśaviśodhanam |
	saṃbuddhoktyanusāreṇa yatnābhāve tvapāyagaḥ || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 19)

root:
pahu maitī tu vivarjia hohi mā śunnasahāva |
tojju viyoe phiṭumi sarve sarve hi tāva ca || mohavajryāḥ || 4.27 ||
commentary: pahu maitītyādi | bho prabho maitrīṃ sarvasattveṣv ātmasnehabhāvanāṃ tvaṃ vivarjya bhava mā śūnyasvabhāvaḥ | tava viyogena phiṭumīti ātmānaṃ sphoṭayāmi | sarvasarveṇaiva tāva śabdo yasmād arthe ||

root:
aviralanipatitamadanaśarādiva bhavadavanāya viśālam |
svahṛdayamarmaṇi varma karoti sajalanalinīdalajālam ||
commentary: mahābhavetyādi | tatra mahābhavādrisaṃbhetteti mahāsthāmaprāptaḥ | bhavaḥ paṇcopādānaskandhāḥ | ta evādrir ajñānaśailatvāt | tasya samyagaviparītajñānalābhād bhañjanaśīlaḥ saṃbhettā | mahāṃś cāsau bhavādrisaṃbhettā ca mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā || mahāvajradharo ghana iti sarvāpāyañjahaḥ | mahāvajraṃ samantabhadrajñānaṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāvajradharaḥ | nibiḍatvān mūrtimattvāc ca ghanaḥ || mahākrūro mahāraudra iti sarvaśokatamonirghātamatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau krūraś ca mahākrūraḥ | durdāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākrodharūpasaṃdarśanāt | mahāraudra iti | śānto 'py asau bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ sattvavinayavaśād raudratām api darśayatīti || mahābhayabhayaṃkara iti jālinīprabhaḥ | mahābhayo mahābhairavarūpadhārī śaṃkara iti | tasyāpi bhayaṃ karotīti mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ ||

root:
kadācitkvāpi labhyo 'si yogenetīśa vañcanā |
anyathā sarvakakṣyāsu bhāsi bhaktimatāṃ katham || 1.16 ||
commentary:
kulatattvam prastotum āha—jananītyādi. jananīti hitaiṣiṇī. bhaginīti sthirasnehā. ubhe sattvakulavātsalyāt. naṭīti paṭuḥ prajñā ca. rajakīti śuklakarmaratā. vajrīti dhyānapriyā. caṇḍālīti nihitamānatvāt kṣamāśīlā. brāhmaṇīty avadyabhīruḥ.

prajñetyādi. nairātmyādīnām anyatamā prajñā. upāyo hevajraḥ. anayor eva rūpeṇa vidhiniṣpāditena dehadvayasya darśanaparirambhaprativedhavicāraṇāni prajñopāyavidhānam tena pūjayet. tattvavatsala iti tattvasaṃvedanapriyaḥ san.

root:
tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm  
avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjyāyām |  
āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ  
sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi ||
commentary: māyājāletyādi | asmin māyājālamahātantre 'meyair mahāvajradharair mahāmantradhāribhir hṛṣtair yā saṃpragīyate tāṃ ||

anantānandasarasī devī priyatamā yathā |
aviyuktāsti te tadvadekā tvadbhaktirastu me || 1.9 ||
commentary: aṣṭāṅgam ity aṣṭaprakāram uktalakṣaṇam eva ||

root:
hṛṣṭatuṣtāśayair muditaiḥ krodhavigraharūpibhiḥ |
buddhakṛtyakaraiḥ nāthaiḥ sārdhaṃ praṇatavigrahaiḥ || 5 ||
commentary: kiṃsvabhāvāḥ | hṛṣṭatuṣṭāśayasvabhāvāḥ | tatra hṛṣṭāḥ kāyais tuṣṭāś cittaiḥ | āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | hṛṣṭatuṣṭā āśayā yeṣāṃ te hṛṭṣatuṣṭāśayā ata āha hṛṣṭatuṣṭāśayair iti | ata eva muditā harṣitāḥ sarvasattvārthakaraṇāt | ata evāha muditair iti || vigrahasya rūpaṃ vigraharūpaṃ | krodhānāṃ vigraharūpaṃ krodhavigraharūpaṃ | kiṃ tadrūpaṃ mahābhairavāṭṭaṭṭahāsānekaśīrṣakaracaraṇavikṛtanayanordhvakeśapiṅgalabhrūbhaṅgakapālamālālaṃkṛtisarpābharaṇavyāghracarmaniveśanādikaṃ | tad vidyate yeṣāṃ te krodhavigraharūpinaḥ | ata āha krodhavigraharūpibhir iti || buddhānāṃ kṛtyāni buddhakṛtyāni kṛtyāni kartavyāni | ata āha buddhakṛtyakarair iti | ata eva nāthāḥ śāstāro buddhakṛtyakaraṇāt | ato nāthair iti || praṇato vigraho yeṣāṃ te praṇatavigrahāḥ | atas taiḥ | praṇatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān vajradhara idaṃ vakṣyamāṇam āheti saṃbandhaḥ ||

oṃ śvetācala puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ pītācala puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ raktācala puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ śyāmācala puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ dveṣavajri puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ mohavajri puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ piśunavajri puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ rāgavajri puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ |
oṃ īrṣyāvajri puṣpaṃ pratīccha hūṃ phaṭ || 2.20 ||
commentary: OṂ kṛṣṇetyādi | OṂkāro maṅgalārthaḥ | kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaviśeṣataḥ | acalo ’calasaṃjñakaḥ | tasya saṃbodhanaṃ | puṣpam ity upalakṣaṇaṃ | dīpādikam api yathā prāpya | pratīccheti gṛhāṇa | HŪṂkāro dīpamānavastvāśaktīkaraṇārthaḥ | PHAṬkāraḥ tadvastvagrahaṇe nigrahārthaḥ | evaṃ sarvataḥ devānāṃ HŪṂkāro dīrghaḥ | devīnāṃ tu hrasvaḥ | dveṣavajraḥ kṛṣṇācalaḥ | tasyeyaṃ prajñā iti sānvayanāmnā sambodhayati | evaṃ mohavajraḥ śvetācalaḥ | piśunavajraḥ pītācalaḥ | rāgavajro raktācalaḥ | īrṣyāvajraḥ śyāmācalaḥ ||

commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

commentary: madyetyādi | madajanakaṃ surāmaireyādibhedabhinnaṃ jaladravyaṃ madyaṃ | māṃsaṃ gokudahanādikaṃ | bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ | cakārād yathoktāśaktau yathāptaṃ jalajaṃ matsādikaṃ sthalajaṃ hariṇādikaṃ bodhayati | muhur muhuḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ ||

subhāṣiteṣu sarveṣu sādhukāram udīrayet |
puṇyakāriṇam ālokya stutibhiḥ saṃpraharṣayet || 5.75 ||
commentary: dhāriṇīti paramasukhadhāraṇāt | prakāśitety ajñātā | atikrāmatīti bhagavato ’nujñānaṃ laṃghayati | siddhir iti mahāsukhasiddhiḥ | uttameti samyak saṃbodhirūpatvāt ||

root:
tatrāyaṃ mukuṭābhiṣekaḥ | 
vastrādighaṭitaṃ mukuṭaṃ sarvaratnam ivākalayya śiṣyaṃ cakravartinam iva dhyātvā tacchirasi mukuṭaṃ dattvā pūrvavad abhiṣiñcet | oṃ caṇḍamahāroṣaṇa āviśa āviśa asya hṛdaye hūṃ phaṭ || 3.12 ||
commentary: saṃprati sahāyasampattiś cāstīty āha-kartum iti || yad garjitaṃ kartṛ mahīm ucchilandhrām udbhūtakandalikām || "kandalyāṃ ca śilīndhrā syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ata evāvandhyāṃ saphalāṃ kartuṃ prabhavati śaknoti | śilīndhrāṇāṃ bhāvisasyasampattisūcakatvād iti bhāvaḥ | tad uktaṃ nimittanidāne—"kālābhrayogād uditāḥ śilīndhrāḥ sampannasasyāṃ kathayanti dhātrīm" iti || tac chravaṇasubhagaṃ śrotrasukham | lokasyeti śeṣaḥ | te tava garjitaṃ śrutvā mānasotkā mānase sarasy unmanasaḥ | utsukā iti yāvat || "utka unmanāḥ iti nipātanāt sādhu || kālāntare mānasasya himaduṣṭatvād dhimasya ca haṃsānāṃ rogahetutvād anyatra gatā haṃsāḥ punarvarṣāsu mānasam eva gacchantīti prasiddhiḥ || bisakisalayānāṃ mṛṇālāgrāṇāṃ chedaiḥ śakalaiḥ | pātheyavantaḥ pathi sādhu pātheyaṃ pathi bhojyam || "pathyatithivasatisvapater ḍhañ" taddantaḥ | mṛṇālāgraśakalasaṃbandhavanta ity arthaḥ | rājahaṃsāḥ haṃsaviśeṣāḥ || "rājahaṃsās tu te cañcucaraṇair lohitaiḥ sitāḥ" ity amaraḥ || nabhasi vyomni bhavatas tava | ākailāsāt kailāsaparyantam || padadvayaṃ caitam | sahāyāḥ sayātrāḥ "sahāyas tu sayātraḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti ||

sambhujyamānaṃ daśabhūmisaṃsthaiḥ |

commentary:
idam eva vyanakti.

root:
vraṇaduḥkhalavād bhīto rakṣāmi vraṇam ādarāt |
saṃghātaparvatāghātād bhītaś cittavraṇaṃ na kim || 5.20 ||
commentary:
yathāprasiddhita idam udāharaṇam, na tu punar manāg api sādṛśyam astīty āha.

īṣanmātraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhalavo vraṇakṛtaḥ. tasmād bhīto rakṣāmi vraṇam. prakṛtānurodhe rakṣatīti pāṭho yuktaḥ. ādarāt tātparyeṇa. saṃghātanarakaprabhavād anekavarṣasahasrānubhūyamānaduḥkhāt parvatāghātāt sarvato vyāptiprahārāt bhītaḥ cittavraṇaṃ na kiṃ rakṣed iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ. yadi vā, ahaṃ tu kiṃ na rakṣāmīti pariṇāmena yojanīyam. athavā, evam utpāditabodhicittena manasā cintayitavyam ity avatāryate. tadā rakṣāmīti.

root:
bako biḍālaś cauraś ca niḥśabdo nibhṛtaś caran |
prāpnoty abhimataṃ kāryam evaṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret || 5.73 ||
commentary:
kaḥ evaṃ sati guṇaḥ syād ity āha.

ete sarve niḥśabdā anuddhatāś ca viharanto vivakṣitam arthaṃ labhante. vratināpi tathaiva samādhānakaṇṭakaparihāreṇa vihartavyam.

root:
gaṇayati guṇagrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmādapi nehate vahati ca parītoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ |
yuvatiṣu calattṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punarapi mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim ||
commentary: he sakhi mamedaṃ mano vāmameva kāmaṃ karoti kimahaṃ karomi | kutaḥ | yataḥ kṛṣṇe kāmābhilāṣaṃ karoti | kimbhūte | māṃ vinā vihāriṇi krīḍati | punaḥ kimbhūte | calattṛṣṇe calantī vardhamānā tṛṣṇā yasya sa tathā tasmin | kāsu | yuvatiṣu | na kevalaṃ kāmaṃ karoti | tasya kṛṣṇasya guṇagrāmaṃ gaṇayati | kiñca | kṛṣṇāt bhrāmaṃ calanaṃ bhramādapi bhrāntivaśādapi nehate | na kurute | tasminneva tiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ | tasmin kṛṣṇe parītoṣaṃ vahati | sadā doṣaṃ ca dūrataḥ pravimuñcati parityajatītyarthaḥ |

root:
yad buddhvā kartum ārabdhaṃ tato 'nyan na vicintayet |
tad eva tāvan niṣpādyaṃ tadgatenāntarātmanā || 5.43 ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
evaṃ vaśīkṛtasvātmā nityaṃ smitamukho bhavet |
tyajed bhṛkuṭisaṅkocaṃ pūrvābhāṣī jagatsuhṛt || 5.71 ||
commentary:
punar evaṃ karaṇīyam ity atrārthe dṛḍham abhiniveśaṃ darśayann āha.

civarapiṇḍapātādayo naśyantu. vilayaṃ yāntu mama kāmaṃ yatheṣṭam. satkāro gauraveṇāsanadānapādavandanādipūjā kāyo jīvitaṃ ca sarvam etan naśyatu. anyad api yatkiṃcit sukhasaumanasyanimittaṃ tad api naśyatu. kuśalaṃ punar mama cittaṃ mā kasmiṃścid api kāle naṅkṣīd iti.

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamatiśayamadhuripunidhuvanaśīlam |
sukhamutkaṇṭhitagopavadhūkathitaṃ vitanotu salīlaṃ ||
commentary:
abhiṣekapradhānaḥ paṭalaḥ || 
iti tṛtīyapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tasya svecchayā nirvṛtiś ca |
sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cāsmin
prādurbhāvo nirvṛtād asti yasmāt || 13 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātasaṃvalitam, tasya svecchayā nirvṛtir nirodhaḥ.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi paścāt svecchayā nirodhayitavyam, tadā karuṇāyā anekakālābhyastāyā abhāvaḥ syāt. tasyāś cābhāvāt sattvārthābhāvaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha—sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cetyādi. asmin pakṣe sattvārthābhāvo nāsti, yasmān nirvṛtāc cakrāt karuṇāsaṃvalitāt sattvārthasya prādurbhāvo 'sti.

etenaitad evāha—sātasaṃpūrṇacakraṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, yāvadiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ vyavasthāpya, paścāt tasya sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthātavyam. yadā punaḥ sattvārthābhilāṣo bhavati, tadā niruddhād eva cakrāntaram utpādya sattvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ. cakrāntarotpāde 'pi ciraniruddhād eva cakrād yathābhavyatayā vineyānāṃ yathābhilaṣitaprāptir bhavatīti ṣaṣṭham.

root:
tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm  
avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjyāyām |  
āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ  
sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi ||
commentary: na ca tasyā nāśādvrataskhalanādvā nirarthakastvatprayāsa ity āha-tāṃ ceti || he megha, divasānām avaśiṣṭadinānāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyāne tatparām āsaktām || "tatpare pratitāsaktau" ity amaraḥ || ata evāvyāpannām amṛtām | śāpāvasāne madāmanamatyāśayā jīvantīm ity arthaḥ | ekaḥ patir yasyāḥ saikapatnī tām | pativratām ity arthaḥ || "nityaṃ sapatnyādiṣu" iti ṅīp nakāraś ca || bhrātur me jāyāṃ bhrātṛjāyām | mātṛrvan niḥśaṅkadarśanīyām ity āśayaḥ | tāṃ matpriyām avihatagatir avicchinnagatiḥ sann avaśyaṃ drakṣyasi cālokayiṣyasa eva || tathā hi | āśātitṛṣṇā || "āśā digatitṛṣṇayoḥ" iti yādavaḥ || badhyate 'neneti bandho bandhanam | vṛntam iti yāvat | āśaiva bandha āśābandhaḥ kartā || praṇayi premayuktam ata eva kusumasadṛśam sukumāram ity arthaḥ | ata eva viprayoge virahe sadyaḥpāti sadyobhraṃśanaśīlam aṅganānāṃ hṛdayaṃ jīvitam || "hṛdayaṃ jīvite citte vakṣasyākūtayoḥ" iti śabdārṇave || prāyaśaḥ prāyeṇa ruṇaddhi pratibadhnāti || arthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

root:
kiṃ ca grāhyādiśūnyaś cec cittam akṣobhya ucyate |
bādhā svāgamato vajrasattvamudrāviyogataḥ || SeNi 19 ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

root:
bāhyā bhāvā mayā tadvac chakyā vārayituṃ na hi |
svacittaṃ vārayiṣyāmi kiṃ mamānyair nivāritaiḥ || 5.14 ||
commentary:
dṛṣṭāntoktam arthaṃ prakṛte yojayan nāha.

śatruprabhṛtayo bhāvā mayā vārayitum aśakyāḥ. tadvat medinīcarmacchādanavad apakārakriyāyāḥ. ataḥ svacittam eva śakyaṃ vārayiṣyāmi. anyavāraṇasyāpārthakatvāt, svacittavāraṇād eva tatsiddheḥ. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

root:
jayanti bhaktipīyūṣarasāsavavaronmadāḥ |
advitīyā api sadā tvaddvitīyā api prabho || 5 ||
commentary: jayanti bhakti iti | bhaktipīyūṣarasa evāsavavaraḥ - utkṛṣṭaṃ pānaṃ, tena udgataharṣā ye te jayanti — sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante | kīdṛśāḥ | advitīyāḥ — addvitīyā asādhāraṇasvarūpā api tvaddvitīyāḥ — tvam eva dvitīyas tulyarūpo yeṣām | atha ca tvaddvitīyā api - bhaktisamāveśenātyantam abhedāsādhanatvāt tvam eva dvitīyaḥ - prabhutvena pariśīlito yeṣāṃ, tathābhūtā api advitīyāḥ—viśvābhedinaḥ | advitīyāś ca kathaṃ tvaddvitīyāḥ, tvaddvitīyāś ca katham advitīyā iti virodhacchāyā ||

root:
vākdevatācaritacitritacittasadmā padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī |
śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametametam karoti jayadevakaviḥ prabandham ||
commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

satāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaḥ. laukikalokottaraparahitasukhavidhānam | tatsevakaṃ kāyam alpārthanimittaṃ na pīḍayet. anyathā mahato 'rtharāśer hāniḥ syāt. ata eva pūrvasmin hetupadam etat. kutaḥ punar evam? yasmād anenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghram eva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati.

paracodanadakṣāṇām anadhīṣṭopakāriṇām |
pratīcchec chirasā vākyaṃ sarvaśiṣyaḥ sadā bhavet || 5.74 ||
commentary: samyaksekam ityādi | subodham ||

root:

commentary: codayantīti sambodhayanti ||

root:
sarva eva bhavallābhaheturbhaktimatāṃ vibho |
saṃvinmārgo 'yamāhlādaduḥkhamohaistridhā sthitaḥ || 1.10 ||
commentary: sarva eva bhallābha iti | vyākhyātaprakṛṣṭabhaktiśālinām ayamāhlādaduḥkhamohairūpalakṣito loke yaḥ saṃvinmārgaḥ nīlapītādibodharūpaḥ panthāḥ sthitaḥ sa sarva eva tvatprāptihetuḥ | vedyasopānanimajjanakrameṇa paramavedakabhūmilābhāt |

root:
parasparaviruddhābhir bālecchābhir akheditam |
kleśotpādād idaṃ hy etad eṣām iti dayānvitam || 5.56 ||
commentary: idānīṃ yatra yatra sthāne yo yo vādī bhavati tad darśayati—boletyādi | bolagarbhe sākāraṃ tadagrato nirākāram | yadvā tadagrataḥ sākāraṃ tadgarbhe nirākāram | ittham eva ca yan madhyamāvarṇanaṃ tad asmadgurūṇāṃ na darśanam ||

root:
tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārānabhijñaiḥ  
prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ |  
sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ  
kiṃcit paścād vaja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa ||
commentary: tvayīti || kṛṣer halakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sasyaṃ tvayi || adhikaraṇavivakṣāyāṃ saptamī || āyattam adhīnam || "adhīno vighna āyattaḥ" ity amaraḥ || iti hetoḥ prītyā snigdhaiḥ | akṛtrimapremārdrair ity arthaḥ | bhrūvikārāṇāṃ bhrūvilāsānām anabhijñaiḥ | pāmaratvād iti śeṣaḥ | janapadavadhūnāṃ pallīyoṣitāṃ locanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ san | mālaṃ mālākhyaṃ kṣetraṃ śailaprāyam unnatasthalam || "mālam unnatabhūtalam" ity utpalamālāyām || sadyas tatkālam eva sīrair halair utkaṣaṇena karṣaṇena surabhi ghrāṇatarpaṇaṃ yathā tathā āruhya || tatrābhivruṣyety arthaḥ || "surabhir ghāṇatarpaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || kiñcit paścāl laghugatis tatra nivṛṣṭatvāt kṣipragamanaḥ san "laghu kṣiprataraṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || bhūyaḥ punar apy uttareṇaivottaramārgeṇaiva vraja gaccha || tṛtīyāvidhāne "prakṛtyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam" iti tṛtīyā || yathā kaścid bahuvallabhaḥ patiḥ kutracit kṣetre kalatre gūḍhaṃ vihṛtya || "kṣetraṃ śarīre kedāre siddhasthānakalatrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dākṣiṇyabhaṅgabhayān nīcamārgeṇa nirgatya punaḥ sarvādhyakṣa iva sañcarati tad vaditi dhvaniḥ ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre tantrāvatāraṇapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ || 1.20 ||
commentary: tantrasyāvatāraṇas upodghātaḥ prastāvanety ekārthaḥ | tat pradhānaṃ paṭalaḥ paricchedaḥ || iti prathamapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā mahāvajradharo ghanaḥ |
mahākrūro mahāraudro mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ || 40 ||
commentary:
iyam api śikṣāpadamudrāvadhārayitavyety āha.

antataḥ svayamāhārādikriyayā parapreraṇayāparāparadūtapreraṇayā vā, sākṣāt svayam evāmiṣadānādinā vā, yat sattvānāṃ hitasukhahetur na bhavati, tan na kuryāt kārayed vā. na caitad eva kevalam. kiṃcit sattvānām eva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.
