labdhatvatsaṃpadāṃ bhaktimatāṃ tvatpuravāsinām  |
sañcāro lokamārge 'pi syāttayaiva vijṛmbhayā || 1.3 ||
commentary: śaṭham iti duṣṭam ||

root:
gaṇayati guṇagrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmādapi nehate vahati ca parītoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ |
yuvatiṣu calattṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punarapi mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim ||
commentary:
sāṃprataṃ pratikāranirdeśam āha.

upadarśitakrameṇa saṃkliṣṭaṃ saṃkleśasaṃprayuktaṃ niṣphalavyāpāraṃ vā jñātvā svacittaṃ sarvapravṛttinigedhena prabhāvamandatāṃ vidhāya nigṛhṇīyād abhibhavet. dṛḍhaṃ yathā punar api samudācāradharmakaṃ na bhavati. kleśādisaṃgrāme vijayāya kṛtaparikaraḥ śuro bodhisattvaḥ. pratipakṣeṇa yo yasmin pratipakṣa uktaḥ yathā rāgādāv aśubhādi, tena tadviparītavidhānenety arthaḥ. sadā sarvakālam, yadā yadā saṃkliṣṭaṃ pratīyate. ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam—

	tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyam, amattena anunmattena acapalena acañcalena abhrāntena amukhareṇa anunnatena upasthitasmṛtināsasaṃprajanyena.

iti. atraiva ca—

	pravrajitaṃ bodhisattvam adhikṛtyoktam. smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepaḥ.

iti. tathā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre darśitam—

	na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣaṇavyākaraṇī vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā paravarṇapratighātavacanā vā pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā vā ||

iti. evaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanenānarthād ātmabhāvasya rakṣā pratipāditā bhavati. tasmān mayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyam iti.

etac ca samāhitacittasya sidhyati. ata idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam avagamya tātparyeṇa bhāvayitavyam. anena tīvra ādaro bhavati śikśāsu. tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati. tasyānarthā na saṃbhavanti. tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyam. etad evāha—

	tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yadanarthavivarjanam |
	kena tallabhyate sarve niṣphalaspandavarjanāt ||

	etatsidhyetsadā smṛtyā smṛtistīvrādarādbhavet |
	ādaraḥ śamamāhātmyaṃ jñātvātāpena jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 7–8)

iti |

śamathamāhātmyaṃ tu yathāvasaram ihaiva kathayiṣyate.

root: tantre caikallavīre ’smin sugupte caṇḍaroṣaṇe || 1.19 ||
commentary:
nanu haṭhaseko balātkṛto niryuktika iti yāvat | niryuktikatvam asya katham iti cet | ucyate—āgamavirodhāt | taṃ darśayitum āha | ālocanam ityādi |

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru || 

ity atrobhayor madhyaṃ vivakṣitam | tac ca tvanmate nāsti |

tan na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi nirdhāraṇa eṣā ṣaṣṭhī | tenāyam arthaḥ | dvayor madhye yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ | śreṣṭhaś ca virama eveti na kiñcid asustham | 

tarhi

	viramādiḥ paramāt paraḥ śūnyāc chūnyaṃ tu herukam || 

iti na ghaṭate | atra hi viramasyādiḥ paramāt paro 'bhimataḥ | tad api na | yato 'trāpy anya evārthaḥ | viramaś cāsāv ādiś ca viramādiḥ | āditvaṃ ca sahajāpekṣayā | ata idam api sustham |

tarhi—

	viramādau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjitam || 

iti katham | atrāpi viramaś cāsāv ādiś ceti pūrvavan neyam | 

tarhi—

	vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca | 

iti katham | atra hi vikalparūpatā vimardādipadānāṃ sphuṭam eva gamyate | athātra katham api yadi nirvikalpatvābhidhānaṃ syāt tad etad api lokaprasiddhibādhayaiva hatam | tathā hi lokā vimardo vivādaḥ kṣodanam ālocanaṃ tattatkāryādicintanam iti manyante | kiṃ ca—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ity atra virama eva vimarda iti niścitam | anyac ca—

	prathamānandaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paramānandaṃ jagat tathā |
	viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || 

iti viramasya jagadrūpatayā saṃsārarūpatvam ākhyātam | itthaṃ ca "vikalpamātraṃ saṃsāraḥ" ity ukter asya savikalpatvam abhihitaṃ syāt | nirvikalpatvaṃ ca sahajatayābhimatam itīdam api vighaṭate | tathā ca—

	sahajānandasvabhāvo 'haṃ paramāntaṃ viramādikam | 

ity etad api vighaṭate | tathā—

	tat sādhyaṃ yoginītantre sahajākhyaṃ mahāsukham |
	paramānte bhavel lakṣyaṃ viramādau ca yatnataḥ || 

ity ādikam api vighaṭate | tathā—

	prathamaṃ kalaśābhiṣekaṃ dvitīyaṃ guhyam uttamam |
	prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punas tathā || 

iti | prajñājñānābhiṣekas tu sahajābhiṣeko yata idam api pratihanyate | ata evamādigranthavighaṭanenāgamavirodhāt tṛtīye vikalparūpo vimardo naiṣitavyaḥ | yatas tatra nirvikalpakavedanam evāste |

tad eva sopaskāram upasaṃharati—

root:
śāstraṃ prayojanaṃ caiva sambandhasyāśrayāvubhau | 
taduktyantargatas tasmād bhinno noktaḥ prayojanāt || 1.18 ||
commentary:
śrīvajramaṇḍālaṃkāratantre dvādaśatathāgatabhūmayaḥ paṭhyante ||

	samantaprabhā mahābhūmiḥ sūryamaṇḍalavac ca sā |
	amṛtaprabhā dvitīyā tu candravat suprabhāsvarā ||
	gaganaprabhā tṛtīyā tu gaganabhūmipratiṣṭhitā |
	vajraprabhā tu yā bhūmiś caturthī sā manoramā ||
	dṛḍhādhyāśayayogena vajreti parikalpyate |
	pañcamī ratnaprabhā nāma abhiṣeke pratiṣṭhitā ||
	ṣaṣṭhī padmaprabhā nāma padmavat suvirājate |
	svabhāvaśuddhadharmatvāt nirmalā niṣparigrahā ||
	saptamī karmaprabhā nāma buddhakarmakarī smṛtā |
	aṣṭamy anupamā nāma upamā tatra na vidyate ||
	navamī nirupamā nāma sarvopamāprativedhataḥ |
	daśamī prajñāprabhā nāma buddhabhūmīr anuttarā ||
	ekādaśī sarvajñatā mahābhūmiḥ prabhāsvarā |
	dvādaśī pratyātmavedyā tu yogijñānaprapūrikā || iti ||

etā dvādaśatathāgatbhūmayo 'kārādidvādaśasvaraiḥ pariniṣpannā veditavyāḥ ||
buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām ity atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānām | hṛdi sthito 'ham iti sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | jñānamūrtir iti jñānakāyasvabhāvatvāt | buddha iti yathāvasthitapadārthāvabodhāt ||

root:
dattvāsmai vetanaṃ tasmāt svārthaṃ kuru mano 'dhunā |
na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate || 5.69 ||
commentary:
tat kiṃ sarvathaiva niravakāśo 'yaṃ kartavyaḥ? nety āha.

vetanaṃ karmamūlyam. tāvanmātraṃ datvā asmai gatvaraśarīrāya, karmopakaraṇatvāt, svaprayojanam anuvidheyaṃ he manaḥ. anenaivopārjitaṃ kasmād asmai na dīyate iti cet, na hi yasmāt yatkiṃcit karmakareṇopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai karmakarāya pradīyate iti nyāyo 'sti.

root:
mārgādau bhayabodhārthaṃ muhuḥ paśyec caturdiśam |
diśo viśramya vīkṣeta parāvṛtyeva pṛṣṭhataḥ || 5.37 ||
commentary:
mārge 'pi tathādṛṣṭer gacchata upaghātaparihārārtham āha.

bhayahetucaurādipratipattyarthaṃ caturdiśam iti krameṇa. anyathātmabhāvasya rakṣā kṛtā na syāt. sarvadigvyavalokanaṃ tu kriyamāṇam auddhatyopaghātaparihārārthaṃ sthitvā kartavyam. pṛṣṭhato vyavalokanaṃ parāvṛtya paścān mukhībhūya.

root:
bhṛkuṭītaraṃgapramukhair anantair vajrapāṇibhiḥ |
durdāntadamakair vīrair vīrabībhatsarūpibhiḥ || 3 ||
commentary: śrīvajrapāṇyabhiṣekatantre śrīvajradharānucarā bhṛkuṭītaraṃgapramukhāḥ pañca śatāni krodhagaṇānāṃ paṭhyante | taiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān vajradharaḥ saṃbuddhaṃ praṇamyedam āheti yojyaṃ || te ca krodhagaṇāḥ paramārthato 'nantāḥ | ata āhānantair vajrapāṇibhir iti | te 'pi durdāntadamakā vajradharavat | ata evāha durdāntadamakair iti | ata eva vīrās te | tair anabhibhavanīyatvāt | ata āha vīrair iti | kiṃrasā vīrarasāḥ | kiṃrūpiṇo bībhatsarūpiṇaḥ | ata eva vīrabībhatsarūpibhir iti ||

root:
bhāgena cāṣṭamenaiva dvāraṃ tasya prakalpayet |
dvāramānena niryūhaṃ tadardhena kapolakam || 2.4 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ punar evam ity āha.

sarve hy ete karmākṣepavaśād aniṣṭadāyakā bhavanti. karma ca cittam eva, cetanā karmeti vacanāt. vākkāyakarmaṇor api cittam eva samutthāpakam. tadantareṇa tayor anutpatteḥ, cetayitvā karmeti vacanāt. tasmāt sarvam iha karmanirmitam eva. tac ca cittān nānyat. tad āha-

	karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat |
	cetanā mānasaṃ karma tajje vākkāyakarmaṇī || iti || (Abhidharmakośa 4.1)

na ca anapakāracittasya kecid apakāriṇo nāma. yasmāt-

	nivṛttapāpacittasya nāsti loke bhayaṃ dviṣaḥ |
	sukhahānir na tasyāsti yasya cittaṃ vaśe sthitam ||

ata idam uktam-

	cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham | (Dhammapada 25)

iti. 

tattvavādī bhagavān, vastutattvakathanaśīlatvāt. tenedaṃ tattvaṃ kathitaṃ prakāśitam—sarvaṃ cittaprasūtam iti. ataḥ sarvatra cittam eva pradhānam.

root:
mahādānapatiḥ śreṣṭho mahāśīladharo 'graṇīḥ |
mahākṣāntidharo dhīro mahāvīryaparākramaḥ || 36 ||
commentary: mahāvyādhiratisārapramehādiḥ | mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ maraṇameva ||

root:
nodāradharmapātraṃ ca hīne dharme niyojayet |
na cācāraṃ parityajya sūtramantraiḥ pralobhayet || 5.90 ||
commentary:
gambhīrodāradharmabhājanaṃ ca sattvaṃ nimittajñair jñātvā na śrāvakayānādidharmeṣv avatārayet. na cācāraṃ śikṣāsaṃvarakaraṇīyatāṃ muktvā sūtrāntādipāṭhenaiva tava śuddhir bhaviṣyatīti dharmakāmaṃ prabhāvayet. āha cātra punar aparo 'nartho ratnakūṭe dṛṣṭaḥ- 

	aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu viśvāso bodhisattvaskhalitam. abhājanībhūteṣūdārabuddhadharmaprakāśanā bodhisattvaskhalitam. udārādhimuktikeṣu sattveṣu hīnayānaprakāśanā bodhisattvaskhalitam.

iti. āryasarvadharmavaipulyasaṃgrahe sūkṣmo 'py anartha uktaḥ—
	
	sūkṣmaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ saddharmapratikṣepakarmāvaraṇam. yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatabhāṣite dharme kasmiṃścit śobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti, kvacid aśobhanasaṃjñām, sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati. tena saddharmapratikṣeptrā tathāgato 'bhyākhyāto bhavati, saṃgho 'pavādito bhavati, ya evaṃ vadati-idaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam.

iti vistaraḥ.

āryākāśagarbhasūtre ca mūlāpattiprastāve coktam—

	punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisattvaḥ keṣāṃcid evaṃ vakṣyati—kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena? śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva. mahāyānaṃ paṭha. yat te kiṃcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītam, tena te śuddhir bhaviṣyaty avipākam, yāvad yathā pūrvoktam. iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ.

iti.

root:
evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvam anyathā nobhayaṃ bhavet |
asaṃprajanyakleśo 'pi vṛddhiṃ caivaṃ gamiṣyati || 5.44 ||
commentary:
kiṃ punar evaṃ syād yadi na syād ity āha.

yasmād evam anutiṣṭhataḥ sarvaṃ suśliṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt. tadviparyaye punar duḥśliṣṭam ubhayaṃ pūrvaṃ cāttaṃ paścāt svīkṛtaṃ ca syāt. calapravṛtter asaṃprajanyaṃ syāt. praveśe vṛddhiḥ syāt.

root:
saśabdapātaṃ sahasā na pīṭhādīn vinikṣipet |
nāsphālayet kapāṭaṃ ca syān niḥśabdaruciḥ sadā || 5.72 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ tasyādibuddhasya hṛdaye prajñācakraṃ vicintayet || kiṃviśiṣṭam ity āha pratītyasamutpādārthasūcakaṃ | tathā cāha |

	āraiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhir nābhau cārāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
	pratītyotpādayogāc ca cakram etat pravartate || iti ||

akāreṇa pariniṣpannaṃ ṣaḍvarṇopetaṃ sāraṣaṭkaṃ caturmekhalāsaṃ yuktaṃ suvibhaktanābhi || tasya nābhimadhye akāraṃ vicintya | bhagavato jñānasattvasya mūlamantrādayo mantrāś catasṛṣu mekhalāsu sitavarṇā eva bhāvanīyās || tatra prathamamekhalāyām oṃ sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāvaviśuddhavajra a ā aṃ aḥ || tasyaiva dvitīyamekhalāyāṃ dvādaśatathāgatabhūmyabhidhāyakān dvādaśasvarān cintayet || tataḥ prathamāram ārabhya yathāvat mantraṣaṭkavinyāsaṃ kulavarṇakrameṇa kuryāt || tad yathā | prathame | oṃ vajratīkṣṇāya namaḥ | dvitīye | oṃ duḥkhacchedāya namaḥ | tṛtīye | oṃ prajñājñānamūrtaye namaḥ | caturthe | oṃ jñānakāyāya namaḥ | pañcame oṃ vāgīśvarāya namaḥ | ṣaṭhe | oṃ arapacanāya namaḥ | cakrasya bahirnemyām bhagavataḥ sarvatathāgatajñānakāyasya mālāmantraṃ nyaset | aḥ āḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdaya hara hara oṃ hūṃ hṛīḥ bhagavan jñānamūrte vāgīśvara mahāvāca sarvadharmagaganāmalasupariśuddhadharmadhātujñānagarbha āḥ || bahir dvitīyāyāṃ mekhalāyāṃ kakārādihakāraparyantān niveśayet || ity ayaṃ cakrasya mantravinyāsaḥ ||

root:
tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir
jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ |
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya ||
commentary: tasyā iti || he megha vāntavṛṣṭir udgīrṇavarṣaḥ san | kṛtavamanaś ca vyajyate | tiktaiḥ sugandhibhis tiktarasavadbhiś ca || "tikto rase sugandhau ca" iti viśvaḥ || vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ surabhitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca | himavad vindhyamalayā gajānāṃ prabhavā iti vindhyasya gajaprabhavatvād iti bhāvaḥ | jambūkuñjaiḥ pratihatarayaṃ pratibaddhavegam | sukhapeyam ity arthaḥ | anena laghutvaṃ kaṣāyabhāvanā ca vyajyate | tasyā revāyās toyam ādāya gaccher vraja | he ghana megha, antaḥ sāro balaṃ yasya taṃ tvām anila ākāśavāyuḥ | śarīrasthaś ca gamyate | tulayituṃ na śakṣyati śakto na bhaviṣyati | tathā hi rikto 'ntaḥsāraśūnyaḥ sarvo 'pi laghur bhavati | prakampyo bhavatīty arthaḥ | pūrṇatā sāravattā gauravāyāprakampyatvāya bhavatīty arthaḥ | ayam atra dhvaniḥ—ādau vamanaśodhitasya puṃsaḥ paścāc chleṣmaśoṣaṇāya laghutiktakaṣāyāmbupānāl labdhabalasya vātaprakampo na syād iti | tathāha vāgbhaṭaḥ—"kaṣāyāś cāhimās tasya viśuddhau śleṣmaṇo hitāḥ | kimu tiktakaṣāyā vā ye nisargāt kaphāpahāḥ || kṛtaśuddheḥ kramāt pītapeyādeḥ pathyabhojinaḥ | vātādibhir na bādhā syād indriyair iva yoginaḥ ||" iti ||

root:
sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittair api durlabhā |
bhokṣye tuṣṭisukhaṃ tasmāt paraśramakṛtair guṇaiḥ || 5.77 ||
commentary:
paraguṇāmarṣaṇaṃ vārayann āha-

sarveṣāṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvānām, sarve vopakramāḥ duḥkhaparihāreṇa tuṣṭayarthāḥ. sarvārambhapariśrameṇa tuṣṭir evotpādayitavyety arthaḥ. sā ca tuṣṭir dhanavisargair api durlabhā, syād vā na veti. iha punar ayatnasiddhopasthitā kasmāt parihīyata iti matvā bhokṣya anubhaviṣyāmi saṃtoṣasukham anyayatnaniṣpāditair guṇair upanāmitam. na hi priyaputraguṇair akṣamāyuktā. iti bhāvanayā paraguṇaśravaṇāc cittakārkaśyam apakuryāt.

root:
autpattikagirā doṣaḥ kāraṇasya nivāryate |
abādhā 'vyatirekeṇa svatastena pramāṇatā || 10 ||
commentary: kathaṃ punar upadeśo dharme pramāṇam ata āha autpattiketi | bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hy aprāmāṇyam | tatra sambandhautpattikatvapratipādanena taddvārā puruṣānupraveśābhāvāt puruṣāśrayatvāc ca śabde doṣāṇāṃ kāraṇadoṣanivāraṇaṃ tāvat kṛtam | tannirākaraṇena sahāprāmāṇyam anapoditam ity avyatirekapadaprayojanam āha abādha iti | avyatirekapadenābādhaḥ pratipādyate na hi deśakālayor ubhayor api codanājanitaṃ jñānaṃ viparyetīti | tad evaṃ bādhakāraṇadoṣanirākaraṇe kṛte 'napoditam autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyam iti tat pramāṇam ity anenoktam iti darśayati svata iti ||

root:
tat sādhu deśayāmy eṣa ahaṃ te guhyakādhipa | 
śṛṇu tvam ekāgramanās tat sādhu bhagavann iti || 22 ||
commentary: śṛṇu tvam ekāgramanā iti | anenaitad uktaṃ bhavati | mādhomukhacchidrāśucighaṭavat kiṃ tarhi sādhu śṛṇu || bhagavataivam ukte sati vajradharaḥ prāha bhagavan śākyamune evam astv iti | yathoktenaiva krameṇāhaṃ śṛṇuyām iti ||

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamatisundaramohanamadhuripurūpam |
haricaraṇasmaraṇaṃ prati samprati puṇyavatāmanurūpam ||
commentary:
asamādhānasya ca rakṣaṇām āha.

saret puraḥ apasaret paścāt. prapātādyupaghātaṃ nirīkṣya ca. evam ity uktakramadiśā svaparahitaprayojanam avagamya pratipattisāro bhavet.

root:
yathaiva karmamudrāyām ānandādivyavasthitiḥ |
tathā samayamudrāyāṃ vajrācāryaprasādataḥ || SeNi 37 ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
tāmahaṃ hṛdi saṅgatāmaniśaṃ bhṛśaṃ ramayāmi |
kiṃ vane 'nusarāmi tāmiha kiṃ vṛthā vilapāmi ||
commentary: tāṃ rādhāṃ bhṛśamatyarthaṃ ramayāmi krīḍayāmi | kimbhūtām | hṛdi saṃgatām | hṛdaye saṃgatāṃ saṃlagnām | katham | aniśaṃ vāraṃvāram | kimiti vitarke | vane vanamadhye | anusarāmi | anugacchāmi | kimiha nikuñje vṛthā vilapāmi | mithyā paridevanaṃ karomi | kiṃ vitarke paripraśne kṣepe nindāprakāśayoriti vistaraḥ |

root:
śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām |
paśyati sasmitacārutarāmaparāmanugacchati vāmām ||
commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
cintayāmi tadānanaṃ kuṭilabhru kopabhareṇa |
śonapadmamivopari bhramatākulaṃ bhramareṇa ||
commentary: tadānanam | tasyā rādhikāyāḥ ānanaṃ mukhaṃ cintayāmi | kimbhūtaṃ mukham | kuṭilabhru | kuṭile vakre bhruvau yasmin ānane tat kuṭilabhru | kena | kopabhareṇa | kopasya bharaḥ ādhikyaṃ tena kopabhareṇa | kamiva | śoṇapadmamiva | upari bhramatā bhramareṇa ākulaṃ vyākulaṃ śoṇapadmaṃ raktotpalamiva |

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadbhutakeśavakelirahasyam |
vṛndāvanavipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam ||
commentary: śrījayadevabhaṇitamidam udayati śobhate | idamiti kim | adbhutakeśavakelirahasyam | adbhutāḥ keśavasya kelayaḥ krīḍāstāsāṃ rahasyam | kimbhūtam | yaśasyaṃ yaśaskaram | śubhāni vitanotu vistārayatu | gītāpekṣitārthaṃ ślokābhyāṃ sūcayati |

root:
buddhāś ca bodhisattvāś ca sarvatrāvyāhatekṣaṇāḥ |
sarvam evāgratas teṣāṃ teṣām asmi puraḥ sthitaḥ || 5.31 ||
commentary:
ittham api viharan smṛtimanasikārabahulavihārī bhavatīti kārikādvayena darśayann āha.

sarvadā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ samastavastuviṣayāpratihatajñānacakṣuṣāṃ sarvam eva vastujātaṃ purato 'vasthitam eva. aham api teṣāṃ puro 'vasthita eva, sarvavastuvat.

root:
guṇasya duhanāt prajñā duhitā ca nigadyate |  
nartakī bhaṇyate prajñā cañcalatvān mahākṛpa |  
asparśā bhagavatī yasmāt tasmād ḍombī prakathyate || 18 ||
commentary: guṇasyeti satsukhasya. cañcalatvād iti jñeyeśv āśusañcārāt.

root:
yathā capalamadhyastho rakṣati vraṇam ādarāt |
evaṃ durjanamadhyastho rakṣec cittavraṇaṃ sadā || 5.19 ||
commentary:
evaṃ cittāyattatāṃ sarvatra niścitya cittadṛḍhatāyām udāharaṇam āha.

asamāhitajanamadhye punar upaghātabhayāt tadgatamanasā yathā vraṇaṃ rakṣati kaścid apramattaḥ, evaṃ tathā śikṣārakṣaṇakāmaḥ akāraṇavairibālajanamadhye saṃvasan tatparaścittaṃ vraṇam iva rakṣet sarvakālam.

root:
rajakīti ca duhitā ca nartakī ca prakathyate |  
rañjanāt sarvasattvānāṃ rajakīti tathā smṛtā || 17 ||
commentary:
asmād api saṃvegamanasikārāc cittasyānarthavivarjanena rakṣā vidhātavyety āha.

aticireṇa kālena labdham uktaṃ kṣaṇavaraṃ smaraṇena cetasi kṛtvā punaḥ punar antaraṃ sthirīkaromīdṛśam uktasvabhāvam. aprakampyaṃ kampayitum aśakyaṃ kāmādivitarkapavanaiḥ parvatarājavat.

evam etābhyāṃ śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhakābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ. tasmād avasthitam etat—cittaparikarmaiva bodhisattvaśikṣā iti. tena yad uktam—

	cittarakṣāvrataṃ muktvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ | (bodhi. 5.18)

iti, tat pariniṣṭhitam.

root:
asthīny api pṛthak kṛtvā paśya majjānam antataḥ |
kim atra sāram astīti svayam eva vicāraya || 5.63 ||
commentary: tadanantaram asthīny api khaṇḍaśaḥ pṛthag bhinnāni kṛtvā majjānaṃ paśya avalokaya. yady antaraṃ kāyaḥ caturmahābhūtikaḥ mātapitraśucikalalasaṃbhūtaḥ duḥkhamayaḥ kṛtaghnaś ceti vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyatīti kim atra sāram asti vijñapraśastaṃ nyāyyaṃ vā, ity ātmanaiva vicāraya.

root:
maṇḍale caṇḍaroṣasya praviṣṭo yaḥ samāhitaḥ |
śraddhāyatnaparaś caṇḍe tasya tantraṃ tu deśayet || 1.9 ||
commentary:
ittham api viharan smṛtimanasikārabahulavihārī bhavatīti kārikādvayena darśayann āha.

sarvadā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ samastavastuviṣayāpratihatajñānacakṣuṣāṃ sarvam eva vastujātaṃ purato 'vasthitam eva. aham api teṣāṃ puro 'vasthita eva, sarvavastuvat.

root:
atha bhagavān kṛṣṇācalo gāḍhena bhagavatīṃ dveṣavajrīṃ cumbayitvā samāliṅgya cāmantrayate sma |
devi devi mahāramyaṃ rahasyaṃ cātidurlabham |
sārāt sārataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ subhāṣitam || 1.6 ||
commentary: athetyādi | gāḍheneti sātiśayapīḍanena | devi devīti | sattvārthaṃ pratyekābhiprāyeṇātimahāpremnā dviruktiḥ | ramyaṃ kamanīyatvāt | rahasyaṃ gopanīyatvāt śrāvakādidharmapravṛtteṣu | sāraṃ pāramitāmahāyānoktaṃ tattvaṃ tasmād api sārataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ | sarvabuddhair iti vajrasattvanirmitair dīpaṃkarādibhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ ||

root:
asahiṣṇv alasaṃ bhītaṃ pragalbhaṃ mukharaṃ tathā |
svapakṣābhiniviṣṭaṃ vā tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat || 5.53 ||
commentary:
yasya tasyaiveti | svarṇarūpyarājāvartapravālamaraktalakṣaṇasya pañcaratnasya kaṭhinīpiṣṭakagaurīsindūraharitālaharidrākaṭhinīmiśrakajjalakajjalamiśraharitālāder vā tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ | yathecchayācāryaḥ ||
......
caturasram ityādi ||

root:
tasminn adrau katicid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī  
nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ |  
āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ  
vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa ||
commentary: tasminn iti || tasminn adrau citrakūṭādrau | abalāviprayuktaḥ kāntāvirahī | kanakasya valayaḥ kaṭakam || "kaṭakaṃ valayo 'striyām" ity amaraḥ || tasya bhraṃśena pātena riktaḥ śūnyaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ pradeśo yasya sa tathoktaḥ || "kakṣāntare prakoṣṭhaḥ syāt prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ" iti śāśvataḥ || virahaduḥkhāt kṛśa ity arthaḥ | kāmī kāmukaḥ sa yakṣaḥ | katicinmāsān | aṣṭau māsān ity arthaḥ | "śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ" iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt || nītvā yāpayitvā | āṣāḍhānakṣatreṇa yuktā paurṇamāsyāṣāḍhī || "nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ" ity aṇ | "ṭiḍḍhāṇañ-" ityādinā ṅīp || sāṣāḍhy asmin paurṇamāsīty āṣāḍho māsaḥ || "sāsmin paurṇamāsīti saṃjñāyām" ity aṇ || tasya prathamadivase āśliṣṭasānum ākrāntakūṭam | vaprakrīḍā utkhātakelayaḥ || "utkhātakeliḥ krīḍādyair vaprakrīḍā nigadyate" iti śabdārṇave || tāsu pariṇatas tiryag dantaprahāraḥ || "tiryagdantaprahāras tu gajaḥ pariṇato mataḥ" iti halāyudhaḥ || sa cāsau gajaś ca tam iva prekṣaṇīyaṃ darśanīyaṃ meghaṃ dadarśa || gajaprekṣaṇīyam ity atreva lopāluptopamā || kecit "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity atra "pratyāsanne nabhasi" iti vakṣyamāṇanabhomāsasya pratyāsasya "praśamadivase" iti pāṭhaṃ kalpayanti tad asaṅgatam | prathamātireke kāraṇābhāvāt | nabhomāsasya pratyāsatty artham ity uktam iti cen na | pratyāsattimātrasya māsapratyāsattyaiva prathamadivasasyāpy upapatteḥ | atyantapratyāsatter upayogābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt | vivakṣitatve vā svapakṣe 'pi prathamadivasātikrameṇa meghadarśana kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tadasambhavāt | pratyutāsmatpakṣa eva kuśala sandeśasya bhāvyanarthapratīkārārthasya purata evānumānamuktaṃ bhavatīty upayoga siddhiḥ || nanūnmattasya nāyaṃ viveka iti cen na | unmattasya nānarthasya pratīkārārthaṃ pravṛttir apīti sandeśa eva mā bhūt || tathā ca kāvyārambha evāprasiddhaḥ syād itv aho mūlacchedī pāṇḍityaprakarṣaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi "śāpānto" me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau" ityādinā bhagavatprabodhāv adhikasya śāpasya māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||

root:
tatreyaṃ triśaraṇagāthā | 
buddhaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ |
dharmaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ saṃghaṃ cāvetyaśraddhayā || 3.4 ||
commentary: asahiṣṇv asahanaśīlam. alasaṃ kriyāsu akarmaṇyam, kusīdam ity arthaḥ. bhītaṃ kāyajīvitabhīru bhayahetubhyo vā. pragalbhaṃ dhṛṣṭam. mukharaṃ durvacaskam, yuktāyuktamanapekṣyābhidhāyakaṃ vā. svapakṣeḥ śiṣyāntevāsijñātisālohitādau abhiniviṣṭaṃ pakṣapātātiśayavat.

root:
mahāvidyottamo nātho mahāmantrottamo guruḥ |
mahāyānanayārūḍho mahāyānanayottamaḥ || 41 ||
commentary:
mahāvidyetyādi | tatra mahāvidyottamo nātha iti candraprabhaḥ | mahatyaś ca tā vidyāś ca mahāvidyāś catasro dhāraṇyo granthārthamantramudrātmikāḥ | tāsām uttamaḥ | ata eva nāthaḥ sarvāpāyebhyaḥ sarvasattvānām aśeṣakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācārasaṃśodhanāt || mahāmantrottamo gurur iti amitaprabhaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau mantraś ca mahāmantro mahāmudrātmakas tasyottamaḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ | ata eva guruḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yathāśayānuśayajñatayābhisamayopadeśāt | mahāyānanayārūḍha iti gaganagañjaḥ | mahāyānaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tasya nayo mārgas tasminn ārūḍhaḥ sthita ity arthaḥ ||

mahāyānanayottama iti sarvanivaraṇaviṣkambhī | saṃsāranirvāṇayor anabhilāpyadharmatādhigamān nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ mahāyānam iti | atha vā trividhānuttaryeṇa saṃbhāropāyagocarādhārasvabhāvo mahāyānasya saṃgṛhīta iti | yady evaṃ katham asya mahattvam | sarvalokahitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ | tena te mahāntaḥ | teṣām idaṃ yānaṃ niṣpattaye niryāṇāya vā | tasmāt tatsahitānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānam | mahatāṃ vā yānaṃ mahāyānam || atha vā saptavidhamahattvāt | ālambanapratipattijñānavīryopāyakauśalyasamudāgamakarmamahattvān mahāyānaṃ | mahac ca tad yānaṃ ceti mahāyānam | anyatra yāne tadabhāvād iti | tad etat saṃsārena trividhaṃ mahāyānam | hetugocarasvabhāvaparidīpanārthaṃ veditavyam iti ||

tad evam upāyamātrāpekṣitayā cāśeṣalaukikalokottarasamādhisvabhāvatvād bhagavato jñānasattvasya tathāgatajñānakāyasya ||

root:
yamadūtais tato grastaḥ kālapāśavaśīkṛtaḥ |
narakaṃ nīyate pāpī yadi buddhair api rakṣitaḥ ||1.13||
commentary: śrīvajrapāṇyabhiṣekatantre śrīvajradharānucarā bhṛkuṭītaraṃgapramukhāḥ pañca śatāni krodhagaṇānāṃ paṭhyante | taiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān vajradharaḥ saṃbuddhaṃ praṇamyedam āheti yojyaṃ || te ca krodhagaṇāḥ paramārthato 'nantāḥ | ata āhānantair vajrapāṇibhir iti | te 'pi durdāntadamakā vajradharavat | ata evāha durdāntadamakair iti | ata eva vīrās te | tair anabhibhavanīyatvāt | ata āha vīrair iti | kiṃrasā vīrarasāḥ | kiṃrūpiṇo bībhatsarūpiṇaḥ | ata eva vīrabībhatsarūpibhir iti ||

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudrāto vipāko jagadātmatā |
sthairyaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tatra vimardo jagadīkṣaṇam || SeNi 28 ||
commentary:
kaḥ punar anayor vyatireke doṣaḥ, yenaite yatnena rakṣaṇīye kathite ity āha.

rogopahatasāmarthyo yathā puruṣaḥ sarvakarmasu gamanabhojanādiṣv akarmaṇyo bhavati, tathā smṛtisaṃprajanyābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ sarvakarmasu dhyānādhyayanādilakṣaṇeṣu.

root:
channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais  
tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe |  
nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ  
madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ ||
commentary: athetyādi | sarvastrīṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyāta eva dveṣavajrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra | śūnyatā viramānandaḥ | karuṇā ānandatrayaṃ tasyām | abhinnā kevalamahāsukhasvabhāvety arthaḥ | ata eva divyakāmasukhe na sthitā vikalpa ānandādiprabhedakalpanā | prapañco bījacihnādivikalpaḥ | nirākulā cittaikāgratayā ||

root:
ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet tṛtīye katham iṣyate |
yat tatrālocanaṃ naiva bhaved vittir alakṣaṇā || SeNi 3 ||
commentary:
nanu haṭhaseko balātkṛto niryuktika iti yāvat | niryuktikatvam asya katham iti cet | ucyate—āgamavirodhāt | taṃ darśayitum āha | ālocanam ityādi |

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru || 

ity atrobhayor madhyaṃ vivakṣitam | tac ca tvanmate nāsti |

tarhi—

	viramādau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjitam || 

iti katham | atrāpi viramaś cāsāv ādiś ceti pūrvavan neyam | 

tarhi—

root:
mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ  
vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ |  
garbhādhānakṣaṇaparicayān nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ  
seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ ||
commentary:
ataḥ idam api prātimokṣaniṣiddhaṃ nācaraṇīyam ity āha.

kheṭasya śleṣmaṇo visarjanam apāvṛtaṃ na kuryāt. jale sthale bhogya upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāder api kutsitam. atrāpi devatādyavadhyānād apuṇyaṃ prasavet.

root:
gaganasamaśarīraṃ lakṣaṇair bhūṣitāṅgaṃ
nirupamasukhapūrṇaṃ svābhayā saṃgataṃ ca |
sphuradamitamunīndraiḥ sarvasattvārthakāri
pravadati punar anyaḥ sādhyam ucchedaśūnyam || 11 ||
commentary:
gaganetyādi. gaganasamaṃ māyopamaṃ vicārāsahaṃ śarīraṃ yasya. lakṣaṇair dvātriṃśadbhir aśītibhiś cānuvyañjanair maṇḍitāny aṅgāni yasya. nirupamaiḥ sthaulyanairantaryāsaṃsārapravāhitvanirāsravatvādibhir upamābhāvād upamātikrāntaiḥ sukhaiḥ pūrṇaṃ romāgraparyantaṃ saṃpūrṇam. svābhayā ca tathābhūtayā saṃgataṃ samāliṅgitam. sphuradbhir anantanirmitair munīndrais tathābhūtair eva sarvasattvārthakāri. ucchedeneti nirodhena śūnyaṃ tucchaṃ riktam.

etad uktaṃ bhavati—gaganamāyāmarīcigandharvanagarodakacandrapratibimbasvapnopamam ekānekabhāvābhāvagrāhyagrāhakasvabhāvarahitam anādyantam aśeṣavastusaṃdohasvabhāvam anābhāsaṃ nirañjanaṃ sarvopamātikrāntaṃ paramasūkṣmātigambhīraprajñārūpatayā dharmakāyasvabhāvam, dvātriṃśallakṣaṇavibhūṣitaśarīram aśītyanuvyañjanavirājitagātraṃ paramaśṛṅgārayauvanādyupetaṃ svābhāṅganāliṅgitāṅgaṃ rūpavajrāditārāparyantadevīgaṇair anantaprabhedānimittaratisvarūpaparamānandopabhogadvāreṇa pratibimbavat sambhujyamānaṃ karuṇāsaṃvalitodārarūpatayā sambhogakāyarūpam, nānādhimuktivineyajanaparipācanārtham anekavidhaprātihāryadvāreṇa nirmitānantakulāntarbhūtasaṃbuddhabodhisattvaspharaṇasaṃhārakāritvena nirmāṇakāyātmakam, śūnyatākaruṇābhinnabodhicittasvabhāvāmalaprajñopāyasamādhisambhūtasatsukhāpūrṇam āsaṃsārasthitidharmaṃ apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpaṃ nirmalanivātaniścalapradīpaśikhāprabandhanityatayā nirodhaśūnyaṃ caturthaṃ sādhyam.

root:
evam adhyeṣya guhyendro vajrapānis tathāgatam |
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā prahvakāyasthito 'grataḥ || 16 ||
commentary:
sattvāśayarakṣaṇād apy ātmā rakṣitavya ity āha.

devamanuṣyapūjito hi bhagavato dharmaḥ. tato 'vadhyāyanti devatādayo gauravam akurvato dharmaprakāśanāt. niṣiddhaṃ caitad bhagavateti tadājñātikrame sāpattiko bhavet. na vastrādibaddhaśirasi. sahaśabdena triṣv api saṃbandhaḥ. tathottarīyādinā pihitaśīrṣe. pratyekaṃ svastha iti saṃbandhanīyam. glāne punar anāpattiḥ. upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat. na sthitena suptāya niṣaṇṇāya vā, na niṣaṇṇena suptāya, na cānāsanena niṣaṇṇāya. notpathayāyinā mārgayāyine, nāgragāmine pṛṣṭhagāminā, nāpy alaṃkārayuktāya. ityādayo 'pi draṣṭavyā iti.

root:
duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare |
yair etad dharmasarvasvaṃ cittaṃ guhyaṃ na bhāvitam || 5.17 ||
commentary:
vīryapāramitā tu kuśalotsāhasvabhāvātivispaṣṭaṃ cittam evety āha.

vacanakāyasahitasyāpi cittasya kuśalapakṣe mandapracārasya na tādṛśaṃ phalamupajāyate, yādṛśaṃ dhyānādiviṣaye paṭupravṛtter ekākino 'pi cittasya phalaṃ brahmabhūyādikam. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadbhutakeśavakelirahasyam |
vṛndāvanavipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam ||
commentary: teṣāṃ nirāsārtham āha—ratnetyādi | śivasyedaṃ śaivam | vedasyedaṃ vedam ||

root:
pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam |  
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || 21 ||
commentary:
yady evaṃ neṣyate, kathaṃ sā bhavatīty āha.

sarvasvaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaṃ sarvaṃ vastu dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ ca sarvasattvebhyaḥ parityajato 'bhyāsena prakarṣagamanād yadāpagatamātsaryamalaṃ nirāsaṅgatayā cittam utpadyate, tadā dānapāramitā niṣpannety ucyate. tasmāt sā cittam eva nānyā dānapāramitā.

root:
pakṣaṃ cāpi tathā vedīhārārdhahārapaṭṭikām |
mūlasūtrabahis tasyās tu ardhenaiva rajobhuvam || 2.5 ||
commentary: hārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyāḥ | rajobhuvam iti | maṇḍalapradhānarekhātaḥ pañcarekhābhuvaṃ | hārārdhahārapaṭṭikānantaraṃ ca māṇikyapaṭṭikādibhuvaṃ | vedikāhārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyās tu madhyaṃ yathāśobhaṃ kuryāt ||

root:
pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī  
jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim |  
sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai  
prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra ||
commentary: atha samāhitāntaḥkaraṇaḥ sankiṃ kṛtavānityata āha-pratyāsanna iti || sa yakṣaḥ | yaś ciraṃ dadhyau sa ity arthaḥ | nabhasi śrāvaṇe  "namaḥ khaṃ śrāvaṇo nabhāḥ" ity amaraḥ || pratyāsanne āṣāḍhasyānantaraṃ sannikṛṣṭe | prāpte satīty arthaḥ | dayitājīvitālambanārthī san | varṣākālasya virahaduḥkhajanakatvāt "utpannānarthapratīkārād anarthotpattipratibandha eva varam" iti nyāyena prāg eva priyāprāṇadhāraṇopāyaṃ cikīrṣur ity arthaḥ | jīvanasyodakasya mūtaḥ paṭabandho vastrabandho jīmūtaḥ || pṛṣodarāditvāt sādhuḥ | "mūtaḥ syāt paṭabandhe 'pi" iti rudraḥ || tena jīmūtena jaladhareṇa prayojyena svakuśalamayīṃ svakṣemapradhānāṃ pravṛttiṃ vārtām || "vārtā pravṛttir vṛttāntaḥ" ity amaraḥ || hārayiṣyan prāpayiṣyan | "ḷṭ śeṣe ca" iti cakārāt kriyārthakriyopapadāl ḷṛṭpratyayaḥ | jīvanārthaṃ karma jīvanapradenaiva kartavyam iti bhāvaḥ || "hṛkror anyatarasyām" iti karmasaṃjñāyā vikalpāt pakṣe kartari tṛtīyā || pratyagrair abhinavaiḥ kuṭajakusumair girimallikābhiḥ || "kuṭajo girimallikā" iti halāyudhaḥ || kalpitārghāya kalpito 'nuṣṭhitaḥ pūjāvidhir yasmai tasmai || "mūlye pūjāvidhāv arghaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmai jīmūtāya || "kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam" iti sampradānatvāc caturthī || prītipramukhāni prītipūrvakāṇi vacanāni yasmin karmaṇi tat prītipramukhavacanaṃ yathā tathā | śobhanam āgataṃ svāgataṃ svāgatavacanaṃ prītaḥ sanvyājahāra | kuśalāgamanaṃ papracchety arthaḥ || nāthena tv atra "pratyāsanne manasi" iti sādhīyān pāṭhaḥ kalpitaḥ | pratyāsanne prakṛtimāpanne satīty arthaḥ | yas tu tenaiva pūrvapāṭhavirodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ so 'smābhiḥ "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity etatpāṭhavikalpa samādhānenaiva samādhāya parihṛtaḥ ||

root:
nacaitāni parityajya pṛthag loke pramāṇatā |
saṃsāramocakādeśca hiṃsā puṇyatvasammatā || 5 ||
na paścāt puṇyamicchanti kecidevaṃ vigānataḥ |
mlecchāryāṇāṃ prasiddhatvaṃ na dharmasyopapadyate || 6 ||
commentary: kim iti tvaṃ harṣam | muditāṃ sarvasattvānām aiśvaryādiṣu harṣacittabhāvanāṃ viśeṣeṇa toḍayitvā śunye karoṣi praveśam | kasmān na praveśaḥ kartavya iti ced āha | yasmāt tava nimantraṇam | sarvasattvānām arthe buddho bhaveyam ityādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā manasi tiṣṭhati | lokaḥ sattvalokaḥ | aśeṣaḥ samastaḥ ||

root:
bhayotsavādisaṃbandhe yady aśakto yathāsukham |
dānakāle tu śīlasya yasmād uktam upekṣaṇam || 5.42 ||
commentary: yadīti | narake ’pi yadi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ samanubhūya varṣalakṣaṃ karmakṣayān manuṣyakarmākṣipto manuṣyeṣūtpadyata iti bhāvaḥ | vajreṇeti meghanādanirgatavajraśūcyā ||

root:
saddharmasevakaṃ kāyam itarārthe na pīḍayet |
evam eva hi sattvānām āśām āśu prapūrayet || 5.86 ||
commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

satāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaḥ. laukikalokottaraparahitasukhavidhānam | tatsevakaṃ kāyam alpārthanimittaṃ na pīḍayet. anyathā mahato 'rtharāśer hāniḥ syāt. ata eva pūrvasmin hetupadam etat. kutaḥ punar evam? yasmād anenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghram eva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati.

root:
na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścit paratra ca mahat sukham |
aprītiduḥkhaṃ dveṣais tu mahad duḥkhaṃ paratra ca || 5.78 ||
commentary:
etad eva darśayati.

raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vā svacittaṃ yadā paśyet, tadā hastapādādicalanamātram api na kartavyam, nāpi vacanodīraṇam. anyathā tadutthāpite kāyavāgvijñapty api saṃkliṣṭe syātām. ato bahirindriyavyāpāravikalpāv upasaṃhṛtya sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā. sarvavyāpāravirahān nirvyāpārāḥ sarvadharmā iti manasi nidhāya.

root:
samyaksekaṃ vidhāyaitad dhaṭhaduḥsekavarjitam |
yat sādhitaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ tenāstu jagataḥ sukham || SeNi 41 ||
commentary: kāpi prauḍhagopī adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā dhyāyati | kim | madhusūdanavadanasarojam | madhudaityaṃ sūditavān marditavāniti madhusūdanaḥ tasya vadanameva sarojaṃ mukhakamalam | kiṃviśiṣṭam | vilāsavilolavilocanakhelanajanitamanojam | vilāsena līlayā vilole ca te vilocane nayane ca tābhyāṃ kṛtvā khelanaṃ tathā saha krīḍā tasmājjanito manojaḥ kandarpo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
priyādarśanam evaikaṃ kim anyair darśanāntaraiḥ |
prāpyate yena nirvāṇaṃ sarāgeṇāpi cetasā || SeNi 16 ||
commentary: anantaram etajjñānakāraṇalalanāpraśaṃsām āha—priyetyādi | priyaiva darśanaṃ dṛśyate 'nayābhimato mokṣa iti kṛtvā | śeṣaṃ subodham | etena teṣām apy anyavyākhyāparihāreṇa lalanaiva drṣṭāntanidarśanārtham abhimatety uktaṃ bhavati |

root:
na cātrātīva kartavyaṃ doṣadṛṣṭiparaṃ manaḥ |
doṣo hy avidyamāno 'pi taccittānāṃ prakāśate || 1.4 ||
commentary: ye tu madhyasthā guṇadoṣanirūpaṇena doṣavantam apahāya guṇavantam upādadate tān prati parīkṣāviśeṣārtham arthayate na cātreti | madīye prabandhe 'smin guṇadoṣavati yugapad guṇadoṣau nirūpayantu bhavantaḥ | anyathā guṇānupekṣya doṣeṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu doṣanirbhāvanaikamanasām asanto doṣāḥ prakāśeran iti ||

root:
ajñyānapaṅkamagnānāṃ kleśavyākulacetasāṃ |
hitāya sarvasattvānām anuttaraphalāptaye || 8 ||
commentary:
ajñānapaṅkamagnānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya ca | tatrājñānam avidyā saivāsaṅgasthānatvād duruttaratvāc ca paṅka iva paṅkaḥ | tasmin magnā ye satvās teṣām hitāya || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭās te sattvā ity āha kleśavyākulacetasaḥ | kleśā ṣaṭ | tathā cāhābhidharme |

	mānadṛgvicikitsāś ca rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ |

iti || taiḥ kleśair vyākulāni cetāṃsi yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ te kleśavyākulacetasaḥ | atas teṣām || anuttaraphalaprāptaye bhagavān prakāśayatv iti tadarthaṃ tatprāptaya iti ||

samprahārapadaṃ savye caturmāravimardanam |

vasudhāṃ tarjayantaṃ ca vāmajānvagrataḥ sthitam |
akṣobhyakṛtamaulaṃ tu nīlaṃ ratnakirīṭinam || 4.21 ||
commentary: vasudhām iti | gauravarṇāṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ sampuṭāñjalinīṃ kūrmoparisapraṇayopaviṣṭāṃ bhagavadgatalocanām | kekarākṣam iti savyāpasavyābhyām ūrdhvāgataputtalīdvayam ||

commentary:
tad eva prajñāpariśuddhimātrāpekṣayā yathoktaśūnyatāprabhedamukhena maitreyādiṣoḍaśasamādhyātmakam ity ata āha ||

tatra mahāmaitrīmayo 'meya iti maitreyaḥ | mitram asyāstīti maitraṃ | paścān ṅibantaṃ | tataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitrīmayo maitrīsvabhāvaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau maitrīmayaś ca mahāmaitrīmayaḥ | ata evāmeyaḥ sakalasattvadhātāv ekaputraprematvāt || mahākāruṇiko 'gradhīr iti mañjuśrīḥ | mahākaruṇā anālambanātmikā | sā yasyāsti sa mahākāruṇikaḥ | agradhīr iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānam | tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati | audāryagāmbhīryātmako 'sau bhagavān iti || mahāprājño mahādhīmān iti gandhahastī | mahatī prajñā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇātmikā sā yasyāsti sa prājñaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau prājñaś ca mahāprājñaḥ | ata eva mahādhīmān || mahopāyo mahākṛtīti jñānaketuḥ | mahān upāyo yasyāsau mahopāyaḥ | tataś ca mahākṛtī mahāpaṇḍitaḥ sarvasattvāśayānuśayajñatayā saddharmaprakāśakatvāt ||

root:
kaṃsārirapi saṃsāravāsanābandhaśṛṅkhalām |
rādhāmādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vrajasundarīḥ ||
commentary: kṛtvetyādi. sākṣāt svādhipaṃ kṛtvā, paścāt tyaktvā, upekṣārūpaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tanmātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt. anyat sugamam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—maṇḍalacakrarūpaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt tan nirodhya, upekṣājñānamātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt pañcamam.

root:
abhinavajaladharasundara dhṛtamandara e
śrīmukhacandracakora jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: itthaṃ praviṣṭasyedānīṃ sarvābhiniveśatyāgam āha—tyajetyādi | subodham ||

root:
yasmād bhayāni sarvāṇi duḥkhāny apramitāni ca |
cittād eva bhavantīti kathitaṃ tattvavādinā || 5.6 ||
commentary: prakāśayatu bhagavān ity āha | saṃbuddha iti śāśvatadvāreṇa || jagadanuśāsanāc chāstety akṣobhyadvāreṇa || jagatāṃ gurur jagadgurur iti ratnasaṃbhavadvāreṇa || samayo bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahāś cāsau samayaś ca mahāsamayaḥ | tasya tattvaṃ mahāsamayatattvaṃ | taj jānātīti mahāsamayatattvajña iti | amitābhadvāreṇa || indriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi | teṣām āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | taṃ vettīti indriyāśayavid ity amoghasiddhidvāreṇa || evaṃ pañcatathāgatāmako bhagavān para utkṛṣṭaḥ prakāśayatv ity arthaḥ ||

root:
kṣatriyarudhiramaye jagadapagatapāpaṃ 
snapayasi payasi śamitabhavatāpam |
keśava dhṛtabhṛgupatirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.10 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ vijñānavādāśaṅkāṃ tadapagame cocchedāśaṅkāṃ ca nirākartum āha—

tathatām ityādi | tathatāṃ bhūtakoṭīṃ ye paśyanti sākṣāt kurvanti madhyamārthānusārataś catuḥkoṭivirahatas te dhanyās tattvavidaḥ | tat kim ucchedena | naiva | saṃvidā saṃvedanena yady aśeṣollekhaparihārāt tat tattvaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūtaṃ syāt |

etac caivaṃvidhaṃ satyadvayātmakam ubhayāntarahitaṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ prajñopāyasvarūpaṃ sadgurupādaprasādavitter jñeyam ||

root:
parārtharūkṣaṃ svārthārthi pariṣatkāmam eva vā |
vaktum icchati me cittaṃ tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat || 5.52 ||
commentary: kiñcāstu tāvad asmādṛśānāṃ kavipravīrāṇām āgamānusāriṇyo vācaḥ śobhanta iti | anyasyāpi śraddadhānasya trayīmārgānusāriṇī yathākathañcidārabdhā kliṣṭā alpasārāpi vāgvṛttiḥ śobhate | asmākaṃ tu bahusārā akleśanirmitā śobhatetarām ity āha yatheti ||

root:
tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārānabhijñaiḥ  
prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ |  
sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ  
kiṃcit paścād vaja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa ||
commentary:
evaṃ tāvad anayor anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇadoṣāv abhidhāya, anarthavivarjanārthaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanam āha.

prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittam ity adhyātmani cintayati. sarvakālam īdṛśam uktakramayuktam upasthāpayitavyam. tataḥ paraṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanārtham apagatakaraṇagrāmeṇeva niṣphalarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasarvavikalpopasaṃhārān mayā sthātavyam. kim iva? kāṣṭhavat, cakṣurādivyāpāraśūnyatvāt.

root:
suniścitaṃ suprasannaṃ dhīraṃ sādaragauravam |
salajjaṃ sabhayaṃ śāntaṃ parārādhanatatparam || 5.55 ||
commentary: suniścitaṃ saṃdehaviparyāsarahitam. suprasannaṃ sadā prītisaumanasyabahulam. dhīram acañcalam. ādaraḥ kathita eva. gauravaṃ ārādhyeṣu cittasya namratā. tābhyāṃ saha vartate. salajjaṃ pūrvavat. sabhayaṃ skhalitam ālokya bhītam. śāntaṃ saṃyatendriyam, sattvārādhanayatnavat.

root:
ajñyānapaṅkamagnānāṃ kleśavyākulacetasāṃ |
hitāya sarvasattvānām anuttaraphalāptaye || 8 ||
commentary: samayam iti mantranayoditaṃ vidhim ||

root:
parokṣaṃ ca guṇān brūyād anubrūyāc ca toṣataḥ |
svavarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe ca bhāvayet tadguṇajñatām || 5.76 ||
commentary:
lapanāśaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha.

paraguṇān sadbhūtān api parokṣaṃ brūyān na samakṣam. anyathā lapanāṃ kaścin manyeta. pareṇa tu tatsamakṣamanyasya guṇe bhāṣyamāṇe tadanuvādakatayā samakṣam api brūyāt. anyathā nāsya rūcir atreti matvā svacittaṃ pradūṣayet paraḥ. svaguṇe punaḥ kenacid guṇapakṣapātinā prasannena samakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca kīrtyamāne cittasyonnatiṃ nivārayaṃs tasyaiva guṇābhidhāyakasya guṇānurāgitāṃ manasi kuryāt.

root:
na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate |
kāyo yāsyati khāditvā kasmāt tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam || 5.68 ||
commentary:
syād etat—yady api evam, tathāpi bhaktāc chādanamātreṇāpi paripālanīya ity atrāha.

yadi nāma bhṛtyakarmakaraṇaṃ tathāpi tatrānavasthāyisvabhāve vicakṣaṇo jñātvaiva pravartate, evaṃ prakṛte 'pi taddharmiṇi kenābhiprāyeṇa he manaḥ, tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam upakaraṇopakṣayam?

root:
mahāmahamahārāgaḥ sarvasattvaratiṃkaraḥ | 
mahāmahamahādveṣaḥ sarvakleśamahāripuḥ || 30 ||
commentary:
ata evaitāś catasraḥ sattvavajryādipāramitā a ā aṃ aḥ iti caturbhir akṣaraiḥ pariniṣpannā iti || tataś ca yad eva cittaṃ dharmadhātusvabhāvaṃ prakṛtyā grāhyagrāhakādyākāravirahāt tad evāgantukamalābhāvaprabhāsvaratvāj jñānāntarodayanimittatvāc cādarśajñānātmakam || dharmālambanakṛpādyātmakatayā saṃtānāntarabhedāparāmarṣāc ca samatājñānam || sarvajñeyāviparyāsāt pratyavekṣaṇājñānam || samastalokahitahetutayā kṛtyānuṣṭhānjñānātmakam || ataś ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatādyadhipatisvabhāvam || ata evāha mahāmahamahārāga ityādi ||

atra cādāv amitābhasyopādānaṃ rāgasya prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ | ata evāha rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ceti | sarvatathāgatasarvākāśavyāpipūjāsaṃdarśanakāle mahāmaha ity ucyate | mahaśabdena pūjābhidhīyate | mahaṇ maho mahāmahaḥ | mahātmako rāgaś ca mahārāgaḥ | mahāmahaś cāsau mahārāgaś ca mahāmahamahārāgaḥ | tatra mahārāga iti sattvapācanamocanalokṣaṇaḥ sa ca bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahārāgo hi bhagavān vajrasattvas tathāgata iti vacanāt || sarvasattvaratiṃkara iti rāgacaritānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ratiṃ prītiṃ mahāsukhātmikāṃ karotīti sarvasattvaratiṃkaraḥ | ayam amitābhasvabhāvaḥ ||

dveṣacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahādveṣa iti | mahāmaheti gatārthaḥ | mahādveṣo 'kṣobhyaḥ sa ca sarvakleSamahāripuḥ | kleśopakleśādīnāṃ mahāripur ity arthaḥ ||

root:
mahāmudrām ajānānāḥ karmamudraikasādhanāḥ |
āmnāyatattvato bhraṣṭā rauravaṃ yānti yoginaḥ || SeNi 39 ||
commentary: iti manasi nidhāya tathaiva saṃyatātmā tiṣṭhet. trapādarabhayānvitaḥ—apratirūpe karmaṇi trapā lajjā, śikṣāyām ādaraḥ, tadatikrame bhayam. buddhabodhisattveṣv eva vā trapādayaḥ. evaṃ sati aparo 'pi viśeṣaḥ syād ity āha—buddhetyādi. tad evaṃ viharatas tasya pratikṣaṇam akāmata eva buddhānusmṛtiḥ syāt.

root:
baddhaś cec cittamātaṅgaḥ smṛtirajjvā samantataḥ |
bhayam astaṃgataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kalyāṇam āgatam || 5.3 ||
commentary: maitrī sarvasattveṣv ātmasnehabhāvanā | karuṇā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhair dharaṇābhilāṣabhāvanā | muditā sarvasattvānām aiśvaryādiṣu harṣacittabhāvanā | upekṣā viheṭhakāviheṭhakasattveṣu pratighānunayaparahitacittabhāvanā ||

root:
abhivandya gurūnādau śiṣyadhīpadminīravīn |
tatprasādāt kariṣye 'haṃ mīmāṃsāślokavārttikam || 1.2 ||
commentary: vidyāgurūṇām idānīṃ stutinamaskārau karoti abhivandyeti | śiṣyadhīpadminīnāṃ ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūnādau vande | tato vārttikaṃ kariṣye | teṣām eva prasādena dṛṣṭenārthatattvopadeśenādṛṣṭena ca stutinamaskārabhuvā | gurvanugamanādayo 'pi hy ācārapramāṇakā eva | vārttikagrahaṇena ca duruktabhaṅgam anuktavacanaṃ ca samādhatte | mīmāṃsāśabdena nyāyaśāstram idam ato nyāyānusāreṇādhikaraṇabhaṅgādyadūṣaṇam iti darśayati | ślokapadena ca lāghavavikāsaṃ kṣipāma iti darśayati | tataś ca sūtritaprāyam imam artham avahitā jijñāsavo bhāvayiṣyantīti tātparyārtha iti ||

root:
mādhavikāparimalalalite navamālatijātisugandhau |
munimanasāmapi mohanakāriṇi taruṇākāraṇabandhau ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mādhavikāparimalalalite | mādhavikāyāḥ kusumitavāsantyāḥ parimalo gandhaḥ tena lalitaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | navamālatijātisugandhau | navā nūtanāśca tā mālatyaśca tāsāṃ jātiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ | janī prādurbhave ityasya jādeśe atipratyayaḥ | tathā śobhano gandho yasmin sa tathā athavā navamālikayā kāraṇabhūtayā puṣpaviśeṣeṇa atisugandhau | navā ca mālikā ceti tayā | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mohanakāriṇi | mohanaṃ vaicityaṃ kartuṃ śīlamasyeti sa tathā tasmin | keṣāṃ | munimanasāmapi | munayo jitendriyāḥ vanavāsino vikārahīnāḥ nityanaimittikādivratācāravantasteṣāmapi | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | taruṇākāraṇabandhau | taruṇānāṃ yuvajanānāṃ akāraṇena upakāraṃ vinaiva bandhuḥ hitakārī kuṭumbasahāyaḥ kāmoddīpanatvāt |

root:
ācāro bodhisattvānām aprameya udāhṛtaḥ |
cittaśodhanam ācāraṃ niyataṃ tāvad ācaret || 5.97 ||
commentary: idānīṃ yatra yatra sthāne yo yo vādī bhavati tad darśayati—boletyādi | bolagarbhe sākāraṃ tadagrato nirākāram | yadvā tadagrataḥ sākāraṃ tadgarbhe nirākāram | ittham eva ca yan madhyamāvarṇanaṃ tad asmadgurūṇāṃ na darśanam ||

root:
vākdevatācaritacitritacittasadmā padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī |
śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametametam karoti jayadevakaviḥ prabandham ||
commentary: pataṃ prabandhaṃ jayadevakaviḥ karoti | kiṃbhūtaṃ prabandham | śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam | śrīḥ lakṣmī rādhārūpiṇī | vasudevasyāpatyaṃ vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsadaityavināśāya ādyaḥ ajanmā mānavāvatāre manujarūpī | ratiśca prītiḥ | keliḥ krīḍā ca anubhūta karma ālaye śrīśca vāsudevaśca tayoḥ ratikelikathāstābhiḥ sametaṃ saṃyuktam | kathaṃbhūto jayadevakaviḥ | padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī | padmāvatī lakṣmīḥ tasyāḥ caraṇau | tayoścāraṇaṃ śuśrūṣārādhanaṃ tatra cakravartī sevakādhirājaḥ | athavā padmāvatī tasya brāhmaṇī tasyāḥ nṛtyakalācakravartī | punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ | vāgdevatācaritacitritacitrasadmā | vāk cāsau devatā ceti | tasyāścaritaṃ tena citritaṃ vicitrīkṛtaṃ cittameva sadma gṛhaṃ yasya sa tathā | anena lakṣmī sarasvatyorjayadevo niṣṇātaḥ śṛṅgārī ca sūcitaḥ |

root:
padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritamuro madhusūdanasya |
vyaktānurāgamiva kheladanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūramanupūrayatu priyaṃ vaḥ ||
commentary: madhusūdanasya murāreḥ uro vakṣo vo yuṣmākaṃ priyam apekṣitam anupūrayatu | karotvityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtam uraḥ | padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritam | padmāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ payodharau tayostaṭī parisaraḥ pārśvabhāgaḥ tasyāḥ parirambhaḥ upagūhanaṃ tena lagnaṃ ca tat kāśmīraṃ kuṅkumaṃ ca tena mudritam | tatstanākāramaṇḍalākṛticihnitam | mamedaṃ murāreruro na tvanyasyāḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa mudritaṃ cihnitam | anyo 'pi svavastuni dravye vā granthimudrāṅkalakṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtamiva | vyaktānurāgamiva | antaḥsthitaḥ san bahirniḥsṛtya vyaktaḥ āvirbhūtaḥ anurāgaḥ prema yasmin tattathā tadiva | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | khelavanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūram | khelat krīḍaṃścāsau anaṅgaśca tena khedaḥ prayāsaḥ tena svedāmbu svedarūpaṃ nīraṃ tasya pūraḥ pravāhaḥ samūho yatra tattathā tasmin tat | gītārthaṃ ślokena sūcayati |

root:
anantānandasindhoste nātha tattvaṃ vidanti te |
tādṛśā eva ye sāndrabhaktyānandarasāplutāḥ || 1.6 ||
commentary: bhaktyānandarasaḥ samāveśānandaprasarastenāplutāḥ ārdrāśayāḥ | ata eva tādṛśā iti aparimitānandarasasamudratvāt tvadrūpasarūpāḥ tava tattvaṃ jānanti | yo hi yatra vidvān sa hi tadvettyeva |

root:
gambhīraśūnyapratibhāsamātra-
śāntātisūkṣmānabhilāpyaśabdaiḥ |
nirlepanīrūpanirañjanādyair
bhrāntir na kāryāparasādhyasattve || 20 ||
commentary:
etad eva darśayati.

śikṣā bodhisattvānāṃ heyopādeyalakṣaṇāḥ. sūtreṣu mahāyānasūtrānteṣu ratnameghādiṣu. yata evaṃ tasmāt. idaṃ tu viśeṣanirdeśam āha. āryākāśagarbhasūtre kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pañca mūlāpattayo nirdiṣṭāḥ—

	tathā sāmānyena ekā mūlāpattiḥ. tathādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ.

iti. tathā ca tatroktam—

	pañca kulaputra kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya mūlāpattayaḥ yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhoṣayati. vastupatitaḥ parājitaḥ sarvadevamanuṣyasukhebhyaḥ apāyagāmī bhavati. katamāḥ pañca? yaḥ kulaputra kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ staupikaṃ vastu apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasaṃghe niryātitaṃ vā, svayaṃ vā apaharati hārayati vā. iyaṃ prathamā mūlāpattiḥ. evaṃ triyānabhāṣitadharmapratikṣepāt dvitīyā. pravrajitasya śīlavato duḥśīlasya vā kāṣāyāpaharaṇāt, gṛhasthakaraṇāt, kāyaprahārāt, cārake prakṣepāt, jīvitaviyojanādvā tṛtīyā. pañcānantaryeṣvanyatamakaraṇāccaturthī. mithyādṛṣṭeḥ, daśākuśalakarmapathasamādānāt, parasamādāpanādvā pañcami.

iti. tathā grāmabhedādikaraṇāt sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇī caikā. tatraivoktam—

	ādikarmikāṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ, yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāropitānītyādi pūrvavat. katamā aṣṭau? ye sattvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunā asmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke utpannāḥ, te itvarakuśalamūlāḥ. yāvat, teṣām idaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ yāvad vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti. te hi akṛtaśramā bālapṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta utrasyanti, yāvad vivartayanti anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheścittam, śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati. eṣā ādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya mūlāpattiḥ prathamā, yayā mūlāpattyā ityādi pūrvavat. tasmād bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyeti. sopāyāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervinivartya hīnayāne parasya cittamutpādayato dvitīyā. prātimokṣaśikṣāsaṃvaraṃ vihāya mahāyāne cittotpādamātreṇa tatpaṭhanena cāsya śuddhiprakāśanāt tṛtīyā. śrāvakādiyānasya tatphalasya gopananindāprakāśanāt, mahāyāne sarvaśuddhiprakāśanāt, pareṣāṃ tadvacanakaraṇāccaturthī. kīrtilābhādihetoḥ mahāyānapaṭhanādinā, tathā tatpratyayāt pareṣāṃ kutsānindādibhāṣaṇāt, ātmotkarṣaṇāt, uttaramanuṣyadharmopagamāt pañcamī. pāṭhamātreṇa gambhīradharmādhigamaprakāśanāt, pareṣāṃ tathaiva samādāpanāt ṣaṣṭhī. kṣatriyasya purohitāmātyacaṇḍālairye bhikṣavo daṇḍitā arthadaṇḍena sāṃghikaṃ staupikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtya tebhya evopanāmayanti. te ca kṣatriyā ubhaye 'pi mūlāpattim āpadyante. iyaṃ saptamī. dharmādharmavivādanāpūrvaṃ śikṣāpraṇayanāt, tanmūlācāravipannānāṃ satkārāt, prahāṇikānāmupabhogaparibhogāṇyanyatra pariṇāmanāt ubhaye 'pi mūlāpattim āpadyante. iyamaṣṭamī.

āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śāstrakāropadarśitāḥ saṃgrahakārikā ucyante-

	ratnatrayasvaharaṇādāpatpārājikā matā |
	saddharmasya pratikṣepād dvitīyā muninoditā ||

	duḥśīlasyāpi vā bhikṣoḥ kāṣāyastainyatāḍanāt |
	cārake vā vinikṣepādapapravrājanena ca ||

	pañcānantaryakaraṇānmithyādṛṣṭigraheṇa ca |
	grāmādibhedanādvāpi mūlāpattirjinoditā ||

	śūnyatāyāśca kathanātsattveṣvakṛtabuddhiṣu |
	buddhatvaprasthitānāṃ tu saṃbodhervinivartanāt ||

	prātimokṣaṃ parityājya mahāyāne niyojanāt |
	śiṣyayānaṃ na rāgādiprahāṇāyeti vā grahāt ||

	pareṣāṃ grahaṇādvāpi punaḥ svaguṇakāśanāt |
	parapaṃsanato lābhasatkāraślokahetunā ||

	gambhīrakṣāntiko 'smīti mithyaiva kathanātpunaḥ |
	daṇḍāpayedvā śramaṇān dadyādvā śaraṇatrayāt ||

	gṛhṇīyāddīyamānaṃ vā śamathatyājanātpunaḥ |
	pratisaṃlīnabhogaṃ ca svādhyāyiṣu nivedanāt ||

	mūlā āpattayo hyetā mahānarakahetavaḥ |
	āryasyākāśagarbhasya svapne deśyāḥ puraḥsthitaiḥ ||

	bodhicittaparityāgādyācakāyāpradānataḥ |
	tīvramātsaryalobhābhyāṃ krodhādvā sattvatāḍanāt ||

	prasādyamāno yatnena sattveṣu na titikṣate |
	kleśātparānuvṛttyā vā saddharmābhāsavarṇanāt ||

iti.

tasminn eva sūtre samuddharaṇam āsām uktam.

root:
rajakīti ca duhitā ca nartakī ca prakathyate |  
rañjanāt sarvasattvānāṃ rajakīti tathā smṛtā || 17 ||
commentary: rajakītyādinoddeśaḥ. rañjanād ityādinā nirdeśaḥ. sattvānām iti vijñānānām.

root:
nayanaviṣayamapi kiśalayatalpaṃ |
kalayati vihitahutāśavikalpam ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
bako biḍālaś cauraś ca niḥśabdo nibhṛtaś caran |
prāpnoty abhimataṃ kāryam evaṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret || 5.73 ||
commentary:
evaṃ mayetyādyāha saṅgītikāraḥ | nidānavākyaṃ etat | yasmāt saṅgītikāreṇa sūtratantrādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ | bhagavato vacanāt | tathā ca | evaṃ mayā śrutam iti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgātavyam ityādi | evaṃ sati | 

śraddhāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstā parṣac ca sākṣiṇi | 
deśakālau ca nirdiṣṭau svaprāmāṇyaprasiddhaye || iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati ||

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā | 
vajrasattva iti | vajram abhedyaṃ sattvam arthakriyākāritvam asyeti | athavā vajra iva vajraḥ sa cāsau sattvaḥ prāṇī ceti | sarvetyādi | sarve ca te tathāgatāś ca teṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ jīvaccharīra tasya hṛdayam atyantābhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | tad eva vajradhātvīśvarībhagam ||

vajro liṅgaṃ tasya dhātuḥ sāṃvṛtavivṛtatvalakṣaṇaḥ | bodhicittaṃ tasyeśvarī vā prajñā vajradhātunā sevitatvāt tasyāḥ | tadvarāṅge bhage vijahāreti | vihṛtavān vajrapadmasaṃyogena sampuṭayogena sthitavān ity arthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vihāraḥ prākṛtajanasyāpy atyantagupto bhavati kiṃ punar bhagavato vajrasattvasya | tataś cārthād uktaṃ bhavati | sumerugirimūrdhnivajrasatvabhūmau vajramaṇiśikharakūṭāgāre viharati smeti | etena śāstrā kālo deśaś coktaḥ ||

parṣadaṃ vaktum āha | anekaiścetyādi | vajrayoginaḥ | śvetācalādayaḥ | vajrayoginyo mohavajryādayaḥ | teṣām tāsāṃ ca gaṇāḥ samūhā ekarasāktāḥ bahuvacanaṃ tv ekavacanasyāpi pañcatathāgatātmatvāt ||

tadyathetyupadarśane | śvetācaleneti bhagavato bhagavatīdehagatarūpajñānena | evaṃ pītācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatagandhajñānena | raktācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatarasajñānena | śyāmācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatasparśajñānenana || 

mohavajryā ceti | bhagavatyo bhagavaddehagatarūpajñānena | piśunavajryā ceti bhagaddehagatagandhajñānena | rāgavajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatarasajñānena | īrṣyāvajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatasparśajñānena | svayaṃ tu bhagavān bhagavatīdehagataśabdajñāne rūpaḥ | bhagavatī tu bhagavaddehegataśabdajñānarūpā ato naitat prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

evaṃ pramukhair iti | evaṃprakāraiḥ | cakṣuṣā ghrāṇena rasanayā kāyena śrotreṇa rūpeṇa vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskāreṇa vijñānena pṛthivyā jalena tejasā vāyūnā ākāśena ityādibhir ityarthaḥ | etenaivamvidhe vihāre parṣaddevyopyetāddṛśyo bodhicitte tu kathitaṃ bhavati ||

root:
samprahārapadaṃ savye caturmāravimardanam |
vāme bhūmiṣṭhajānuṃ ca kekarākṣaṃ bhayānakam || 4.22 ||
vasudhāṃ tarjayantaṃ ca vāmajānvagrataḥ sthitam |
akṣobhyakṛtamaulaṃ tu nīlaṃ ratnakirīṭinam || 4.21 ||
commentary: pataṃ prabandhaṃ jayadevakaviḥ karoti | kiṃbhūtaṃ prabandham | śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam | śrīḥ lakṣmī rādhārūpiṇī | vasudevasyāpatyaṃ vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsadaityavināśāya ādyaḥ ajanmā mānavāvatāre manujarūpī | ratiśca prītiḥ | keliḥ krīḍā ca anubhūta karma ālaye śrīśca vāsudevaśca tayoḥ ratikelikathāstābhiḥ sametaṃ saṃyuktam | kathaṃbhūto jayadevakaviḥ | padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī | padmāvatī lakṣmīḥ tasyāḥ caraṇau | tayoścāraṇaṃ śuśrūṣārādhanaṃ tatra cakravartī sevakādhirājaḥ | athavā padmāvatī tasya brāhmaṇī tasyāḥ nṛtyakalācakravartī | punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ | vāgdevatācaritacitritacitrasadmā | vāk cāsau devatā ceti | tasyāścaritaṃ tena citritaṃ vicitrīkṛtaṃ cittameva sadma gṛhaṃ yasya sa tathā | anena lakṣmī sarasvatyorjayadevo niṣṇātaḥ śṛṅgārī ca sūcitaḥ |

root:
hṛṣṭatuṣtāśayair muditaiḥ krodhavigraharūpibhiḥ |
buddhakṛtyakaraiḥ nāthaiḥ sārdhaṃ praṇatavigrahaiḥ || 5 ||
commentary:
tad eva paraṃ viśvarūpam astīti darśayann āha—na santītyādi | bhāvā bāhyā rūpādayas tattvataḥ paramārthato na santi | kathaṃ tarhi nīlādipratibhāsaḥ | ata āha–śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitā iti | cicchaktisvabhāvaṃ gatāś cidātmāna ity arthaḥ | tarhi saiva paramārthasatī syāt | atas tan nirāsārtham āha—śaktir ityādi | subodham |

etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitam | tad uktaṃ bhargaśikāyāṃ śākteye tantra—

	na san na cāsat sadasan na ca tan nobhayojjhitam | 
	durvijñeyā hi sāvasthā kim apy etad anuttamam || 

iti |

root:
vākyāntare samarthe 'pi kimarthaṃ vidhir āśritaḥ |
sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu gamyate || 12 ||
sarvavākyeṣu cākhyātaṃ tenākāṅkṣānivartanāt |
pravṛttisiddhir icchātaḥ pratiṣedhāt tu varjanam || 13 ||
commentary: atra codayati vākyāntara iti dvayena | ayam arthaḥ yad idaṃ śabdaviśeṣasya vidher dharme pramāṇatvam āśritam anena vākyāntaram api hi vartamānopadeśakaṃ dharmapramitau pramāṇam eva | śreyas sādhanaṃ hi dharmaḥ | sa ca śreyasaḥ svargādeḥ sādhanena yāgādinā sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu sambhavati | svargakāmo yajetety ato 'pi hi yāgena svargaḥ sidhyatīti gamyata eva | yathā loke odanaṃ pacatīti pākaudanayoḥ sādhyasādhanasambandhabuddhiḥ | syād etat ākhyātam antareṇa sādhyasādhanasambandho na siddhyet tadartho vidhir iti | tan na | anākhyātavākyaprayogāsambhavāt | prayojanāya hi vākyam uccāryate | nirākāṅkṣaṃ ca vacaḥ prayojanakṣamam ākāṅkṣānivartanaṃ cākhyātādṛte na sambhavati | itarathā vidher apy asambhavāt | stutyāpi hy ākhyātam eva khādirādivākyeṣu vidhāyakaṃ parikalpyate | athocyeta anuṣṭhito yāgādir dharmaḥ na cānuṣṭhānaṃ pravartakādṛte sambhavati | na ca vidhim antareṇānyaḥ pravartayatīti | tan na | icchānibandhanatvāt pravṛtteḥ | aniṣṭeṣu vidhiśatenāpy apravṛtteḥ | ato 'nenedaṃ sidhyatīti saṃvidi vopāyārthī sa tatra pravartata iti | na cādharmavarjanārtho vidhiḥ | pratiṣedhād eva nañas tatsiddheḥ | rāgādiprāptakartavyatānuvādena nañ eva niṣedhādhikāre nivartakaḥ | eṣā hi tatra vacanavyaktiḥ yaddhanyāt tan neti | ato 'narthako vidhiprāmāṇyapratipādanaprayāsaḥ | apauruṣeyaḥ śabdaḥ dharme pramāṇam ity etāvad eva vacanīyam iti ||

root:
sarvasminn apratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāmudreti kīrtyate |
vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter vicitrāder na sambhavaḥ || SeNi 29 ||
commentary:
dharmamudrām uktvā sahajānandaikasvabhāvāṃ mānasīṃ mahāmudrām āha—sarvasminn ityādi | sarvasminn iti pratītyasamputpannaskandhadhātvāyatanādau | apratiṣṭhānam amanasikāro 'nāropaḥ | tad uktaṃ pravacane—"amanasikārā dharmāḥ kuśalā manasikārā dharmā akuśalāḥ" | tathā—

		avikalpitasaṅkalpa apratiṣṭhitamānasa |
		asmṛty amanasikāra nirālamba namo 'stu te || 

iti | atra jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśavad aśakyānuṣṭhānatā ca na mantavyā | sadgurupādaprasādenāvaśyaṃ sarvākāravaropetalakṣaṇamahāmudrāyāḥ pratyakṣīkartuṃ śakyatvāt |

nanv atra kathaṃ na catuḥkṣaṇarūpatā | āha—vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter nirmalatayā vicitrādeḥ kṣaṇatrayasya samalasya nātra sambhavaḥ | tato nānandatrayasambhavaḥ |

root:
mahāmahamahāmoho mūḍhadhīmohasūdanaḥ |
mahāmahamahākrodho mahākrodharipur mahān || 31 ||
commentary: mohacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahāmoha iti || mahāmaheti pūrvavat | mahāmoho vairocanaḥ | dhiyāṃ moho dhīmohaḥ | mūḍhaś cāsau dhī mohaś ca mūḍhadhīmohaḥ | tasya sūdano vināśakaḥ || krodhacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahākrodha iti | tathaiva mahāmaheti | mahākrodha ity amoghasiddhiḥ | mahākrodharipur mahān iti | sattvāsattvaviṣayatvād mahākrodhaḥ | tasya sa eva mahāripur iti ||

root:
kaṃsārirapi saṃsāravāsanābandhaśṛṅkhalām |
rādhāmādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vrajasundarīḥ ||
commentary: śrīkṛṣṇābhiprāyaṃ uttarīyagītārthaṃ ślokābhyāṃ prakaṭayati kaṃsārirapītyādi | kaṃsāriḥ śrīkṛṣṇo 'pi saṃsāravāsanābandhaśṛṅkhalāṃ rādhāṃ hṛdaye ādhāya saṃcintya vrajasundarīḥ aparagopīstatyāja jahau | saṃsārasya vāsanā jagataḥ sthititatparatā vigatarūpā pūrvajanmakṛtasukṛtasaṃskārātiśayaprāptasarvasundarījanādhikasubhagatā | tayā baddhā viṣayāsaktirūpaśṛṅkhalā śṛṅkhalāsthānaṃ yā dṛḍhahetustām |

root:
kelikalākutukena ca kācidamuṃ yamunājalakūle |
mañjulavañjulakuñjagataṃ vicakarṣa kareṇa dukūle ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
diśi diśi kirati sajalakaṇajālam |
nayananalinamiva vigalitanālam ||
commentary: sā rādhā nayananalinaṃ locanakamalaṃ diśi diśi kirati kṣipati | kimbhūtam | sajalakaṇajālam | saha jalakaṇajālena vartata iti sa tathā | nanu punaḥ kimbhūtam | vigalitaṃ nālaṃ yasya sa tathā | nanu pratidiśaṃ rudatī mṛgayatītyarthaḥ | anena kimuktam | bhavato lābhāya kajjalābhāvānnayanakamalasajalakusumairdigdevatāmarcayati | ayamāśayaḥ |

root:
asthīny api pṛthak kṛtvā paśya majjānam antataḥ |
kim atra sāram astīti svayam eva vicāraya || 5.63 ||
commentary: yāvad ābodhimaṇḍata iti uktalakṣaṇabhaktim antareṇa prajñāyāḥ kṛpābhāvāt sukhalakṣaṇasya bodhimaṇḍasya bodhisārasyānutpattir iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
varṇitaṃ jayadevakena hareridaṃ pravaṇena |
tindubilvasamudrasaṃbhavarohiṇīramaṇena ||
commentary:
kāyapratyavekṣām abhidhāya cittapratyavekṣaṇām āha.

dharmasya svaparahitalakṣaṇasya cintaiva mahāstambhaḥ, vandhanāyattīkaraṇahetutvāt.

root:
agrato bhāvayet paścāt yaṃ raṃ vaṃ laṃ catuṣṭayam |
niṣpannaṃ bhāvayet tena vātavahnijalorvikām || 4.11 ||
commentary:
evaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyākṣāntikausīdyapratipakṣatayā tad eva dānaśīlakṣāntivīryapāramitātmakam iti | ata āha mahādānetyādi ||

tatra mahādānapatiḥ śreṣṭha iti vajralāsyā | pūjānugrahakāmyayā dīyata iti dānaṃ | tasya dānasya patir dānapatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau dānapatiś ca mahādānapatiḥ | āmiṣābhayadharmābhiṣekātmakacaturdānotsṛjanatayā śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokotkṛṣṭatvāt || mahāśīladharo 'graṇīr iti vajramālā | kāyavākcittānāṃ samādhānāc chīlaṃ | śīla samādhāv iti dhātvarthatvāt | daśākuśalaviratilakṣaṇaṃ prātimokṣasvabhāvaṃ ca | tad dhārayatīti śīladharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau śīladharaś ca mahāśīladharaḥ | ata evāgraṇīḥ purahsara ity arthah || mahākṣāntidharo dhīra iti vajragītā | kṣamaṇaṃ kṣāntis titikṣā tāṃ dhārayatīti kṣāntidharaḥ | mahaṃś cāsau kṣāntidharaś ca mahākṣāntidharaḥ | tataś ca dhīraḥ | mahatsv api duḥkheṣu dhairyāvalambanatvāt || mahāvīryaparākrama iti vajranṛtyā | vīryaṃ kuśala utsāhaḥ | pāpādau tūtsāhaḥ kusīdatvāt kausīdyam eva na vīryaṃ | tasya parākramaḥ sarvalaukikalokottarakuśalamūlaparipūraṇāt | 

ataś ca guhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakaṃ yathākramam ādarśādijñānaniṣpattau svavimokṣamukhaviśuddhibalenānābhogābhirativiśeṣotpādakatvāt ||

root:
mahādhyānasamādhistho mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk |
mahābalo mahopāyaḥ praṇidhir jñānasāgaraḥ || iti || [37]
commentary:
tad eva dauṣprajñavikṣepāsamyakpraṇidhivipakṣābhibhūtirahitatvenāha mahādhyānetyādi |

tatrāsyāṃ gāthāyāṃ dhyānaprajñayor vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | mahāprajñāśarīradhṛg iti vajradhūpā | mahati prajñā mahāprajñā saiva śarīraṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk || mahādhyānasamādhistha iti vajrapuṣpā | samādhiś cittasyaikāgratālakṣaṇas tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti samādhisthaḥ | mahac ca tad dhyānaṃ ca mahādhyānaṃ mahattvaṃ caturdhyānātmakatvāt | teṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu samādhisthaḥ || praṇidhir iti vajradīpā | praṇidhīyata iti praṇidhiḥ | bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānavaśād utpatteḥ || mahopāya iti vajragandhā | mahāṃś cāsāv upāyaś ca mahopāyaḥ | tata evopāyabalenāśeṣānavaśeṣasya sattvadhātor yathāśayābhiprāyaparipūraṇāt || 

ata eva prajñādhyānapraṇidhyupāyapāramitālakṣaṇatayā bāhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakam iti ||

sāmbhogikamārgaprītihetubhāvena balajñānayor dharmadhātvavatārasvabhāvatvāt tayor eva balajñānayoḥ pravibhāgaḥ | tatra balaṃ śraddhādipañca | jñānaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca | tatra darśanamārge bodhyaṅgeṣu | bhāvanāmārga āryāṣtāṅgeṣu || 

tataś ca śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhirūpatayā dvārapālacatuṣṭayātmakaṃ mahāyānābhisampratyayapravṛttitannairantaryasantuṣṭikāraṇatvāt ||

root:
strīṇāṃ tu mukuṭābhiṣekaṃ tyaktvā sindūrābhiṣekaṃ dadyāt | paṭṭamahādevīrūpāṃ śiṣyām ālambya | oṃ bhagavaty āviśa āviśa asyā hṛdaye hūṃ phaṭ |
lauhādikarttikāṃ tasyā dakṣiṇahaste dadyāt | oṃ karttike sarvamārāṇāṃ māṃsaṃ kartaya kartaya hūṃ phaṭ |
vāmahaste nṛkapālaṃ dārvādikṛtaṃ dadyāt | oṃ kapāla sarvaśatrūṇāṃ raktaṃ dhāraya dhāraya hūṃ phaṭ |
tato bhagavatīmudrayopaveśya tadākāreṇa cālambya | oṃ he śrīdveṣavajri siddhā tvaṃ hūṃ phaṭ |
evaṃ striyaṃ kṛṣṇādivarṇabhedena pañcayoginīnāṃ nāmnābhiṣiñcet | āsāṃ tu prajñābhiṣekasthāne upāyābhiṣeko deya iti ||
commentary: maṇḍalapradhānatvāt maṇḍalapaṭalaḥ || iti dvitāyapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
vasati daśanaśikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā 
śaśini kalaṅkakaleva nimagnā |
keśava dhṛtaśūkararūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.7 ||
commentary: tava daśanaśikhare dantasyāgre lagnā dharaṇī pṛthvī vasati tiṣṭhati | daśanasya śikharaṃ tasmin | kasmin keva | śaśini candre nimagnā kalaṅkakaleva | kalaṅkasya kalā kalaṅkakalā |

root:
japās tapāṃsi sarvāṇi dīrghakālakṛtāny api |
anyacittena mandena vṛthaivety āha sarvavit || 5.16 ||
commentary:
prajñā tu nirvivādā cittam evety āha.

pañcagatisaṃsārajātyādiduḥkhaṃ prahātuṃ tatprahāṇe nirvāṇasukham adhigantuṃ te sattvā mudhā nirarthakā eva bhramanty ambare kāsīpuṣpam iva niṣphalaṃ saṃsāre. yad anuṣṭhitaṃ kvacid api na lagnam iti tad eva mam idhīyate pañcāgnisevāśiroluñcanādivratam. ke punar evaṃ bhramanti? yaiḥ saṃsārabhayabhīrubhiḥ sukhārthibhiś ca dharmasarvasvaṃ sarvalaukikalokottarakarmanidānabhūtaṃ cittaṃ bālānām agocarasvabhāvatayā guhyaṃ na bhāvitaṃ tattvacittatayā punaḥ punaḥ sthirīkṛtam. tasmād iyam atitarāṃ cittam eva. yathopavarṇitam āryagaṇḍavyūhe-

	svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryā. svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvasattvaparipākavinayaḥ. peyālam. tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati-svacittam evopastambhayitavyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ. svacittam eva parisyandayitavyaṃ dharmameghaiḥ. svacittam eva pariśodhayitavyam āvaraṇīyadharmebhyaḥ. svacittam eva dṛḍhīkartavyaṃ vīryeṇa |

ityādi.

root:
sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittair api durlabhā |
bhokṣye tuṣṭisukhaṃ tasmāt paraśramakṛtair guṇaiḥ || 5.77 ||
commentary: pumvapuṣīti | prajñāsamparkonmukhe iti bhāvaḥ | hitaṃ tatkathanaṃ pañcākāreṇeti | nirmitādhārādheyaprapañcarūpeṇautpattikrameṇa ādikarmikāṇām etadvyātirekeṇa kathayitum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
lābhā naśyantu me kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam |
naśyatv anyac ca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana || 5.22 ||
commentary:
punar evaṃ karaṇīyam ity atrārthe dṛḍham abhiniveśaṃ darśayann āha.

civarapiṇḍapātādayo naśyantu. vilayaṃ yāntu mama kāmaṃ yatheṣṭam. satkāro gauraveṇāsanadānapādavandanādipūjā kāyo jīvitaṃ ca sarvam etan naśyatu. anyad api yatkiṃcit sukhasaumanasyanimittaṃ tad api naśyatu. kuśalaṃ punar mama cittaṃ mā kasmiṃścid api kāle naṅkṣīd iti.

root:
tato hṛdi bhāvayed bījaṃ padmacandraraviṣṭhitam |
raśmibhiḥ purato dhyāyān niṣpannaṃ caṇḍaroṣaṇam || 4.4 ||
commentary: catuḥkoṭirahitatā cety āha—nāsata ityādi | subodham ||

root:
ākāraśūnyaṃ gaganendurūpaṃ
pratyātmavedyaṃ karuṇārasaṃ ca |
sallakṣaṇair bhūṣitam arthakāri
dānādiniṣyandam apetasaukhyam || 5 ||
commentary:
etad eva darśayati.

raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vā svacittaṃ yadā paśyet, tadā hastapādādicalanamātram api na kartavyam, nāpi vacanodīraṇam. anyathā tadutthāpite kāyavāgvijñapty api saṃkliṣṭe syātām. ato bahirindriyavyāpāravikalpāv upasaṃhṛtya sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā. sarvavyāpāravirahān nirvyāpārāḥ sarvadharmā iti manasi nidhāya.

root:
adāntā mattamātaṅgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām |
karoti yām avīcyādau muktaś cittamataṅgajaḥ || 5.2 ||
commentary: triṣu kāmarūpyārūpyadhātuṣu | durlabhaṃ dīpankarānantaraṃ vipaśyādibhir buddhair adeśitatvāt | aśrutam iti gurunirapekṣārthāvagateḥ | nanu yady evaṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ | buddhājñālaṅghanam eva | atha pratirūpo gurur na prāpyate | arthāvagatiś ca bhavati | tadāvaśyaṃ buddhabodhisattvādipratimāyā agrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat parisamāptaṃ tāvad uddeśayet | etad api bhagavatā anujñātam | etat tvayābhāvād aśrutaṃ bhavati | adhogatiṃ narakagatim ||

root:
yamunātīravānīranikuñje mandamāsthitaṃ |
prāha premabharodbhrāntaṃ mādhavaṃ rādhikāsakhī ||
commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
navamaṃ madhyame tasya madhye khaḍgaṃ sunīlakam |
vajreṇāṅkitaṃ taṃ ca vajrakarttikapālayutam || 2.9 ||
commentary:
dharmamudrām uktvā sahajānandaikasvabhāvāṃ mānasīṃ mahāmudrām āha—sarvasminn ityādi | sarvasminn iti pratītyasamputpannaskandhadhātvāyatanādau | apratiṣṭhānam amanasikāro 'nāropaḥ | tad uktaṃ pravacane—"amanasikārā dharmāḥ kuśalā manasikārā dharmā akuśalāḥ" | tathā—

		avikalpitasaṅkalpa apratiṣṭhitamānasa |
		asmṛty amanasikāra nirālamba namo 'stu te || 

iti | atra jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśavad aśakyānuṣṭhānatā ca na mantavyā | sadgurupādaprasādenāvaśyaṃ sarvākāravaropetalakṣaṇamahāmudrāyāḥ pratyakṣīkartuṃ śakyatvāt |

nanv atra kathaṃ na catuḥkṣaṇarūpatā | āha—vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter nirmalatayā vicitrādeḥ kṣaṇatrayasya samalasya nātra sambhavaḥ | tato nānandatrayasambhavaḥ |

root:
abhinavajaladharasundara dhṛtamandara e
śrīmukhacandracakora jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūta | abhinavajaladharasundara | abhinavo navīnaśvāsau jaladharaśceti tadvat sundaraḥ śyāmaḥ tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | dhṛtamandra | amṛtonmathane dhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe mandarācalo yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | śrīmukhacandracakora | śriyo lakṣmyā mukhaṃ tadeva candraḥ tasya cakoraḥ tasya saṃbodhanam | cakoro hi candraraśmipānaṃ karoti | ayamapi śrīmukhādharapānaṃ karotītyarthābhiprāyaḥ |

root:
mīmāṃsāśāstratejobhir viśeṣeṇoj jvalīkṛte | 
vedārthajñānaratne me tṛṣṇātīva vijṛmbhate || 1.9 ||
commentary: nanu kimaṅgabhūtāyāṃ mīmāṃsāyāṃ vārttikaṃ praṇīyate vedā eva sākṣād vyākhyāyantām ata āha mīmāṃseti | vedā eva saṃśayapūrvottarapakṣakrameṇa vyākhyāyamānā mano harantitarāṃ na tu mantrabrāhmaṇabhāṣyaprasthānena | mīmāṃsayaiva tu te tathāvyākhyāyanta iti tatraiva vārttikaṃ kartuṃ me tṛṣṇā vardhata iti ||

root:
phalena saha sarvasvatyāgacittāj jane 'khile |
dānapāramitā proktā tasmāt sā cittam eva tu || 5.10 ||
commentary:
yady evaṃ neṣyate, kathaṃ sā bhavatīty āha.

sarvasvaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaṃ sarvaṃ vastu dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ ca sarvasattvebhyaḥ parityajato 'bhyāsena prakarṣagamanād yadāpagatamātsaryamalaṃ nirāsaṅgatayā cittam utpadyate, tadā dānapāramitā niṣpannety ucyate. tasmāt sā cittam eva nānyā dānapāramitā.

root:
kāliyaviṣadharagañjana janarañjana e 
yadukulanalinadineśa jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: kiṃbhūta | kāliyaviṣadharagañjana | kāliyaścāsau viṣadharaśca vyālaḥ | taṃ gañjayatīti tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | janarañjana | janaṃ svabhaktaṃ rañjayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | yadukulanalanadineśa yadūnāṃ kulaṃ vaṃśaḥ tadeva nalinaṃ tasya dineśaḥ savitā prakāśakaḥ |

root:
tatrāyam udakābhiṣekaḥ | 
śiṣyaṃ śuddhaṃ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ nirmalaṃ dhyātvā vijayakalaśād udakam ākṛṣya sahakārapallavena oṃ āḥ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasamayaśriye hūṃ ity anenābhiṣiñcet || 3.11 ||
commentary: vijayakalaśaṃ sarvacihnātmakaṃ pañcaratnapañcavrīhipañcauṣadhiparikṣiptaṃ sahakārādipallavācchāditaṃ | tasmāt sahakārapallavety upalakṣaṇaṃ tadabhāvād anyo ’pi pallavo boddhavyaḥ ||

root:
sared apasared vāpi puraḥ paścān nirūpya ca |
evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu kāryaṃ buddhvā samācaret || 5.38 ||
commentary:
asamādhānasya ca rakṣaṇām āha.

saret puraḥ apasaret paścāt. prapātādyupaghātaṃ nirīkṣya ca. evam ity uktakramadiśā svaparahitaprayojanam avagamya pratipattisāro bhavet.

root:
tena jitvā śaṭhamāraṃ prāpya buddhatvam uttamam |
bhaveyaṃ bhavakhinnānāṃ śaraṇaṃ sarvadehinām || 3.9 ||
commentary: śaṭham iti duṣṭam ||

root:
vajrāvalīṃ tu tenaiva aṣṭastambhāṃś ca kalpayet |
dvārāt triguṇitaṃ kuryāt dvāratoraṇam uttamam || 2.6 ||
commentary:
syād etat—yady api evam, tathāpi bhaktāc chādanamātreṇāpi paripālanīya ity atrāha.

yadi nāma bhṛtyakarmakaraṇaṃ tathāpi tatrānavasthāyisvabhāve vicakṣaṇo jñātvaiva pravartate, evaṃ prakṛte 'pi taddharmiṇi kenābhiprāyeṇa he manaḥ, tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam upakaraṇopakṣayam?

root:
mā karuṇācia iṭṭahi pahu mā hohi tu śunna |
mā mojju deha sudukkhia hoi hai jīva vihuna || piśunavajryāḥ || 4.28 ||
commentary:
maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānam iti jhaṭity ātmānaṃ bhagavadrūpeṇālambhya svahṛdaye viśvapadmacandraHŪṂ sūryopariHŪṂkāraṃ dhyātvā tannirgataraśmibhir anādisaṃsiddhaṃ maṇḍalacakram akaniṣṭhabhuvanasthitaṃ JAḤkārapāṭhenākṛṣya purato dṛṣṭvā cetonirmitāsanaṃ ca dhyātvā HŪṂkārapāṭhena tatropaveśayet | tato VAṂkārapāṭhena tatraivābhiniveśena sthitaṃ cintayet | tato HOḤkārapāṭhena siddhidānonmukhaṃ parituṣṭaṃ cintayet | tato manonirmitānekapūjābhiḥ saṃpūjyaḥ | OṂ śrīcaṇḍetyādimantraṃ vāraṃ trayaṃ paṭhet | tatas  
tasmād ākṛṣtaṃ nirmitamaṇḍale praviṣṭam ekarūpatayā tadrūpeṇeva baddham atīvaparituṣṭaṃ dhyātvā pūjayed ity āmnāyaḥ ||

root:
mahāvidyottamo nātho mahāmantrottamo guruḥ |
mahāyānanayārūḍho mahāyānanayottamaḥ || 41 ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhaṇamukulitapulakitacūte | sphurantī puṣpavantī cāsau atimuktalatā ca vāsantī | tasyāḥ parirambhaṇaṃ kartari ṣaṣṭhī | tena mukulitaḥ pulakitaḥ romodgamaśca cūta āmravṛkṣo yatra sa tathā tasmin | kasmin sthāne harirviharati | vṛndāvanavipine | vṛndāvanākhyaṃ yadvipinaṃ vanaṃ tattasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte | parisare samīpe parigataṃ samantādgataṃ tacca tadyamunājalaṃ ca tena pūte pavitrībhūte tasmin |

root:
pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair  
nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ |  
tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ  
sampatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ ||
