commentary: pāṇḍv iti || he megha, tvayy āsanne sanikṛṣṭe sati daśārṇo nāma janapadāḥ sūcibhinnaiḥ sūciṣu mukulāgreṣu bhinnair vikasitaiḥ || "ketakīmukulāgreṣu sūciḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ketakaiḥ ketakīkusumaiḥ pāṇḍucchāyā haritavarṇā upavanānāṃ vṛtayaḥ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ || "prākāro varaṇaḥ sālaḥ prācīraṃ prāntato vṛtiḥ" ity amaraḥ || tathā gṛhabalibhujāṃ kākādigrāmapakṣiṇāṃ nīḍārambhaiḥ kulāya nirmāṇaiḥ || "kulāyo nīḍam astriyām" ity amaraḥ || cityāyā imāni caityāni rathyāvṛkṣāḥ || "caityam āyatane buddhavandye codeśapādape" iti viśvaḥ || ākulāni saṅkīrṇāni grāmeṣu caityāni yeṣu te tathoktāḥ | tathā pariṇataiḥ pakvaiḥ phalaiḥ śyāmāni yāni jambūvanāni tair antā ramyāḥ || "mṛtāvavasite ramye samāptāvanta iṣyate" iti śabdārṇave || tathā katipayeṣv eva dineṣu sthāyino haṃsā yeṣu te tathoktā evaṃvidhāḥ sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti || "poṭāyuvatistokakatipaya-" ityādinā kavipayaśabdasyottarapadatve 'pi na tacchabdasyottaratvam asty asya śāstrasya prāyikatvāt ||

root:
varṇitaṃ jayadevakena hareridaṃ pravaṇena |
tindubilvasamudrasaṃbhavarohiṇīramaṇena ||
commentary: idaṃ gītam | hareḥ kṛṣṇasya pravaṇena bhaktinamreṇa yattena jayadevakena kavinā varṇitam | kimbhūtena | tindubilvasamudrasaṃbhavarohiṇīramaṇena | tindubilvaṃ nāma nagaram | tadeva samudraḥ tatra saṃbhavaḥ utpattiryasya sa tathā sa cāsau rohiṇīramaṇaśceti | anena tasya candropamā |

root:
sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet |
bodhisattvavratadharaṃ mahāyānārthakovidam || 5.102 ||
commentary:
atrāśakyatāyām apy upāyena pravṛttau dṛṣṭāntopadarśanena śakyatām āha.

kaṇṭakādyupaghātarakṣaṇārthaṃ pṛthvī chādayitum ucitā. na caitac chakyam, tāvataś carmaṇo 'bhāvāt, bhāve 'pi chādanasyāśakyatvāt. upāyena punaḥ śakyam. upānahaś carmaṇā kevalena sarvā bhūmiś chāditā bhavati.

root:
a ā i ī u ū e ai o au aṃ aḥ sthito hṛdi |
jñānamūrtir ahaṃ buddho buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām || 26 ||
commentary:
śrīvajramaṇḍālaṃkāratantre dvādaśatathāgatabhūmayaḥ paṭhyante ||

	samantaprabhā mahābhūmiḥ sūryamaṇḍalavac ca sā |
	amṛtaprabhā dvitīyā tu candravat suprabhāsvarā ||
	gaganaprabhā tṛtīyā tu gaganabhūmipratiṣṭhitā |
	vajraprabhā tu yā bhūmiś caturthī sā manoramā ||
	dṛḍhādhyāśayayogena vajreti parikalpyate |
	pañcamī ratnaprabhā nāma abhiṣeke pratiṣṭhitā ||
	ṣaṣṭhī padmaprabhā nāma padmavat suvirājate |
	svabhāvaśuddhadharmatvāt nirmalā niṣparigrahā ||
	saptamī karmaprabhā nāma buddhakarmakarī smṛtā |
	aṣṭamy anupamā nāma upamā tatra na vidyate ||
	navamī nirupamā nāma sarvopamāprativedhataḥ |
	daśamī prajñāprabhā nāma buddhabhūmīr anuttarā ||
	ekādaśī sarvajñatā mahābhūmiḥ prabhāsvarā |
	dvādaśī pratyātmavedyā tu yogijñānaprapūrikā || iti ||

etā dvādaśatathāgatbhūmayo 'kārādidvādaśasvaraiḥ pariniṣpannā veditavyāḥ ||
buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām ity atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānām | hṛdi sthito 'ham iti sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | jñānamūrtir iti jñānakāyasvabhāvatvāt | buddha iti yathāvasthitapadārthāvabodhāt ||

root:
bhavadbhaktyamṛtāsvādād bodhasya syāt parāpi yā |  
daśā sā māṃ prati svāminn āsavasyeva śuktatā || 11 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ saṃprajanyakāritāṃ śikṣayitum āha.

caturṇām īryāpathānām anyatamasminn īryāpathe. kāyenaivam iti sthitena niṣaṇṇena vā avastheyam iti. tadanantaraṃ svādhyāyādikriyām ārabhya punar antarāle vyavalokitavyaṃ kathaṃ kāyaḥ sthita iti tasminn everyāpathe, uta bhinne īryāpathe. bhinne punaḥ pūrvavad avasthāpyaḥ.

root:
atha bhagavaty āha | 
kathaṃ śiṣyo bhaved bhavyo yojitavyo ’tra tantrake |
nirviśaṅkaś ca kartavyaḥ kathaya tvaṃ mahāprabho || 3.1 ||
commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtayā | alasanimīlitalocanayā | alasaṃ yathā syāt tathā nimīlite locane yayā sā tathā tayā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pulakāvalilalitakapolam | pulakānāṃ āvaliḥ paṅktiḥ tayā lalitau manojñau kapolau yasya tam | vīthyālirāvaliḥ paṅktiḥ śreṇī rekhāstu rājayaḥ ityamaraḥ | punaḥ kimbhūtayā | śramajalasakalakalevarayā | śramajalaṃ svedaḥ sa eva sakale kalevare sarvāṅge yasyāḥ sā tathā tayā | kathambhūtaṃ tam | atilolaṃ cañcalaṃ taralam | kasmāt | varamadanamadāt | madanena varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ madanamadaśceti | tasmāt |

root:
yadi karmakṣayād duḥkhaṃ bhuktvā ca lakṣavatsaram |
mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate janma tatra vajreṇa bhidyate || 1.14 ||
commentary: tasyā iti || he megha vāntavṛṣṭir udgīrṇavarṣaḥ san | kṛtavamanaś ca vyajyate | tiktaiḥ sugandhibhis tiktarasavadbhiś ca || "tikto rase sugandhau ca" iti viśvaḥ || vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ surabhitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca | himavad vindhyamalayā gajānāṃ prabhavā iti vindhyasya gajaprabhavatvād iti bhāvaḥ | jambūkuñjaiḥ pratihatarayaṃ pratibaddhavegam | sukhapeyam ity arthaḥ | anena laghutvaṃ kaṣāyabhāvanā ca vyajyate | tasyā revāyās toyam ādāya gaccher vraja | he ghana megha, antaḥ sāro balaṃ yasya taṃ tvām anila ākāśavāyuḥ | śarīrasthaś ca gamyate | tulayituṃ na śakṣyati śakto na bhaviṣyati | tathā hi rikto 'ntaḥsāraśūnyaḥ sarvo 'pi laghur bhavati | prakampyo bhavatīty arthaḥ | pūrṇatā sāravattā gauravāyāprakampyatvāya bhavatīty arthaḥ | ayam atra dhvaniḥ—ādau vamanaśodhitasya puṃsaḥ paścāc chleṣmaśoṣaṇāya laghutiktakaṣāyāmbupānāl labdhabalasya vātaprakampo na syād iti | tathāha vāgbhaṭaḥ—"kaṣāyāś cāhimās tasya viśuddhau śleṣmaṇo hitāḥ | kimu tiktakaṣāyā vā ye nisargāt kaphāpahāḥ || kṛtaśuddheḥ kramāt pītapeyādeḥ pathyabhojinaḥ | vātādibhir na bādhā syād indriyair iva yoginaḥ ||" iti ||

root:
maddhitāya mamārthāya anukampāya me vibho |
māyājālābhisaṃbodher yathā lābhī bhavāmy aham || 7 ||
commentary: agrataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ san bhagavān vajradhara idam āha—maddhitāyetyādi | mahyaṃ hitaṃ maddhitaṃ hitam āyatipathyam āgāmiparṇāmatvāt || mamārthāya matprayojanāya me mama he vibho anukampāya anugrahāya yathā yena prakāreṇāhaṃ lābhī bhavāmi | kasyeti āha | māyājālābhisaṃbhodher iti | māyājālābhisaṃbodhir nāma kramas tasya yathāhaṃ lābhī bhavāmi tathā bhagavān prakāśayatv iti vakṣyamāṇena kriyāpadena saṃbandhaḥ ||

root:
kimarthaṃ niyamenaitad deśakair atha deśyate |
idaṃ tathāgatāśvāsadhiyā pūrvaṃ prakāsyate || SeNi 20 ||
commentary: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhīdaṃ deśyate | ata āha—kimartham ityādi | tathāgatasyāśvāsas tathāgatāśvāsaḥ | tathāgataś ca vairocanaḥ | tasyopalakṣaṇārthatvena ratnasambhavādigrahaṇād ratnasambhavāmitābhāmoghasiddhayo gṛhyante | teśām āśvāso 'kṣobhyamudritānāṃ vijñānīkaraṇam | taddhiyā tadbuddhyā ||

root:
prathamaṃ bhāvayen maitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ vibhāvayet |
tṛtīye bhāvayen muditām upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ || 4.3 ||
commentary: maitrī sarvasattveṣv ātmasnehabhāvanā | karuṇā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhair dharaṇābhilāṣabhāvanā | muditā sarvasattvānām aiśvaryādiṣu harṣacittabhāvanā | upekṣā viheṭhakāviheṭhakasattveṣu pratighānunayaparahitacittabhāvanā ||

root:
tyajati na pāṇitalena kapolam |
bālaśaśinamiva sāyamalolam ||
commentary: tathā sā rādhā alolam acañcalaṃ yathā bhavati tathā kapolaṃ na tyajati | kena | paṇitalena | kadā | sāyaṃkāle | kamiva | bālaśaśinamiva | bālaścāsau śaśī ceti | tamiva | samagraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇacandrānukāri bhavati | karatalapihitatadekadeśatvād bālacandreṇopamīyate |

root:
na hi tad vidyate kiṃcid yan na śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ |
na tad asti na yat puṇyam evaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ || 5.100 ||
commentary: adhyeṣaṇānantaraṃ prativacanam āha | atha śākyamunir ityādi | śākyakulānāṃ muniḥ kāyavākcittamaunayogān muniḥ | bhagavān saṃbuddha iti gatārthaḥ | dvipadottama iti dvipadā devamanuṣyāḥ | teṣām uttamaḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ | svajihvāṃ nirṇamayyopasaṃhṛtya svamukhād iti svamukha āyatām iti dīrghāṃ sphītām iti bahalatarāṃ śubhām iti dakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhanibhāṃ | sarvadharmālayāṃ ca ||

root:
evam anviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāram atra te |
adhunā vada kasmāt tvaṃ kāyam adyāpi rakṣasi || 5.64 ||
commentary: svapnendrajāletyādi. svapnendrajālopamaṃ pratibimbamāyāmarīcigandharvanagarodakacandropamam iti śabdaiḥ, anyaiś ca gaganapratiśrutkaphenopamam ityādiśabdair upamābhidheyair upamāvācakair naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitāt sādhyād anyat. paraṃ kathita eva sādhya ete śabdāḥ pravartanta iti svayaṃ boddhavyam.

root:
saśabdapātaṃ sahasā na pīṭhādīn vinikṣipet |
nāsphālayet kapāṭaṃ ca syān niḥśabdaruciḥ sadā || 5.72 ||
commentary:
ity api śikṣānarthavarjanāya kāryety āha.

sahasā tvaritam eva niṣprayojanaṃ hastadaṇḍādinā kapāṭaṃ ca nākoṭayet. saṃkṣepataḥ niḥśabdābhiratir bhavet ||

root:
māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||1.3||
commentary: pumvapuṣīti | prajñāsamparkonmukhe iti bhāvaḥ | hitaṃ tatkathanaṃ pañcākāreṇeti | nirmitādhārādheyaprapañcarūpeṇautpattikrameṇa ādikarmikāṇām etadvyātirekeṇa kathayitum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād   
valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya |  
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te  
barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ ||
commentary: manthānayogeneti devyāḥ padmasthitam ubhayakṣaraṇajātam ubhayabījaṃ janyajanakabījaṃ dhyātvā devadevībhedena vāmadakṣiṇakukṣibhedena ca tatpariṇataṃ dhyātvā devīpadmato nirgatam agre ājñāṃ prārthayantam | pūrvādisthāne tadavasthanāya niryuñjayed iti ||

root:
lābhā naśyantu me kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam |
naśyatv anyac ca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana || 5.22 ||
commentary:
atrāśakyatāyām apy upāyena pravṛttau dṛṣṭāntopadarśanena śakyatām āha.

kaṇṭakādyupaghātarakṣaṇārthaṃ pṛthvī chādayitum ucitā. na caitac chakyam, tāvataś carmaṇo 'bhāvāt, bhāve 'pi chādanasyāśakyatvāt. upāyena punaḥ śakyam. upānahaś carmaṇā kevalena sarvā bhūmiś chāditā bhavati.

root: tato guruḥ karṇe kathayet caturānandavibhāgam | tato bahir nirgacched guruḥ | prajñā tu nagnībhūyotkuṭakena guhyaṃ tarjanyā darśayati || 3.24 ||
commentary: he deva he hare tvaṃ jaya jaya | svaśaraṇāgatasakalajanaramaṇa tvaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatayā vartasva | he śritakamalākucamaṇḍala | śritamāśritaṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ kucamaṇḍalaṃ kucābhogaḥ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | he śritakamalākucamaṇḍala | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he dhṛtakuṇḍala | dhṛtaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he kalitalalitavanamāla | kalitā svīkṛtā lalitā manoharā vanamālā yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhane | he kalitalalitavanamāla | he hare he deva jaya jaya jayayukto bhava | sarvotkarṣeṇa vartasva |

root:
vasante vāsantīkusumasukumārairavayavairbhramantīṃ kāntāre bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām |
amandaṃ kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā valadbādhāṃ rādhāṃ sarasamidamūce sahacarī ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ |
sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayavajradhātvīśvarībhage vijahāra ||
anekaiś ca vajrayogivajrayoginīgaṇaiḥ । tadyathā । śvetācalena ca vajrayoginā । pītācalena ca vajrayoginā । raktācalena ca vajrayoginā । śyāmācalena ca vajrayoginā । mohavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । piśunavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । rāgavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । īrṣyāvajryā ca vajrayoginyā । evaṃ pramukhair yogiyoginīkoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ ||1.1||
commentary: etad anantaraṃ duḥsekam āha—cumbanetyādi | darśanam ārabhya ghṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad bāhyakriyā vicitram | bolakakkolayogāt prabhṛti śaśino maṇeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad āgamanaṃ ghṛṣṭis tatra vipākaḥ | ratne ruddhvā vakṣyamāṇasthānaṃ yāvad vilakṣaṇam iti ya evam āmananti te duḥsekasaṃvida iti | saṃśabdena tān upahasati ||

root:
yadā calitukāmaḥ syād vaktukāmo 'pi vā bhavet |
svacittaṃ pratyavekṣyādau kuryād dhairyeṇa yuktimat || 5.47 ||
commentary:
saṃkleśasamudācāre saṃprajanyakāritāṃ yadety ādibhiḥ saptabhiḥ ślokaiḥ śikṣayitum āha.

prathamata eva svacittaṃ nirūpya. uktam. asaṃkliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ karaṇīyam uktam.

root:
tanvi khinnamasūyayā hṛdayaṃ tavākalayāmi |
tanna vedmi kuto gatāsi na tena te 'nunayāmi ||
commentary:
syād etat—kim anyasminn asann api doṣa ucyate ity atrāha.

carmam ayaṃ puṭam. svamativiśeṣeṇa pṛthak kuru svakāyād apasāraya. asthighaṭitapañjarād yantrāt prajñātmakena śastreṇa māṃsakartanena.

root:
japās tapāṃsi sarvāṇi dīrghakālakṛtāny api |
anyacittena mandena vṛthaivety āha sarvavit || 5.16 ||
commentary:
dhyānaṃ tu cittaikāgratālakṣaṇaṃ cittādanyathā vaktumaśakyamity āha-

mantrādyāvartanalakṣaṇā vacanavyāpārā japāḥ. tapāṃsi ca indriyadamanalakṣaṇāḥ kāyikāḥ. tāny atibahukālam abhyastāny apy anyatra saktacittena middhādyupahatacittena vā, samānapāṭavavikalenety arthaḥ, vṛthaiva niṣphalam eva, atyarthakṛśaphalatvāt, abhimatārthe 'nupayogād vā. putro 'py aputra eva, putrakāryākaraṇād yathā. ity āha bhagavān sarvajñaḥ. tasmād dhyānapāramitāpi cittam eva.

root:
buddhāś ca bodhisattvāś ca sarvatrāvyāhatekṣaṇāḥ |
sarvam evāgratas teṣāṃ teṣām asmi puraḥ sthitaḥ || 5.31 ||
commentary: pariharati śāstram iti | yadaivāsya śāstrasyedaṃ prayojanam ity uktaṃ tadaiva tayor upāyopeyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho 'rthād ukta eva | na caivam arthaprāptam arthaṃ sūtrakārā akṣarair nibadhnanti asūtratvaprasaṅgād iti ||

root:
bhago 'syāstīti buddhasya bhagavānn iti kathyate |  
bhagāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur aiśvaryādiguṇākhilāḥ |  
athavā kleśādimārāṇāṃ bhañjanād bhagavānn iti || 15 ||
commentary:
buddhaḥ sa iti saṃbuddha ity arthaḥ. aiśvaryādayaś ca te guṇāś ca. akhilā iti samagrāḥ. tathā coktam 

	aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ |
	rūpasyārthaprayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhaga iti smṛtaḥ || iti. 

etasmin pakṣe bhagāsya santīti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ. uktaṃ paramārthasatyam.

root:
vilakṣaṇam ato yuktaṃ hanta boddhuṃ tṛtīyake |
svasaṃvitter bhavet siddhir āgamārtho 'pi saṅgataḥ || SeNi 4 ||
commentary:
asmād api saṃvegamanasikārāc cittasyānarthavivarjanena rakṣā vidhātavyety āha.

aticireṇa kālena labdham uktaṃ kṣaṇavaraṃ smaraṇena cetasi kṛtvā punaḥ punar antaraṃ sthirīkaromīdṛśam uktasvabhāvam. aprakampyaṃ kampayitum aśakyaṃ kāmādivitarkapavanaiḥ parvatarājavat.

evam etābhyāṃ śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhakābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ. tasmād avasthitam etat—cittaparikarmaiva bodhisattvaśikṣā iti. tena yad uktam—

	cittarakṣāvrataṃ muktvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ | (bodhi. 5.18)

iti, tat pariniṣṭhitam.

root:
vajraṃ padmaṃ tathā karma tathāgataṃ ratnam eva ca |  
kulāni pañcavidhāny āhur uttamāni mahākṛpa || 5 ||
commentary: pañcakulāni na jñāyanta iti tānyāha | pañcakulalakṣaṇānupalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaṃ kulamapekṣyāha—uttamānīti |

root:
na khāditavyam aśuci tvayā peyaṃ na śoṇitam |
nāntrāṇi cūṣitavyāni kiṃ kāyena kariṣyasi || 5.65 ||
commentary: kiṃviśiṣṭām ity āha || gambhīrārthām ityādi | gambhīraś cāsav arthaś ca gambhīrārthaḥ śūnyatārthaḥ sa yasyām asti sā gambhīrārthā | atas tām dhārayiṣyāmīti || udārārthām iti | udāraś cāsāv arthaś codārārtho vaipulyārtha iti yāvat | sa yasyāṃ vidyate sā udārārthā | tāṃ ca || mahārthām iti | mahān artho yasyāṃ sā mahārthā | mahārthatvaṃ punar niravaśeṣasattvārthatā sarvāsāparipūraṇatvāt | tāṃ ca || asamām iti | na vidyate samā yasyā sāsamā | asamatvaṃ kutaḥ | dharmadhātusvabhāvatvāt | tāṃ ca || śivām iti sarvaprapañcopaśamatvāt || ādimadhyāntakalyāṇīm iti | śrutacintābhāvanākāleṣu harṣaprītipraśrabdhilābhāt trikalyāṇinī | tāṃ dhārayiṣyāmi || nāmasaṃgītim uttamām iti gatārtham ||

root:
mahāprajñāyudhadharo mahākleśāṅkuśo 'graṇīḥ | 
mahāyaśā mahākīrtir mahājyotir mahādyutiḥ || 34 ||
commentary: he daivata iṣṭadeva | he vaidyakṛtya vaidyānāṃ kṛtyaṃ kāryaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasya sambodhanam | athavā | daivataṃ devavaidyayoḥ | tasya saṃbodhanam, he dhanvantare he upendra śrīkṛṣṇa vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si | niṣṭhuro 'si | yato vimuktabādhāṃ rādhāṃ na kuruṣe | kimbhūtām | smarāturām | smareṇa kandarpeṇa āturāṃ pīḍitām | kimbhūtām | tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyām | tava aṅgaṃ śarīraṃ tasya saṅgaḥ sa eva amṛtam | tanmātreṇa sādhyāṃ rakṣaṇīyām | vṛttamapi upendravajrā |

root:
kleśataskarasaṅgho 'yam avatāragaveṣakaḥ |
prāpyāvatāraṃ muṣṇāti hanti sadgatijīvitam || 5.28 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ punar evam ity uktam evārthaṃ spaṣṭayann āha.

taskarāś caurāḥ, teṣāṃ saṃghāto avatāragaveṣakaḥ piśācavad avatāramārgaprekṣī, chidrānveṣaṇatatpara ityarthaḥ. prāpyāvatāraṃ praveśamārgam āsādya muṣṇāti. tato hanti śobhanagataye jīvitapratilambhaṃ kuśalapātheyābhāvāt.

root:
atha bhagavān kṛṣṇācalo gāḍhena bhagavatīṃ dveṣavajrīṃ cumbayitvā samāliṅgya cāmantrayate sma |
devi devi mahāramyaṃ rahasyaṃ cātidurlabham |
sārāt sārataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ subhāṣitam || 1.6 ||
commentary: ākāśasaṃkāśam iti ākāśaṃ pratighadravyābhāvamātram | tena saṃkāśaṃ sadṛśaṃ niśceṣṭībhūya nirālambarūpeṇa katipayakṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhed ity arthaḥ | tatas tadanantarajhaṭity ātmānaṃ māṃsāsthirudhirādivarjitaṃ śubharaśmipuṅgam iva karacaraṇād yupetaṃ khaḍgapāśādirahitaṃ sattvaparyaṅkiṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadharaṃ samādhimudrārpitapāṇipadmam | athavā svabhāvaprajñāṅgasaṅginaṃ śvetapadmacandramaṇḍalāsanam antarīkṣasthitam anantākāśamaṇḍale bhāvayet ||

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ prāptarāmā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhādhamaṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanādau prayatno
buddhoddiṣṭo niṣphalaḥ saṃprasaktaḥ || 16 ||
commentary: dhairyeti antarāntarā vajracālanaviśrāmeṇa paramānandasukhaṃ bhāvayed ity arthaḥ ||

root:
sarvasminn apratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāmudreti kīrtyate |
vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter vicitrāder na sambhavaḥ || SeNi 29 ||
commentary: nimittāny api te śubhāni dṛśyanta ity āha-mandaṃ mandam iti || anukūlaḥ pavano vāyustvāṃ manda mandam | atimandam ity arthaḥ || atra kathañcid vīpsāyām eva dviruktir nirvāhyā | "prakāre guṇavacanasya" ity etad āśrayaṇe tu karmadhārayavad bhāve subluki mandamandam iti syāt | tad evāha vāmanaḥ-"mandamandam ity atra prakārārthe dvirbhāvaḥ" iti | yathā sadṛśam | bhāviphalānurūpam ity arthaḥ || "yathā | sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsārthānatikrame" iti yādavaḥ || nudati prerayati | ayaṃ sagandhaḥ sagarvaḥ | sambandhīti kecit || "gandho gandhaka āmode leśe sambandhagarvayoḥ" ity ubhayatrāpi viśvaḥ || te tava vāmo vāmabhāgasthaḥ || "vāmas tu vakre ramye syāt savye vāmagate 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaś ca madhuraṃ śrāvyaṃ nadati vyāharati || idaṃ nimittadvayaṃ vartate | vartiṣyate cāparaṃ nimittam ity āha—garbheti || garbhaḥ kukṣistho jantuḥ || "garbhopakārake hy agnau sukhe panasakaṇṭake | kukṣau kukṣisthajantau ca" iti yādavaḥ || tasyādhānam utpādanaṃ tad eva kṣaṇa utsavaḥ | sukhahetutvād iti bhāvaḥ || "nirvyāpārasthitau kālaviśeṣotsavayoḥ kṣaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmin paricayād abhyāsād dhetoḥ khe vyomni | ābaddhamālāḥ || garbhādhānasukhārthaṃ tvatsamīpe baddhapaṅktaya ity arthaḥ || uktaṃ ca karṇodaye-"garbhaṃ balākā dadhate 'bhrayogān nāke nibaddhāvalayaḥ samantāt" iti || balākā balākāṅganā nayanasubhagaṃ dṛṣṭipriyaṃ bhavantaṃ nūnaṃ satyaṃ seviṣyante || anukūlamārutacātakaśabditabalākādarśanānāṃ śubhasūcakatvaṃ śakunaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ tadvistarabhayān nālekhi ||

root:
niṣphalā netravikṣepā na kartavyāḥ kadācana |
nidhyāyantīva satataṃ kāryā dṛṣṭir adhogatā || 5.35 ||
commentary:
idam eva vyanakti.

īṣanmukulitapakṣmayugalā nāsāgraviniveśitā yugamātravyavalokinī vā kāryā dṛṣṭiḥ.

root:
kleśataskarasaṅgho 'yam avatāragaveṣakaḥ |
prāpyāvatāraṃ muṣṇāti hanti sadgatijīvitam || 5.28 ||
commentary: ratneti || ratnacchāyānāṃ padmarāgādimaṇiprabhāṇāṃ vyatikaro miśraṇam iva prekṣyaṃ darśanīyam ākhaṇḍalasyendrasyaitad dhanuḥkhaṇḍam || etad iti hastena nirdeśo vivakṣitaḥ | purastād agre valmīkāgrād vāmalūravivarāt || "vāmalūraś ca nākuś ca valmīkaṃ puṃnapuṃsakam" ity amaraḥ || prabhavaty āvirbhavati | yena dhanuḥkhaṇḍena te tava śyāmaṃ vapuḥ | sphuritarucinojvalakāntinā barheṇa picchena || "picchabarhe napuṃsake" ity amaraḥ || gopaveṣasya viṣṇor gopālasya kṛṣṇasya śyāmaṃ vapur iva | atitarāṃ kāntiṃ śobhām āpatsyate prāpsyate ||

root:
teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ  
gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā |  
tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yasmāt  
sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi ||
commentary: teṣām iti || dikṣu prathitaṃ prasiddhaṃ vidiśeti lakṣaṇaṃ nāmadheyaṃ yasyās tām || "lakṣaṇaṃ nāmni cinhe ca" iti viśvaḥ || teṣāṃ darśāṇānāṃ sambandhinīṃ | dhīyante 'syām iti dhānī || "karaṇādh ikaraṇayoś ca" iti lyuṭ || rājñāṃ dhānī rājadhānī || "kṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī samasyate" iti vaktavyāt samāsaḥ || tāṃ pradhānanagarīm || "pradhānanagarī rājñāṃ rājadhānīti kathyate" iti śabdārṇave || gatvā prāpya sadyaḥ kāmukatvasya vilāsitāyāḥ || "vilāsī kāmukaḥ kāmī strīparo ratilampaṭaḥ" iti śabdārṇave || avikalaṃ samagraṃ phalaṃ prayojanaṃ labdhā lapsyate | tvayeti śeṣaḥ || karmaṇi luṭ || kutaḥ | yasmāt kāraṇāt svādu madhuram | calā ūrmayo yasya tac calormi taraṅgitaṃ vetravatyā nāma nadyāḥ payaḥ sabhrūbhaṅga bhrūkuṭiyuktam | daśanapīḍayeti bhāvaḥ | mukham ivādharam ivety arthaḥ | tīropānte taṭaprānte yat stanitaṃ garjitaṃ tena subhagaṃ yathā tathā stanitaśabdena bhaṇitam api vyapadiśyate | "ūrdhvam uccalitakaṇṭhanāsikaṃ huṅkṛtaṃ stanitam alpaghoṣavat" iti lakṣaṇāt || pāsyasi | pibater ḷṭ || "kāminām adharāsvādaḥ suratād atiricyate" iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
śastrāṇi kena narake ghaṭitāni prayatnataḥ |
taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāś ca tāḥ striyaḥ || 5.7 ||
commentary: vastrādīty ādiśabdena puṣpadūrvādinirmitam ||

root:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād dṛḍhāśayaḥ | 
yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ nātha sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛk || 14 ||
commentary:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād nirvāṇaṃ yāvat | kiṃbhūto dṛḍhāśayaḥ | ḍṛḍho 'vicala āśayo 'bhiprāyo yasyāsau dṛḍhāśaya iti || anetaitad uktaṃ bhavati | tryadhvavartibhis tathāgatair yā bhāṣitā sā nāmasaṃgītiḥ | ato 'sya dharmaparyāyasyākāśatulyatāṃ saṃdarśayati | tathā coktaṃ |
utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti pradarśitaṃ bhavatīti || 
yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ ityādi | he nātha yathā sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛg bhavāmy ahaṃ tathā prakāśayatv iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ | dhṛg ity ayaṃ śuddhapāṭhaḥ ||

root:
vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam ityādi susthitaṃ katham |
maṇyantargatam ityādi sadguroḥ suṣṭhu saṅgatam || SeNi 23 ||
commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
yato nivāryate yatra yad eva ca niyujyate |
tal lokacittarakṣārthaṃ śikṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā samācaret || 5.107 ||
commentary:
tat kiṃ sarvathaiva niravakāśo 'yaṃ kartavyaḥ? nety āha.

vetanaṃ karmamūlyam. tāvanmātraṃ datvā asmai gatvaraśarīrāya, karmopakaraṇatvāt, svaprayojanam anuvidheyaṃ he manaḥ. anenaivopārjitaṃ kasmād asmai na dīyate iti cet, na hi yasmāt yatkiṃcit karmakareṇopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai karmakarāya pradīyate iti nyāyo 'sti.

root:
raviṃ raṃkārajātaṃ ca tadūrdhvaṃ hūṃkṛtiṃ punaḥ |
tajjam akṣobhyakaṃ dhyāyān māmakyā saha sampuṭam || 4.14 ||
commentary: ye tu madhyasthā guṇadoṣanirūpaṇena doṣavantam apahāya guṇavantam upādadate tān prati parīkṣāviśeṣārtham arthayate na cātreti | madīye prabandhe 'smin guṇadoṣavati yugapad guṇadoṣau nirūpayantu bhavantaḥ | anyathā guṇānupekṣya doṣeṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu doṣanirbhāvanaikamanasām asanto doṣāḥ prakāśeran iti ||

root:
candanacarcitanīlakalevarapītavasanavanamālī |
kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī ||
commentary: punar api saṃvṛtisatyam āśu sambhāropacayārtham āha—jananītyādi. jananyādiśabdaiḥ prajñāmātram uktam, nāvaśyaṃ bāhyā viśeṣā iti saṃkṣepaḥ. jagajjanam ity āryalokam, anyeṣāṃ niśceṣṭatvāt. vibhāgam iti jñeyanānātvam.

root:
āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailam  
vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu |  
kāle kāle bhavati bhavato yasya saṃyogam etya  
snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam ||
commentary:
evaṃ mayetyādyāha saṅgītikāraḥ | nidānavākyaṃ etat | yasmāt saṅgītikāreṇa sūtratantrādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ | bhagavato vacanāt | tathā ca | evaṃ mayā śrutam iti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgātavyam ityādi | evaṃ sati | 

śraddhāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstā parṣac ca sākṣiṇi | 
deśakālau ca nirdiṣṭau svaprāmāṇyaprasiddhaye || iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati ||

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā | 
vajrasattva iti | vajram abhedyaṃ sattvam arthakriyākāritvam asyeti | athavā vajra iva vajraḥ sa cāsau sattvaḥ prāṇī ceti | sarvetyādi | sarve ca te tathāgatāś ca teṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ jīvaccharīra tasya hṛdayam atyantābhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | tad eva vajradhātvīśvarībhagam ||

vajro liṅgaṃ tasya dhātuḥ sāṃvṛtavivṛtatvalakṣaṇaḥ | bodhicittaṃ tasyeśvarī vā prajñā vajradhātunā sevitatvāt tasyāḥ | tadvarāṅge bhage vijahāreti | vihṛtavān vajrapadmasaṃyogena sampuṭayogena sthitavān ity arthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vihāraḥ prākṛtajanasyāpy atyantagupto bhavati kiṃ punar bhagavato vajrasattvasya | tataś cārthād uktaṃ bhavati | sumerugirimūrdhnivajrasatvabhūmau vajramaṇiśikharakūṭāgāre viharati smeti | etena śāstrā kālo deśaś coktaḥ ||

parṣadaṃ vaktum āha | anekaiścetyādi | vajrayoginaḥ | śvetācalādayaḥ | vajrayoginyo mohavajryādayaḥ | teṣām tāsāṃ ca gaṇāḥ samūhā ekarasāktāḥ bahuvacanaṃ tv ekavacanasyāpi pañcatathāgatātmatvāt ||

tadyathetyupadarśane | śvetācaleneti bhagavato bhagavatīdehagatarūpajñānena | evaṃ pītācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatagandhajñānena | raktācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatarasajñānena | śyāmācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatasparśajñānenana || 

mohavajryā ceti | bhagavatyo bhagavaddehagatarūpajñānena | piśunavajryā ceti bhagaddehagatagandhajñānena | rāgavajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatarasajñānena | īrṣyāvajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatasparśajñānena | svayaṃ tu bhagavān bhagavatīdehagataśabdajñāne rūpaḥ | bhagavatī tu bhagavaddehegataśabdajñānarūpā ato naitat prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

evaṃ pramukhair iti | evaṃprakāraiḥ | cakṣuṣā ghrāṇena rasanayā kāyena śrotreṇa rūpeṇa vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskāreṇa vijñānena pṛthivyā jalena tejasā vāyūnā ākāśena ityādibhir ityarthaḥ | etenaivamvidhe vihāre parṣaddevyopyetāddṛśyo bodhicitte tu kathitaṃ bhavati ||

root:
tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
ubhe styānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja || SeNi 17 ||
commentary: itthaṃ praviṣṭasyedānīṃ sarvābhiniveśatyāgam āha—tyajetyādi | subodham ||

root:
tatreyaṃ triśaraṇagāthā | 
buddhaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ |
dharmaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ saṃghaṃ cāvetyaśraddhayā || 3.4 ||
commentary: tatreyam ityādikaṃ nirdeśaḥ ||

root:
ācāro bodhisattvānām aprameya udāhṛtaḥ |
cittaśodhanam ācāraṃ niyataṃ tāvad ācaret || 5.97 ||
commentary:
idam aparam abhisaṃkṣipya kathayann āha.

ācāraḥ śikṣaṇīyam. aprameyaḥ asaṃkhyeyaḥ bodhisattvaprātimokśādiṣu pradarśitaḥ. tatsaṃgraharūpaṃ prathamataḥ cittaśodhanam eva ācāram ācaret. niyatam avaśyaṃtayā.

root:
ratnaṃ caṇḍālinī jñeyā pañcamudrā viniścitā |  
tathāgatānāṃ kulaṃ caitat saṃkṣepeṇābhidhīyate || 7 ||
commentary:
kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

root:
jaladapaṭalavaladinduvinindakacandanatilakalalāṭam |
pīnapayodharaparisaramardananirdayahṛdayakapāṭam ||
commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtam | jaladapaṭalavaladinduvinindakacandanatilakalalāṭam | jalaṃ dadatīti jaladā meghāḥ | teṣāṃ paṭalaṃ samūhaḥ tatra valat prakaṭībhavat yo 'sāvinduścandraḥ tasya vinindakastiraskartā candanasya tilako lalāṭe yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pīnapayodharaparisaramardananirdayahṛdayakapāṭam | pīnāḥ pīvarāśca te payodharāśceti teṣāṃ parisarā nikaṭapradeśāḥ teṣāṃ mardanaṃ nirdeyaṃ dayārahitaṃ hṛdayakapāṭaṃ yasya sa tathā tam |

root:
yuktaṃ gṛdhraśṛgālāder āhārārthaṃ tu rakṣitum |
karmopakaraṇaṃ tv etan manuṣyāṇāṃ śarīrakam || 5.66 ||
commentary: nanu sannikṛṣṭārthagocaram eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam | ataḥ prasiddheḥ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthatvaṃ guṇaḥ na doṣāya ata āha na ceti | na ca pratyakṣādīni parityajya loko nāma pramāṇagaṇe pramāṇam upasaṃkhyāyate | varṇavivekasambandhāvadhāraṇayos tu pratyakṣādipramāṇatvaṃ vanasambandhaparihārayor abhidhāsyāma iti | api ca bhaved api prasiddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vyavasthitaiva prasiddhiḥ syāt | sā tv avyavasthitā | tathā hi saṃsāramocakā nāma nāstikā bāhyahiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ | anye tu tapaḥ prajāpatyādi pīḍātmakatvāt parapīḍāvat adharma ....... stu vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakau tadviparītau dharmādharmau saṅgirante | tad evaṃ mlecchāryāṇāṃ parasparavigānān na lokaprasiddhatvaṃ dharmādharmayor upapadyata ity āha saṃsāreti sārdhena ||

root:
mlecchanivahanidhane kalayasi karavālaṃ 
dhūmaketumiva kimapi karālam |
keśava dhṛtakalkiśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: yauvanayuktām mām upekṣya niṣphalaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ | ayam abhiprāyaḥ | śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ hi mahāsukhajñānaṃ nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyadvayavyatirekeṇopalabhyate | nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyau tu bhujamukhasaṃsthānamayau strīpuruṣarūpau tau ca bhāvanālabhyau | bhāvanā ca yuvativyatirekeṇa na bhavati | anyathā vikṣiptacittatvād iti yata evaṃ tasmāc chūnyasvabhāvaṃ viśeṣeṇa garhitvā nindatvā kuru tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ ghṛṣṭim āliṅganacumbanādikam ity arthaḥ |

root:
nindasi yajñavidherahaha śrutijātaṃ 
sadayahṛdayadarśitapaśughātam |
keśava dhṛtabuddhaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtabuddhaśarīra | dhṛtaṃ buddhasya śarīraṃ yena tasya saṃbodhanam | he dhṛtabuddhaśarīra | tvaṃ śrutijātaṃ vedārthatattvaṃ nindasi | kasya | yajñavidheḥ yajñānāṃ vidhirvidhānaṃ tasya | kiṃbhūtam | darśitapaśughātam | darśitaḥ paśughāto māraṇaṃ yena tattathā tat | athavā kiṃbhūtaṃ śrutijātam | sadayahṛdayadarśitapaśughātam | sadayahṛdayā brāhmaṇāḥ teṣāṃ darśitaḥ paśughāto māraṇaṃ yena tattathā tat | kathaṃ nindasi | ahaheti khede | gavādipaśughātaṃ dhigiti | tasya saṃbodhane | bauddhāgamaśāstre ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti nyāyāt |

root:
imāṃ ṣaṇmantrarājānasaṃyuktām advayodayām |
anutpādadharmiṇīṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate sma girāṃ pateḥ || 25 ||
commentary: imāṃ dvādaśatathāgatabhūmyupalakṣitāṃ gāthāṃ girāṃ pater bhāṣate smeti saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃbhūtāṃ ṣaṇmantrarājānasaṃyuktām iti vakṣyamāṇaṣaṇmantropetām || kimātmikām advayodayām iti | dvayaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca | tan na vidyate yasya tad advayaṃ | udety asmād ity udayaḥ | advayasyodayo 'dvayodayaḥ | sa vidyate yasyā gāthāyāṃ sādvayodayā tāṃ bhāṣate sma || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭām | anutpādadharmiṇīṃ iti dharmadhātusvabhāvāṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvām ity arthaḥ ||

root:
śvasitavapanamanupamapariṇāham |
madanadahanamiva vahati sadāham ||
commentary: sā rādhikā sadāhaṃ yathā bhavati tathā śvasitaṃ pavanaṃ vahati | śvasitameva pavanastam | kamiva | madanadahanamiva | kāmāgnimiva | kimbhūtam | anupamapariṇāhaṃ na vidyate upamā dṛṣṭānto yasya sa tathā anupamaḥ pariṇāho viśālatā yasya sa tathā |

root:
atha vajradhara śrīmān durdāntadamakaḥ paraḥ |
trilokavijayī vīro guhyarāṭ kuliśeśvaraḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
prathamārambhiṇaḥ saṃtatābhyāsena kleśasya parihārārtham āha.

dṛṣṭicittaparikhedaparityāgāya kadācit karhicit diśo vyavalokayet. atha kadācit kaścit tatsamīpam āgacchet, tadā tasya praticchāyāmātraṃ viditvā svāgatavādena saṃtoṣaṇārthaṃ vilokayet. anyathā tatra tasyāvadhyānenākuśalaṃ prasavet.

root:
tasmādabhāvavaktṛsthau dharmādharmau na śaktuyāt |
codanā cet samuddhartuṃ grastau tenaiva paśyatām || 8 ||
commentary: ataḥ sakalabhāvapramāṇanirākaraṇāt śaṅkitābhāvanirākaraṇena codanaiva dharmādharmayoḥ pramāṇamityupapannamityāha tasmāditi | paśyatāmiti | ṣaṣṭhī cānādare ityanādare ṣaṣṭhīti ||

root:
yenājātaṃ jagad buddhaṃ buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhataḥ |
nijaṃ tasya jagat satyam anābhogena dhīmataḥ || SeNi 34 ||
commentary: punar api saṃvṛtisatyam āśu sambhāropacayārtham āha—jananītyādi. jananyādiśabdaiḥ prajñāmātram uktam, nāvaśyaṃ bāhyā viśeṣā iti saṃkṣepaḥ. jagajjanam ity āryalokam, anyeṣāṃ niśceṣṭatvāt. vibhāgam iti jñeyanānātvam.

root:
māṃ na jānanti yā nāryaḥ sarvastrīdehasaṃsthitām |
tāsām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitā ||1.5||
commentary: bhaktyānandarasaḥ samāveśānandaprasarastenāplutāḥ ārdrāśayāḥ | ata eva tādṛśā iti aparimitānandarasasamudratvāt tvadrūpasarūpāḥ tava tattvaṃ jānanti | yo hi yatra vidvān sa hi tadvettyeva |

root:
mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā mahāvajradharo ghanaḥ |
mahākrūro mahāraudro mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ || 40 ||
commentary: mahābhavetyādi | tatra mahābhavādrisaṃbhetteti mahāsthāmaprāptaḥ | bhavaḥ paṇcopādānaskandhāḥ | ta evādrir ajñānaśailatvāt | tasya samyagaviparītajñānalābhād bhañjanaśīlaḥ saṃbhettā | mahāṃś cāsau bhavādrisaṃbhettā ca mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā || mahāvajradharo ghana iti sarvāpāyañjahaḥ | mahāvajraṃ samantabhadrajñānaṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāvajradharaḥ | nibiḍatvān mūrtimattvāc ca ghanaḥ || mahākrūro mahāraudra iti sarvaśokatamonirghātamatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau krūraś ca mahākrūraḥ | durdāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākrodharūpasaṃdarśanāt | mahāraudra iti | śānto 'py asau bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ sattvavinayavaśād raudratām api darśayatīti || mahābhayabhayaṃkara iti jālinīprabhaḥ | mahābhayo mahābhairavarūpadhārī śaṃkara iti | tasyāpi bhayaṃ karotīti mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ ||

root:
vācaḥ pallavayatyumāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ girāṃ jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||
commentary: kathaṃ punar upadeśo dharme pramāṇam ata āha autpattiketi | bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hy aprāmāṇyam | tatra sambandhautpattikatvapratipādanena taddvārā puruṣānupraveśābhāvāt puruṣāśrayatvāc ca śabde doṣāṇāṃ kāraṇadoṣanivāraṇaṃ tāvat kṛtam | tannirākaraṇena sahāprāmāṇyam anapoditam ity avyatirekapadaprayojanam āha abādha iti | avyatirekapadenābādhaḥ pratipādyate na hi deśakālayor ubhayor api codanājanitaṃ jñānaṃ viparyetīti | tad evaṃ bādhakāraṇadoṣanirākaraṇe kṛte 'napoditam autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyam iti tat pramāṇam ity anenoktam iti darśayati svata iti ||

root:
aviralanipatitamadanaśarādiva bhavadavanāya viśālam |
svahṛdayamarmaṇi varma karoti sajalanalinīdalajālam ||
commentary: sā sajalanalinīdalajālaṃ varma kavacaṃ karoti | jalena saha vartamānāni sajalāni ca tāni nalinīdalāni ceti karmadhārayaḥ samāsaḥ | teṣāṃ jālaṃ samūhaḥ yatra tat | kasmin | svahṛdayamarmaṇi | svahṛdayameva marma jīvanasthānam | tasmin | kimbhūtam | śavilaṃ vistīrṇam | kasmai | bhavadavanāya | tādarthye caturthī | bhavato 'vanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tasmai | bhayahetumāha | kasmāt | aviralanipatitamadanaśarāt | aviralo nipatito madanaśarastasmāt | anena kimuktam | prayojanamāha | saṃtāpayuktāpi rādhikā svahṛdayasthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ satataṃ paśyati jānātītyarthaḥ |

root:
mudrā pañcakulānīti kathyate mokṣahetunā |  
vajreṇa mudryate 'neneti mudrā tenābhidhīyate || 4 ||
commentary: mudryate yeneti lakṣyate yataḥ.

root:
adaridraṃ jagat kṛtvā dānapāramitā yadi |
jagaddaridram adyāpi sā kathaṃ pūrvatāyinām || 5.9 ||
commentary:
syād etat—dānapāramitādiṣu katham iva cittaṃ pradhānam? sā hi sarvasattvānāṃ dāridryāpanayanalakṣaṇety āha.

dāridryaṃ hi nāma sāsravasukhabhogabubhukṣayā cittakārpaṇyam upakaraṇavaikalyaṃ vā. tad apanīya jagato yadi dānapāramitāparipūrir bhavatīty ucyate, tadā sā katham? na kathaṃcid api pūrvatāyināṃ pūrvam abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yujyate. kutaḥ? jagaddaridram adyāpi, nādyāpi yāvaj jagaddāridyam upaśāmyati.

root:
pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair  
nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ |  
tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ  
sampatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

root: tata evaṃ vadet | adyāhaṃ te buddhajñānam utpādayāmi yenātītānāgatā pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto ’pratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ prāptāḥ | kiṃtu na tvayedam adṛṣṭamaṇḍalapurato vaktavyaṃ ||
commentary:
catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti namaskārahetur uktaḥ | tatra ke te catuḥkṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśī ca tatparipāṭiḥ | ata āha—citram ityādi |

nanu tantroktakramam ullaṅghya kim iti tṛtīye vilakṣaṇam iṣyate | tadartham āha—haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ | tatrāyaṃ haṭhayogaḥ—vicitraṃ vividhaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvād āliṅganādau | vipākas tadviparīto 'vicitro grāhyābhāvāt sukho jñānabhogo ghṛṣṭau | vimardo nirvikalpaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaṃ ratnaṃ vyāpyāgraṃ yāvat | anyad vilakṣaṇaṃ rāgavarjitaṃ nirbharasukhābhāvāt | arāgavarjitaṃ sukhānubhavasmaraṇena virāgābhāvāt pāte | yad uktam—

   vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam |
   vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam ||
   vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
   vilakṣaṇaṃ tribhyo 'nyad rāgārāgavivarjitam || 

iti | idaṃ nirākāravādimatena ratnānubhūtaṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganāyamānaṃ samatalaṃ sātasaṃvinmātraṃ sarvanīlādyākāracakrakalaṅkāpagamād avatiṣṭhate | ākārabādhakaṃ tv ekānekaviyogādipramāṇaṃ vistarabhayān na vipañcitam | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmān nārtheṣu na jñāne sthūlābhāsas tadātmanaḥ |
   ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ ||
   paricchedo 'ntaranyo 'yaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ |
   jñānasyābhedino bhedapratibhāso hy upaplavaḥ || 

iti | idam eva dharmakāyaḥ | tatpṛṣṭhe maṇḍalacakrādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ sambhogaḥ | bhūtabhautikaḥ śākyamunyādyākāro nirmāṇam | eṣām ekasvabhāvatā svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | evaṃ vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | yad uktam—"rūpakāyau tu paścimau"  iti |

"tāvad bhāvayed yāvad anupalabdhikaṃ kuryād" ity ukte etad eva dṛṣṭāntalakṣitaṃ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvyamāno maṇḍalacakrādyākāro niṣpādayiṣyati, pūrvapraṇidhānavaśāt sambhoganirmāṇakāyāv iti |

yadvā sātam idam anubhūtaṃ sādarādibhāvanayā sphuṭatāṃ svayam eṣyati | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad evātibhāvyate |
   bhāvanābalaniṣpattau tat sphuṭākalpadhīphalam || 

iti | atrāpi pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśād rūpakāyadvayam | ayam eva ca praveśopāyaḥ | yad uktam—

   maṇḍalacakrādyupāyena svādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa ca | 

iti | madhyamārthatayā cedam evodghuṣyate |

   anucchedāt svasaṃvitter nīlādīnām abhāsanāt |
   nimittānām anutpādān madhyamā pratipan matā || 

iti | atra nimittānutpādo 'bhiniveśābhāvo vivakṣitaḥ | tena sadasadādyabhiniveśābhāvāc catuḥkoṭirahitatvam | caturthatāpy atra "caturthaṃ tatpunas tathā" iti vacanāt | tat prajñājñāne 'nubhūtaṃ nirākāravedanaṃ punar iti nīlādyākāracakramalāpagame tatheti prajñājñānam iva boddhavyam ||

sākāravādinas tu nirākāraṃ jñānaṃ svapne 'pi nānubhūyata iti vadanti | tad āhuḥ—

   nākāracakram avadhūya dhiyo 'sti vṛttis
   tadbādhane balini madhyanaye jayaśrīḥ |
   no ced anindyam idam advayam eva citraṃ
   ceto nirākṛtimatasya tu ko 'vakāśaḥ || 

iti | na caivaṃ mantavyam—ākāraprakāśābhāvād ākāraḥ prāṅ nāstīti | tanniścayābhāve 'py aśakyāpahnavasyānubhūyamānasya pṛṣṭollekhaniścīyamānasya ca nīlādivedanasya bhāvāt | yad āhuḥ—
 
	yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaivānubhūyate |
	iti nāmaikabhāvaḥ syāc citrākārasya cetasi || 

iti | tataś citrādvaitavedanam eva param asti | atrāpi ca granthavistarabhayāt sādhakabādhakapramāṇacintā na kṛtā | etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitatayā madhyamārthenāpi ghaṭayanti | tathā coktam—

	nāsat prakāśavapuṣā na ca sat tadanyair
		ekena na dvitayam advitayaṃ na tābhyām |
	ittathaṃ jagad yadi catuḥśikharīvimuktaṃ 
		ko bhāṣyakāramatamadhyamayor viśeṣaḥ || 

iti | vyāvṛttikṛtabhedena sambhogābhinno 'pi vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | lakṣaṇabhūtaṃ prajñājñānaṃ tathaivābhyasyamānaṃ punaḥśabdavācyaṃ sac caturthaṃ saptāṅgayuktaṃ sādhyaṃ syāt | tatra saptāṅgāni—sambhogaṃ vitteḥ | sampuṭaṃ samāpatteḥ | mahāsukhaṃ sātarūpatayā | niḥsvabhāvaṃ kalpitavirahāt | kāruṇyanirbharaṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśena sambhogādinā sattvārthakaraṇāt | nirantaraṃ madhye 'ntarābhāvāt | nirnirodhaṃ pravāhānucchedāt | tad uktam | 

	sambhogasampuṭamahāsukhaniḥsvabhāva-
		kāruṇyanirbharanirantaranirnirodhaiḥ | 
	aṅgair mameṣṭam iha saptabhir eva yuktaṃ
		sādhyaṃ pramāṇaparibhāvitabuddhiśastam || 

iti | yad vālam anena saptāṅgayoginā sādhanena | aniyama evātra | yato nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bhāvyamānaṃ buddhatvahetuḥ | atha cātra saptāṅgayogi sādhanaṃ na bhavati | sampuṭābhāvāt | tad uktam—

	sādhyaṃ saptāṅgasaṃyuktaṃ tad eva yadi sādhanam | 
	nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bodhaye kiṃ na sammatam || 

iti | athaivaṃ matir yat tatrāpi khaṭvāṅgopāyasampuṭatvam asti | yad uktam—

	khaṭvāṅgasampuṭā devī sambhogādisamānvitā |
	nairātmyāyoginī hanta bodhaye kiṃ na sādhanam || 

iti | tad apy asundaram | pāramitānaye 'pi vivakṣitasākṣāt sampuṭābhāve 'pi prajñopāyātmakabodhicittasampuṭasambhavena mantranayasyeva saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgāt |

	viśiṣṭaṃ sampuṭaṃ hitvā anyathā yadi kalpyate |
	śūnyatetarasāmpuṭyāt prasaṅgaḥ syān nayāntare || 

athātra sādhane saptāṅgayuktāsty eva | yataḥ—

	stanau hṛtvā bhaved bolaṃ kakkolamadhyasaṃsthitam ||
	tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet | 

iti | tad apy apeśalam | yataḥ siddhyavasthāyām idaṃ sarvaṃ na sādhanāvasthāyām | atas tathāvidhasādhanābhāve 'pi saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ pāramitānaye 'pi durnivāraḥ |

	prāg asampuṭatā bhāvyā niṣpattau sā bhaviṣyati |
	etat sammatam asmākaṃ sādhanaṃ punar anyathā ||

iti | etad eva cānye māyopamādvaitam iti varṇayanti | yathā svapnānubhūtakāminīratisaṃvedanaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyaparasvapnasaṃvedanenānubhūyamānaṃ nātyantocchedena mṛṣānubhūteḥ | nāpi saj jāgraddaśopalabdhārthakriyākārisvaparavedyavastuvad avisaṃvādābhāvāt | tadāhuḥ—

	svapnāt svapnaṃ yadaiva syāc ciccitrālīkatā tadā |
	naiva satyam asadvitter na cocchedaḥ prakāśataḥ || 

iti | tathaitad api viśvaṃ nātyantocchedenālīkaṃ vitteḥ | nāpi paramārthasat "sadasator utpādāyogād" ityādinā pratītyasamutpannatvenādhyavasitasya paramārthato 'tyantājātatvenānutpannasya sattvāyogāt | yathoktam—

	yat pratītyasamutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ | 
	yat svabhāvena notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham || 

atrāpi ca caturthatvadharmakāyādiyuktatvavyavasthā pūrvavad eva boddhavyā ||

root:
bhayotsavādisaṃbandhe yady aśakto yathāsukham |
dānakāle tu śīlasya yasmād uktam upekṣaṇam || 5.42 ||
commentary:
samādhānaparityāgāvakāśam āha.

agnidāhādi bhayam. tathā ratnatrayapūjādikṛta utsavaḥ. samadhikataraḥ sattvārthādir vā. tatsaṃbhave yadi sthātum aśaktaḥ, tadā kāmacāra ity anujñātam, sāpattiko na bhavatīty arthaḥ. kutaḥ punar ayam aniyamo labhyata ity āha—dānetyādi | śīlaṃ yady api dānāt prakṛṣṭam, tathāpy avaraśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya tadanantaram eva uttaraśikṣāvasthitasyābhyāsapāṭavābhāvāt kathaṃcit tāvatkālaṃ tato nivartamānasyāpi nāpattiḥ. dānasyāsau kālo na śīlasya. ata evoktam—yady aśakta iti. etāvanmātreṇedam udāharaṇam. yathoktam—tatraikasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ niṣpādyamānāyām aśaktasya, itaraśikṣānabhyāsādanāpattiḥ. āryākṣayamatisūtre 'py evam avocat—

	dānakāle śīlopasaṃhārasyopekṣā.

iti. na cātaḥ śithilena bhavitavyam.

root:
śivo bhūtvā yajeteti bhakto bhūtveti kathyate |
tvameva hi vapuḥ sāraṃ bhaktairadvayaśodhitam || 1.14 ||
commentary: śivotbhūtvā iti | "śivo bhūtvā śivaṃ yaje" iti yadāmnāyeṣūcyate tatra dehapāta eva śivateti ye manyante teṣāṃ sati dehe śivībhāvābhāvādyajamānatānupapatteḥ svasvarūpaśivasamāveśabhaktiśāly eva yajanaṃ jānātīti tātparyam | anenaivāśayenāha tvameva yataḥ sāram utkṛṣṭaṃ vapuḥ svarūpaṃ advayena bhedaśaṅkāśaṅkuśataśātinā śodhitaṃ nirmalīkṛtaṃ bhaktairiti |

root:
ātmasattvavaśaṃ nityam anavadyeṣu vastuṣu |
nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam || 5.57 ||
commentary: tāṃ rādhāṃ bhṛśamatyarthaṃ ramayāmi krīḍayāmi | kimbhūtām | hṛdi saṃgatām | hṛdaye saṃgatāṃ saṃlagnām | katham | aniśaṃ vāraṃvāram | kimiti vitarke | vane vanamadhye | anusarāmi | anugacchāmi | kimiha nikuñje vṛthā vilapāmi | mithyā paridevanaṃ karomi | kiṃ vitarke paripraśne kṣepe nindāprakāśayoriti vistaraḥ |

root:
yātītair bhāṣitā buddhair bhāṣiṣyante hy anāgatāḥ |
pratyutpannāś ca saṃbuddhā yāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ || 12 ||
commentary: punar api kiṃviśiṣṭam ity āha | yātītair ityādi | atītair buddhair yā bhāṣitā anāgatāś ca ye samyaksaṃbuddhā hi yasmād yāṃ bhāṣiṣyante punaḥ | pratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante yāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ punar apīti || pratyutpannāś ca saṃbuddhā yāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ ||

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ bodhicittā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhāvaraṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanāsu prayāso
vyarthaḥ prāptas tatphalasya prasiddheḥ || 15 ||
commentary: prajñājñānetyādi. prajñājñānopadeśād uttarakālaṃ yat bodhicittasyāmṛtarūpasya rasanayā grahaṇam, tat turyaṃ caturthaṃ sekam āha kaścit. tac cāvaraṃ hīnam, vinikṛṣṭam iti yāvat. kasmād avaram? yasmāt sarvaprayāso mantramudrādevatādyākārabhāvanāsu punaḥpunaranuṣṭhānalakṣaṇas tathāgatokto vyarthaḥ prāptaḥ. kutaḥ? tatphalasya bhāvanāsādhyasya phalasya bodhicittāsvādakāla eva prasiddhatvāt prāptatvāt, anyasya viśiṣṭasya phalasyābhāvād iti yāvat.

root:
lābhasatkārakīrtyarthi parivārārthi vā punaḥ |
upasthānārthi me cittaṃ tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat || 5.51 ||
commentary: kīrtir yaśaḥ. parivāraḥ dāsīdāsakarmakarādiḥ. upasthānaṃ pādadhāvanamardanādi. ebhir arthi tadabhilāṣaṃ mama cittam. tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat.

root:
sa mahāvyādhibhir grasto viṣṭhāmūtramalīkṛtaḥ |
ṣaṇmāsābhyantare tasya mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati || 1.12 ||
commentary: mahāvyādhiratisārapramehādiḥ | mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ maraṇameva ||

root:
atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaś caturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo ‘haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||1.2||
commentary:
atiguptatvāt | nanu tadā tvayā katham śrutam iti ced āha || 
athetyādi | ayam arthaḥ | tena vihāreṇa yadā caturānandasukham anubhūya tadanantaraṃ sarvapuruṣeṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyāt | evaṃ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ vakṣyamāṇam udājahāra udāhṛtavān | tadā śrutam ity arthaḥ | saṅgītikārasya mama vajrapāṇeḥ śrotrendriyarūpatvād bhagavadbhagavatīdeha eva sthitvā mayā śrutam iti bhāvaḥ ||
kim udāhṛtavān | bhāvābhāvetyādi | bhāva ānandaparamānandavikalpaḥ | abhāvo viramānandavikalpaḥ | tābhyāṃ vinirmuktas tyaktaḥ | catvāra ānandās tatra prajñopāyābhyām anyonyānurāgalakṣaṇam āliṅganacumbanastanamardananakhadānādinā yantrārūḍhabandhena vajrapadmasaṃyogaṃ yāvad ānandaḥ | etena kiṃcit sukham utpadyate | tataḥ padmāntargatavajracālanena yāvan maṇimūlaṃ bodhicittam āyāti tāvat paramānandaḥ | etena tadadhikaṃ sukham utpadyate | maṇimūlād yāvat padmodarāntargatam aśeṣaṃ na bhavati tāvat sahajānandaḥ | etena grāhyagrāhakagrahaṇābhimānarahitaṃ paramaṃ sukham utpadyate | ataḥ paraṃ yāvan niśceṣṭībhūya sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti vikalpayati tāvad viramānandaḥ | virameṇa trividhasukhavisargeṇa ānando harṣo yatra sa tathā | etena sukhānubhavasmaraṇarūpaṃ sukham utpadyate | tair ekam ānandādivikalparahitaṃ sukhajñānamātraṃ tena tatpara āsakta ity arthaḥ || 
niḥśabdo niṣedhe prapañca ādhārādheyacakrabhāvanārūpaḥ tena svasya rūpaṃ yasya sa tathā | saṃkalpaḥ svarganarakādihetukarmasukhaduḥkhādiphalavikalpaḥ ||

root:
mṛnmardanatṛṇacchedarekhādyaphalam āgatam |
smṛtvā tāthāgatīṃ śikṣāṃ bhītas tatkṣaṇam utsṛjet || 5.46 ||
commentary:
aparam api niṣphalavarjanāya prātimokṣoddiṣṭam ācaret ity āha.

bhūmiphalakādiṣu nakhadaṇḍādinā rekhākarṣaṇalekhanādi niṣprayojanam āgatam āpatitaṃ vivarjayed bhagavatātra nivṛttir ājñapteti saṃsmṛtya, tadatikramavipākaphalabhayāt. tatkṣaṇam iti na tatra kālaparilambhaṃ kuryāt.

root:
karatalatālataralavalayāvalikalitakalasvanavaṃśe |
rāsarase saha nṛtyaparā hariṇā yuvatī praśaśaṃse ||
commentary:
atraivopacayam āha.

naiva asminn arthe pravṛttimato mama ihaloke vā upakṣayaleśo 'pi saṃbhavati. upacayaḥ punarvidyata eveti darśayati—paratra mahatsukhaṃ paraguṇābhinandanāt. evamakriyamāṇe punarapacayo dṛśyate, ubhayaloke 'pi duḥkhaṃ paraguṇāsahanāt.

root:
madanamahīpatikanakadaṇḍarucikesarakusumavikāśe |
militaśilīmukhapāṭalipaṭalakṛtasmaratūṇavilāse ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | madanamahīpatikanakadaṇḍarucikesarakusumavikāśe | madanaścāsau mahīpatī rājā ca | tasya kanakadaṇḍaśchatraṃ tasya ruciriva ruciḥ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā | tāni ca kesarakusumāni nāgakesarakusumāni teṣāṃ vikāśo vikasanaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | militaśilīmukhapāṭalipaṭalakṛtasmaratūṇavilāse | militāḥ śilīmukhāḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ yasmin tattathā | tadyatpāṭalipaṭalaṃ pāṭalikusumanivahaṃ ca tena kṛtvā kṛtaḥ smaratūṇavilāsaḥ smarasya madanasya tūṇīrasya śobhākāro yasmin sa tathā |

root:
atha maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānamantraṃ bhavati |
oṃ śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇa sarvaparivārasahita āgaccha āgaccha jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ atra maṇḍale adhiṣṭhānaṃ kuru hūṃ phaṭ svāhā ||
anenākṛṣya praveśya baddhvā vaśīkṛtya pūjayet || 2.19 ||
commentary:
maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānam iti jhaṭity ātmānaṃ bhagavadrūpeṇālambhya svahṛdaye viśvapadmacandraHŪṂ sūryopariHŪṂkāraṃ dhyātvā tannirgataraśmibhir anādisaṃsiddhaṃ maṇḍalacakram akaniṣṭhabhuvanasthitaṃ JAḤkārapāṭhenākṛṣya purato dṛṣṭvā cetonirmitāsanaṃ ca dhyātvā HŪṂkārapāṭhena tatropaveśayet | tato VAṂkārapāṭhena tatraivābhiniveśena sthitaṃ cintayet | tato HOḤkārapāṭhena siddhidānonmukhaṃ parituṣṭaṃ cintayet | tato manonirmitānekapūjābhiḥ saṃpūjyaḥ | OṂ śrīcaṇḍetyādimantraṃ vāraṃ trayaṃ paṭhet | tatas  
tasmād ākṛṣtaṃ nirmitamaṇḍale praviṣṭam ekarūpatayā tadrūpeṇeva baddham atīvaparituṣṭaṃ dhyātvā pūjayed ity āmnāyaḥ ||

root:
phalena saha sarvasvatyāgacittāj jane 'khile |
dānapāramitā proktā tasmāt sā cittam eva tu || 5.10 ||
commentary:
tad evātyantikasattvārthapraṇidhānānabhiniveśād atyantaśūnyatā || anavarāgro mayā saṃsāro na pratiyaktavya iti praṇiḍhānānavagrahād anuvarāgraśūnyatā || anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau mayā kuśalaṃ nāvakaraṇīyam ity anabhiniveśād anavakāraśūnyatā || prakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ gotraṃ mayā śodhanīyam iti prārthanāvirahāt prakṛtiśūnyatā || ata evāha—mahāprajñetyādi |

tatra mahāprajñāyudhadhara iti vajradharmaḥ | tatra prajñā pratyavekṣaṇājñānaṃ | tad evāyudhaṃ śastraṃ tad dhārayatīti prajñāyuddhadharaḥ | tajjñānasvabhāvatvāt | mahāṃś cāsau prajñāyudhadharaś ca mahāprajñāyudhadharaḥ || mahākleśāṇkuśo 'graṇīr iti vajratīkṣaṇaḥ | kleśā rāgādayaḥ | teṣām aṅkuśabhūtatvāt kleśāṅkuśaḥ | aṅkuśa ivāṅkuśaḥ kleśavaśitāprāptatvāt | tataś ca mahāṃś cāsau kleśāṅkuśaś ca mahākleśāṅkuśaḥ | ata evāgraṇīḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ || mahāyaśā mahākīrtir iti vajrahetuḥ | sattvaparipākopāyabhūtānāṃ sarvamāṇḍaleyānāṃ tantranirdiṣṭānāṃ cakravartisvabhāvatvāt | mahad yaśo yasya sa mahāyaśāḥ | ata evāśeṣānavaśeṣalokadhātuvyāpinī kīrtir yasya sa mahākīrtir iti || mahājyotir mahādyutir iti vajrabhāṣaḥ | mahatī traidhātukaprasarpiṇī jyotir dīptir yasyāsau mahājyotiḥ | tataś ca vāgdoṣāṇāṃ drutamdhyavilambitānāṃ parihāreṇa tūṣṇīṃbhāvasvabhāvena japakāle sarvasattvasaṃtāneṣv avabhāsakatvān mahādyutir iti ||

tataś ca vikalpamanaḥparāvṛttilakṣaṇapratyavekṣaṇājñānāśritavajradharmādisvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣaṇājñāne yathoktaviparyāsavivekena samastadharmatattvapratyavekṣaṇāt | tanmukhena ca svabhāvaśuddhadharmatāprajñājñānāvaivartikasamastābhisandhyarthaparijñānahetutvāc ca | ata evaiṣāṃ vajradharmādīnām ayaṃ kramaḥ ||

root:
niṣphalā netravikṣepā na kartavyāḥ kadācana |
nidhyāyantīva satataṃ kāryā dṛṣṭir adhogatā || 5.35 ||
commentary:
adhunā vikalpo 'pi nirvāṇam iti darśayati—avibhāvitetyādi | avibhāvitasambandho 'viditasambandho 'sau vikalpaḥ prītyasamutpannaḥ | tat tasmād eṣa eva nirvāṇam iti | ataś citta bhrāntiṃ mā kuru | tad uktam—

	yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |

iti | śūnyatā ca nirvāṇam iti ||

root:
mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ  
vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ |  
garbhādhānakṣaṇaparicayān nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ  
seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ ||
commentary: nimittāny api te śubhāni dṛśyanta ity āha-mandaṃ mandam iti || anukūlaḥ pavano vāyustvāṃ manda mandam | atimandam ity arthaḥ || atra kathañcid vīpsāyām eva dviruktir nirvāhyā | "prakāre guṇavacanasya" ity etad āśrayaṇe tu karmadhārayavad bhāve subluki mandamandam iti syāt | tad evāha vāmanaḥ-"mandamandam ity atra prakārārthe dvirbhāvaḥ" iti | yathā sadṛśam | bhāviphalānurūpam ity arthaḥ || "yathā | sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsārthānatikrame" iti yādavaḥ || nudati prerayati | ayaṃ sagandhaḥ sagarvaḥ | sambandhīti kecit || "gandho gandhaka āmode leśe sambandhagarvayoḥ" ity ubhayatrāpi viśvaḥ || te tava vāmo vāmabhāgasthaḥ || "vāmas tu vakre ramye syāt savye vāmagate 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaś ca madhuraṃ śrāvyaṃ nadati vyāharati || idaṃ nimittadvayaṃ vartate | vartiṣyate cāparaṃ nimittam ity āha—garbheti || garbhaḥ kukṣistho jantuḥ || "garbhopakārake hy agnau sukhe panasakaṇṭake | kukṣau kukṣisthajantau ca" iti yādavaḥ || tasyādhānam utpādanaṃ tad eva kṣaṇa utsavaḥ | sukhahetutvād iti bhāvaḥ || "nirvyāpārasthitau kālaviśeṣotsavayoḥ kṣaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmin paricayād abhyāsād dhetoḥ khe vyomni | ābaddhamālāḥ || garbhādhānasukhārthaṃ tvatsamīpe baddhapaṅktaya ity arthaḥ || uktaṃ ca karṇodaye-"garbhaṃ balākā dadhate 'bhrayogān nāke nibaddhāvalayaḥ samantāt" iti || balākā balākāṅganā nayanasubhagaṃ dṛṣṭipriyaṃ bhavantaṃ nūnaṃ satyaṃ seviṣyante || anukūlamārutacātakaśabditabalākādarśanānāṃ śubhasūcakatvaṃ śakunaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ tadvistarabhayān nālekhi ||

root:
nirmūlāsambhavādatra pramāṇaiḥ saiva mṛgyate |
kutaḥ punaḥ pravṛtteti pratyakṣādi tu vāritam || 4 ||
commentary: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhīdaṃ deśyate | ata āha—kimartham ityādi | tathāgatasyāśvāsas tathāgatāśvāsaḥ | tathāgataś ca vairocanaḥ | tasyopalakṣaṇārthatvena ratnasambhavādigrahaṇād ratnasambhavāmitābhāmoghasiddhayo gṛhyante | teśām āśvāso 'kṣobhyamudritānāṃ vijñānīkaraṇam | taddhiyā tadbuddhyā ||

root:
śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām |
paśyati sasmitacārutarāmaparāmanugacchati vāmām ||
commentary: tathā kāmapi bālāṃ śliṣyati upagūhati | kāmapi bālāṃ cumbati | kāmapi rāmāṃ ramayati krīḍayati | sasmitacāru hasitaṃ cāru yathā syāttathā aparām anyāṃ paśyati prekṣate | aparām anugacchati | gacchantīmanusarati |

root:
puṭam ekaṃ ca kartavyaṃ cakravat parimaṇḍalam |
tasya pūrvādike viśvapadmam aṣṭau samālikhet || 2.8 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:
yadi karmakṣayād duḥkhaṃ bhuktvā ca lakṣavatsaram |
mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate janma tatra vajreṇa bhidyate || 1.14 ||
commentary: yadīti | narake ’pi yadi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ samanubhūya varṣalakṣaṃ karmakṣayān manuṣyakarmākṣipto manuṣyeṣūtpadyata iti bhāvaḥ | vajreṇeti meghanādanirgatavajraśūcyā ||

root:
māṃ na jānanti yā nāryaḥ sarvastrīdehasaṃsthitām |
tāsām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitā ||1.5||
commentary: nāryaḥ striyaḥ | sarvastrīṇāṃ dehaḥ puruṣasamparkonmukhaḥ tasmin sthitā ||

root:
cumbanāliṅgane citraṃ ghuṣṭau vipākanāmakam |
maṇau vilakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca duḥsekasaṃvidaḥ || SeNi 5 ||
commentary: etad anantaraṃ duḥsekam āha—cumbanetyādi | darśanam ārabhya ghṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad bāhyakriyā vicitram | bolakakkolayogāt prabhṛti śaśino maṇeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad āgamanaṃ ghṛṣṭis tatra vipākaḥ | ratne ruddhvā vakṣyamāṇasthānaṃ yāvad vilakṣaṇam iti ya evam āmananti te duḥsekasaṃvida iti | saṃśabdena tān upahasati ||

root:
padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritamuro madhusūdanasya |
vyaktānurāgamiva kheladanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūramanupūrayatu priyaṃ vaḥ ||
commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

root:
sambhrāntabodhā nikhilā hi tīrthyās
tattvasya sādhyasya ca rūpavittau |
tebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kila tattvavettā
vedāntavādīti janapravādaḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
sambhrāntetyādi. sambhrānto vibhrānto bodhaḥ prajñāviśeṣo yeṣāṃ tīrthikānāṃ te tathoktāḥ. sarva eva tīrthyā ātmātmīyagrahatimiropahatabuddhinayanāḥ. tattvam idam iti sādhyam cedam iti tattvasya sādhyasya yat svarūpam, tasya yā vittiḥ pratītiḥ, tasyāṃ bhrāntāḥ. śeṣaṃ subodham.

nanu tattvasādhyayor upādeyatvenaikarūpatvāt kathaṃ tattvasya sādhyasya ceti bhedena nirdeśa iti cet. asad etat. tattvaṃ hy upādeyatve 'pi sukhaduḥkhopekṣādisakalapratibhāsasaṃdohavyāpakam. sādhyaṃ cānabhimataparihāreṇecchālakṣaṇaṃ phalam upādeyatve 'pi sakalaprāṇibhir avaśyam evāsādhyavyāvṛttyā sādhayitavyatvenābhimatam ity adoṣaḥ.

tatra tāvad vedāntavādyabhimataṃ sādhyam āha—ānandarūpam ityādi.

root:
bhāgena cāṣṭamenaiva dvāraṃ tasya prakalpayet |
dvāramānena niryūhaṃ tadardhena kapolakam || 2.4 ||
commentary: niryūhaṃ dvāranirgamaṃ | tadardhena niryūhārdhena | tasyās tv iti ||

root:
śrīmantranītigatacārucaturthaseka-
rūpaṃ vidanti na hi ye sphuṭaśabdaśūnyam |
nānopadeśagaṇasaṃkulasaptabhedais
teṣāṃ sphuṭāvagataye kriyate prayatnaḥ || 2 ||
commentary: sā rādhā ciraṃ cirakālaṃ yo virahaḥ tena kiṃ kariṣyati | kiñca | kiṃ vadiṣyati | ataḥ mama dhanena kiṃ prayojanam | sukhena kiṃ prayojanam | gṛheṇa janena vā kiṃ kāryam |

paracodanadakṣāṇām anadhīṣṭopakāriṇām |
pratīcchec chirasā vākyaṃ sarvaśiṣyaḥ sadā bhavet || 5.74 ||
commentary:
ity api śikṣitavyam ity āha.

kaukṛtyavinodanāvavādānuśāsanīsamarthānāṃ vinayādikovidānām aprārthitahitaiṣiṇāṃ hitavidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ mūrdhnā gṛhṇīyāt. na teṣu svacittaṃ dūṣayitavyam, nāpy avamānanā kāryeti bhāvaḥ. sarvasattveṣu gurugauravadhiyā samācaritavyam iti sarvaṃ sarvebhyaḥ śikṣet.

root:
yamunātīravānīranikuñje mandamāsthitaṃ |
prāha premabharodbhrāntaṃ mādhavaṃ rādhikāsakhī ||
commentary: rādhikāsakhī gītārthaṃ ślokena prāha | mādhavaṃ pratyāha | kā | rādhikāsakhī | rādhikāyāḥ sakhī | kimbhūtam | mandaṃ yathā syāttathā sthitam | kutra | yamunātīravānīranikuñje | vānīrasya vetasasya nikuñjaṃ yamunātīre vānīranikuñjaṃ tasmin | kimbhūtam | premodbhrāntam | prema prītiḥ tasya bharaḥ ādhikyam | tena u‌dbhrānto vihvalaḥ |
