root:
aneke śrutavanto 'pi śrāddhā yatnaparā api |
asaṃprajanyadoṣeṇa bhavanty āpattikaśmalāḥ || 5.26 ||
commentary:
idam aparaṃ tadvayatireke dūṣaṇam āha.

bahavo 'pi bahuśrutāḥ tathā śraddhāvanto yatnaparāḥ śikṣāyām ādarakāriṇaḥ asaṃprajanyadoṣeṇa āpattikaluṣitā bhavanti kāyacittapracārāpratyavekṣaṇāt.

root:
yāvān sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
madhyamārtho nirāropas tatrāpohavidhī kutaḥ || SeNi 32 ||
commentary:
lapanāśaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha.

paraguṇān sadbhūtān api parokṣaṃ brūyān na samakṣam. anyathā lapanāṃ kaścin manyeta. pareṇa tu tatsamakṣamanyasya guṇe bhāṣyamāṇe tadanuvādakatayā samakṣam api brūyāt. anyathā nāsya rūcir atreti matvā svacittaṃ pradūṣayet paraḥ. svaguṇe punaḥ kenacid guṇapakṣapātinā prasannena samakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca kīrtyamāne cittasyonnatiṃ nivārayaṃs tasyaiva guṇābhidhāyakasya guṇānurāgitāṃ manasi kuryāt.

root:
bhagavadgītāyām api—
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'nto hy anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ || SeNi 18 ||
commentary: catuḥkoṭirahitatā cety āha—nāsata ityādi | subodham ||

root:
atha bhagavān āha | 
ādau triśaraṇaṃ dadyāt pañcaśikṣāś ca poṣadham |
tataḥ pañcābhiṣekaṃ tu guhyaṃ prajñāṃ ca śeṣataḥ || 3.2 ||
commentary:
yatra kuśalapakṣasaṃcāre 'pi kvacit samādhānavighātaḥ syāt, tannopādeyamity āha.

svayameva tu yuktyāgamābhyāṃ kalyāṇamitravacanādvā yathābalamavadhārya yatkiṃcitkarma kartumārabdhaṃ dhyānādhyayanādikam, prathamatastadeva tāvanniṣpattiṃ neyaṃ tannimnena cetasā, na punastadaniṣpannameva parityajya paramārambhaṇīyam.

root:
na santi tattvato bhāvāḥ śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitāḥ |
śaktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ sarvāropavināśinī || SeNi 9 ||
commentary:
tad eva paraṃ viśvarūpam astīti darśayann āha—na santītyādi | bhāvā bāhyā rūpādayas tattvataḥ paramārthato na santi | kathaṃ tarhi nīlādipratibhāsaḥ | ata āha–śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitā iti | cicchaktisvabhāvaṃ gatāś cidātmāna ity arthaḥ | tarhi saiva paramārthasatī syāt | atas tan nirāsārtham āha—śaktir ityādi | subodham |

etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitam | tad uktaṃ bhargaśikāyāṃ śākteye tantra—

	na san na cāsat sadasan na ca tan nobhayojjhitam | 
	durvijñeyā hi sāvasthā kim apy etad anuttamam || 

iti |

root:
nāthanirvāṇaśayyāvac chayītepsitayā diśā |
saṃprajānaṃ laghūtthānaḥ prāg avaśyaṃ niyogataḥ || 5.96 ||
commentary:
sa hi śayyāṃ parikalpayannevaṃ parikalpayedityupadarśayannāha-

bhagavato mahānirvāṇaśayyām iva śayyāṃ parikalpayet. abhimatayā diśā śiro vidhāya, dakṣiṇena pārśvena, pādasyopari pādam ādhāya, dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum upadhānaṃ kṛtvā, vāmaṃ ca prasārya jaṅghopari niveśya, cīvaraiḥ susaṃvṛtakāyaḥ, smṛtaḥ, saṃprajānānaḥ, utthānasaṃjñī, ālokasaṃjñī, śayitaḥ, nācittakamiddhāvaṣṭabdhaḥ. na ca nidrāsukham ākhādayet, na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti. laghutthānaḥ śīghram evottiṣṭhet. na tu jṛmbhikāṃ gātramoṭanaṃ kurvann ālasyopahitaś cireṇa. etebhya eva sarvebhyaḥ pūrvam eva.

root:
kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ
tyaktvopekṣājñānamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt |
āsaṃsārasthāyi sattvārthakāri
cintāratnaprakhyam ekāntaśāntam || 12 ||
commentary: kṛtvetyādi. sākṣāt svādhipaṃ kṛtvā, paścāt tyaktvā, upekṣārūpaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tanmātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt. anyat sugamam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—maṇḍalacakrarūpaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt tan nirodhya, upekṣājñānamātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt pañcamam.

root:
gṛdhrair āmiṣasaṃgṛddhaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇa itas tataḥ |
na karoty anyathā kāyaḥ kasmād atra pratikriyām || 5.59 ||
commentary:
punas tad ekāntam avadhārayituṃ kāyapratyavekṣām āha.

kāyasya sarvathā kvacid api vyāpāro nāsti, svātmany api sāmarthyābhāvāt. anyathā cittarahito mṛtasya kāyaḥ. gṛdhrādibhir vipralujyamāna itastataḥ pratikāram ātmarakṣaṇārthaṃ kim iti na karotīti pṛcchati sarvasāmarthyavikalatvāt. ata eva cittaparikarmaiva sādhyam. tasmin parikarmite kāyasyāyatnata eva parikarmasiddheḥ, tatparatantratvāt tasyety uktaṃ bhavati.

root:
sānandasallakṣaṇamaṇḍitāṅgaṃ
sambhujyamānaṃ daśabhūmisaṃsthaiḥ |
sattvārthakāri pravadanti sādhyaṃ
dānādiṣaṭpāramitānayasthāḥ || 6 ||
commentary: sānandetyādi. sahānandena vartata iti sānandam. sānandaṃ ca tat sallakṣaṇamaṇḍitāṅgaṃ ca sambhujyamānaṃ dharmadeśanādvāreṇopajīvyamānam. kaiḥ? daśabhūmīśvaraiḥ, pariśiṣṭabhūmisthitānām agocaratvāt. daśabhūmiprāptair avalokiteśvaramañjuśrīprabhṛtibhir upabhujyamānam iti yāvat. etad uktaṃ bhavati—śuddhāvāsopari ghanavyūhasaṃjñake samyaksaṃbuddhabhuvane yathā bhagavān ānandarūpaḥ sambhogakāyātmā nirmāṇadvāreṇa sakalajagadarthasaṃpādakaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhanavabhūmīśvarair apy adṛśyaśarīro daśabhūmīśvarair eva paraṃ bodhisattvair dharmaśravaṇadvāreṇopabhujyamāna āsaṃsāraṃ cakāsti, tathaiva tat sādhyam iti tṛtīyam.

root:
mārgādau bhayabodhārthaṃ muhuḥ paśyec caturdiśam |
diśo viśramya vīkṣeta parāvṛtyeva pṛṣṭhataḥ || 5.37 ||
commentary:
atraivopacayam āha.

naiva asminn arthe pravṛttimato mama ihaloke vā upakṣayaleśo 'pi saṃbhavati. upacayaḥ punarvidyata eveti darśayati—paratra mahatsukhaṃ paraguṇābhinandanāt. evamakriyamāṇe punarapacayo dṛśyate, ubhayaloke 'pi duḥkhaṃ paraguṇāsahanāt.

root:
kṛtvā sphuṭaṃ rūpam abhīṣṭam eṣāṃ
paścān nirodhaṃ phalam āha kaścit |
abhinnarūpaś ca yato nirodho
na pakṣabhede 'pi tato 'sti bhedaḥ || 14 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. ṣaṇṇāṃ pakṣāṇām anyatamasya phalasya sādhyatvād yad yad evābhiṣṭaṃ tad eva sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodha uttarakālaṃ sattvārthādiśūnyaḥ sākṣāt kartavyaḥ.

nanu ṣaṭpakṣabhedena ṣaḍ eva nirodhāḥ syuḥ. tat katham eka eva nirodha ity āśaṅkyāha—abhinnetyādi. abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ yasya sa tathā. na hi nirodhānāṃ ṣaṭpakṣalakṣaṇabhede 'pi bhedo 'sti, abhāvaikarūpatayā nirodhasya samānatvāt. ayam arthaḥ—anyatamapakṣaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt tasya santānocchedarūpo nirodha iti saptamaṃ sādhyam.

root:
āgamapravaṇaścāhaṃ nāpavādyaḥ skhaliteṣv apy |
nahi sadvartmanā gacchan skhaliteṣvapyapodyate || 1.7 ||
commentary: api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavo mannibandhane doṣānupalabhante tathāpy aham anapavādyaḥ | nahyahaṃ svatantraḥ kiñcidabhidadhe | āgamānusāriṇas tu me yathāgamaṃ vartamānasya skhalitam api daivād avarjanīyatayāpannam ity upekṣaṇīyam eva | na hi kimapy abhimataṃ vastu nirdoṣaṃ bhavati | doṣāṃs tu samādhāya guṇā upajīvitavyā ity āha āgameti | satāṃ hi mārgo 'yam āgamānusāro nāma | tad iha bahulaṃ guṇā eva | doṣās tu kathañcit santo 'py alpatvād asatkalpā ity upekṣitavyā iti ||

root:
na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścit paratra ca mahat sukham |
aprītiduḥkhaṃ dveṣais tu mahad duḥkhaṃ paratra ca || 5.78 ||
commentary:
atraivopacayam āha.

naiva asminn arthe pravṛttimato mama ihaloke vā upakṣayaleśo 'pi saṃbhavati. upacayaḥ punarvidyata eveti darśayati—paratra mahatsukhaṃ paraguṇābhinandanāt. evamakriyamāṇe punarapacayo dṛśyate, ubhayaloke 'pi duḥkhaṃ paraguṇāsahanāt.

root:
prakāśayatu saṃbuddho bhagavān śastā jagadguruḥ |
mahāsamayatattvajña idriyāśayavit paraḥ || 9 ||
commentary: prakāśayatu bhagavān ity āha | saṃbuddha iti śāśvatadvāreṇa || jagadanuśāsanāc chāstety akṣobhyadvāreṇa || jagatāṃ gurur jagadgurur iti ratnasaṃbhavadvāreṇa || samayo bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahāś cāsau samayaś ca mahāsamayaḥ | tasya tattvaṃ mahāsamayatattvaṃ | taj jānātīti mahāsamayatattvajña iti | amitābhadvāreṇa || indriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi | teṣām āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | taṃ vettīti indriyāśayavid ity amoghasiddhidvāreṇa || evaṃ pañcatathāgatāmako bhagavān para utkṛṣṭaḥ prakāśayatv ity arthaḥ ||

root:
āmūlādvāglatā seyaṃ kramavisphāraśālinī |
tvadbhaktisudhayā siktā tadrasāḍhyaphalāstu me || 1.13 ||
commentary:
lokalokottarakulam iti | lokṛ darśane | lokyata iti lokaḥ | tasya kulaṃ lokalokottarakulaṃ padmakulam ity arthaḥ ||

lokālokakulaṃ mahad iti | lokānām āloko lokālokaḥ | akṣobhyaḥ | ādarśajñānātmakatvāt | tasya kulaṃ lokālokakulaṃ mahad vajrakulam evāgryaṃ vairocanādīnāṃ bodhicittasvabhāvatvāt | tasya kulaṃ mahāmudrākulam ity arthaḥ || mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad iti | sarvatathāgatānāṃ traidhātukadharmarājyābhiṣekapradānān mahoṣṇīṣatvam | tasya kulaṃ mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad ratnakulam ity arthaḥ ||

āryanāmasaṃgītiṭīkāyāṃ nāmamantrārthāvalokinyāṃ ṣaṭkulāvalokanādhikāras tṛtīyaḥ || gāthe dve ||

root:
pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī  
jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim |  
sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai  
prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra ||
commentary: mahātantram iti | trividhaṃ tantraṃ | hetuphalopāyabhedena tatra hetur anādinidhanasahajaikasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ mahāsukhaṃ | bhāvyamānatvāt | tad eva phalam āgantukakleśādimalāpagamena sādhyatvāt | upāyas tv āgantukamalāpakarṣaṇe utpattyutpannakramabhāvenaiva | tanpratipādako ’pi granthasandarbhaḥ prabandhaḥ tantraśabdenocyate | upacārāt | tantraḥ kriyātantraḥ tasya rājā tad ukto mantradevatābhāvanādividhiḥ | tasyeśvaraṃ prabhuṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ āśu śīghram ||

root:
nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair  
āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham |  
jagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ  
sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam ||
commentary: mahāvyādhiratisārapramehādiḥ | mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ maraṇameva ||

root:
tasmāt smṛtir manodvārān nāpaneyā kadācana |
gatāpi pratyupasthāpyā saṃsmṛtyāpāyikīṃ vyathām || 5.29 ||
commentary: tava daśanaśikhare dantasyāgre lagnā dharaṇī pṛthvī vasati tiṣṭhati | daśanasya śikharaṃ tasmin | kasmin keva | śaśini candre nimagnā kalaṅkakaleva | kalaṅkasya kalā kalaṅkakalā |

root:
hṛdi biśalatāhāro nāyaṃ bhujaṅgamanāyakaḥ kuvalayadalaśreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garaladyutiḥ |
malayajarajo nedaṃ bhasma priyārahite mayi prahara na harabhrāntyānaṅga krudhā kimu dhāvasi ||
commentary:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

root:
citraṃ tato vipākaḥ syāt tṛtīye tu vilakṣaṇam |
vimardaś ca tato jñeyo haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ || SeNi 2 ||
commentary: tathā sā rādhā alolam acañcalaṃ yathā bhavati tathā kapolaṃ na tyajati | kena | paṇitalena | kadā | sāyaṃkāle | kamiva | bālaśaśinamiva | bālaścāsau śaśī ceti | tamiva | samagraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇacandrānukāri bhavati | karatalapihitatadekadeśatvād bālacandreṇopamīyate |

root:
kṣamyatāmaparaṃ kadāpi tavedṛśaṃ na karomi |
dehi sundari darśanaṃ mama manmathena dunomi ||
commentary: he rādhe kṣamyatām | aparam īdṛśam aparādhaṃ tava kadāpi kasmin kāle 'pi na karomi | ato he sundari rādhe | ātmadarśanaṃ dehi | kasya | mama | kimiti | yato 'haṃ manmathena kandarpeṇa dunomi tāpamanubhavāmi |

root:
ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet tṛtīye katham iṣyate |
yat tatrālocanaṃ naiva bhaved vittir alakṣaṇā || SeNi 3 ||
commentary:
lobhacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahālobha iti || mahāmaheti pūrvavat | mahālobho ratnasaṃbhavaḥ || sarvalobhanisūdana iti | sarvalaukikalokottarasaṃpattipariśodhanārthatvāt || śūnyatādicaturvimokṣamukhānāṃ dharmadhātvāyatanamukhena sarvasamādhihetutvāt | tad eva cādhyātmaviparyāsapratikūlatayādhyātmaśūnyatākāraṃ | bāhyopalambhāpagamād bahirdhāśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ | tadāśrayaśarīrānupalambhasvabhāvatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātmakaṃ | bhājanalokādhyavasāyarahitatvena mahāśūnyatālakṣaṇaṃ || tata evādarśajñānāśrayavajrasattvādisamādhicatuṣṭayātmakam iti |

ata āha mahākāmo ityādi | tatra mahākāma iti vajrasattvaḥ | kāmyata iti kāmaḥ | abhilaṣaṇīya ity arthaḥ | mahāsaukhya iti vajrarājaḥ | mahāmoda iti vajrarāgaḥ | mahāratir iti vajrasādhuḥ || 

ata eva cakṣūrūpādivāsanāparāvṛttisvabhāvādarśajñānaniṣpatter adhyātmānupalambhādyadhiṣṭhānatvāt | yathāsvaṃ viparyāsavipakṣatayā bodhicittodayākarṣānurāgaṇasādhubhāvahetutvāc caiṣāṃ yathākramam ||

root: tato ’ndhapaṭaṃ bandhayitvā maṇḍale puṣpaṃ pātayet | tato ’ndhapaṭaṃ muktvā maṇḍalaṃ pradarśayet | yasya yac cihnaṃ tad bodhayet | tatas tām eva prajñāṃ śiṣyasya samarpayet || 3.22 ||
commentary: nimittāny api te śubhāni dṛśyanta ity āha-mandaṃ mandam iti || anukūlaḥ pavano vāyustvāṃ manda mandam | atimandam ity arthaḥ || atra kathañcid vīpsāyām eva dviruktir nirvāhyā | "prakāre guṇavacanasya" ity etad āśrayaṇe tu karmadhārayavad bhāve subluki mandamandam iti syāt | tad evāha vāmanaḥ-"mandamandam ity atra prakārārthe dvirbhāvaḥ" iti | yathā sadṛśam | bhāviphalānurūpam ity arthaḥ || "yathā | sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsārthānatikrame" iti yādavaḥ || nudati prerayati | ayaṃ sagandhaḥ sagarvaḥ | sambandhīti kecit || "gandho gandhaka āmode leśe sambandhagarvayoḥ" ity ubhayatrāpi viśvaḥ || te tava vāmo vāmabhāgasthaḥ || "vāmas tu vakre ramye syāt savye vāmagate 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaś ca madhuraṃ śrāvyaṃ nadati vyāharati || idaṃ nimittadvayaṃ vartate | vartiṣyate cāparaṃ nimittam ity āha—garbheti || garbhaḥ kukṣistho jantuḥ || "garbhopakārake hy agnau sukhe panasakaṇṭake | kukṣau kukṣisthajantau ca" iti yādavaḥ || tasyādhānam utpādanaṃ tad eva kṣaṇa utsavaḥ | sukhahetutvād iti bhāvaḥ || "nirvyāpārasthitau kālaviśeṣotsavayoḥ kṣaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmin paricayād abhyāsād dhetoḥ khe vyomni | ābaddhamālāḥ || garbhādhānasukhārthaṃ tvatsamīpe baddhapaṅktaya ity arthaḥ || uktaṃ ca karṇodaye-"garbhaṃ balākā dadhate 'bhrayogān nāke nibaddhāvalayaḥ samantāt" iti || balākā balākāṅganā nayanasubhagaṃ dṛṣṭipriyaṃ bhavantaṃ nūnaṃ satyaṃ seviṣyante || anukūlamārutacātakaśabditabalākādarśanānāṃ śubhasūcakatvaṃ śakunaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ tadvistarabhayān nālekhi ||

root:
śikṣāṃ rakṣitukāmena cittaṃ rakṣyaṃ prayatnataḥ |
na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittam arakṣatā || 5.1 ||
commentary:
evam ātmabhāvādīnām utsargaṃ rakṣāṃ ca pratipādya punar vistareṇa rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni pratipādayitum upakramate. utpāditabodhicittena hi bodhisattvena utsṛṣṭasyāpi cātmabhāvasya rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni kāryāṇi. yasmāt-

	paribhogāya sattvānām ātmabhāvādi dīyate |
	arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ kiṃ dattaṃ yan na bhujyate ||

	tasmāt sattvopabhogārtham ātmabhāvādi pālayet |
	kalyāṇamitrānutsargāt sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāt || (Sikṣāsamuccaya 5-6)

tac ca ātmabhāvādiparipālanādi śikṣārakṣaṇād eva syāt. anyathā narakādivinipātagamanāt tan na syāt. ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitumaśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā. cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

root:
puṣpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ naivedyam eva ca |
pūjāṃ pañcopahāreṇa kuryād vai maṇḍalasya hi || 2.21 ||
commentary: pañcopahāreti puṣpādipañcānām upahāra upaṃ ḍhokanaṃ tena ||

root:
ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād   
valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya |  
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te  
barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ ||
commentary: ratneti || ratnacchāyānāṃ padmarāgādimaṇiprabhāṇāṃ vyatikaro miśraṇam iva prekṣyaṃ darśanīyam ākhaṇḍalasyendrasyaitad dhanuḥkhaṇḍam || etad iti hastena nirdeśo vivakṣitaḥ | purastād agre valmīkāgrād vāmalūravivarāt || "vāmalūraś ca nākuś ca valmīkaṃ puṃnapuṃsakam" ity amaraḥ || prabhavaty āvirbhavati | yena dhanuḥkhaṇḍena te tava śyāmaṃ vapuḥ | sphuritarucinojvalakāntinā barheṇa picchena || "picchabarhe napuṃsake" ity amaraḥ || gopaveṣasya viṣṇor gopālasya kṛṣṇasya śyāmaṃ vapur iva | atitarāṃ kāntiṃ śobhām āpatsyate prāpsyate ||

root:
vibuddhapuṇḍarīkākṣaḥ protphullakamalānanaḥ |
prollālayan vajravaraṃ svakareṇa muhur muhuḥ || 2 ||
commentary: vibuddhapuṇḍarīkākṣa iti puṇḍarīkaṃ śvetapadmaṃ vibuddhaṃ vikasitam akṣi cakṣuḥ | tataś cāyaṃ vigrahaḥ | vibuddhaṃ ca puṇḍarīkaṃ ceti vibuddhapuṇḍarīkaṃ | vibuddhapuṇḍarīkam ivākṣiṇī locane yasya sa tathoktaḥ || protphullakamalānana iti prakarṣeṇotphullaṃ protphullaṃ kamalaṃ padmam ānanaṃ mukhaṃ | prakarṣotphullakamalavad ānanaṃ yasyāsau tathoktaḥ || vajrasya madhyaṃ svakareṇa gṛhītvā muhur muhuḥ punaḥ prakṣiptaṃ vajraṃ pratīcchan prollālayann idam āheti saṃbandhaḥ ||

root:
kutra me vartata iti pratyavekṣyaṃ tathā manaḥ |
samādhānadhuraṃ naiva kṣaṇam apy utsṛjed yathā || 5.41 ||
commentary:
tasmin baddho 'pi punaḥ punar nirūpaṇīya ity āha.

kva punar idaṃ mano mama vartate, pūrvasminn ālambane anyatra vā gatam. gatam avagamya tato nirvatya tatraiva yojayitavyam. svarasavāhitāyām upekṣaṇīyam iti śamathadhuram ekam api kṣaṇaṃ yathā na parityajati tathā dhārayitavyam. etāvatā śīlaṃ hi samādhisaṃvartanīmam ity uktaṃ bhavati. yathoktaṃ candrapradīpasūtre-

	kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ
	viśuddhaśīlasya mi ānuśaṃsāḥ || (Samādhirāja 27.6)

iti. ato 'vagamyate—ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogāḥ, te śīle 'nugatā iti. tasmāt samādhyarthinā smṛtisaṃprajanyaśīlena bhavitavyam. tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kārya iti.

root:
karasphoṭo bhaven mudrā aṅgulyāmoṭanaṃ tathā |  
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
commentary: kim iti tvaṃ harṣam | muditāṃ sarvasattvānām aiśvaryādiṣu harṣacittabhāvanāṃ viśeṣeṇa toḍayitvā śunye karoṣi praveśam | kasmān na praveśaḥ kartavya iti ced āha | yasmāt tava nimantraṇam | sarvasattvānām arthe buddho bhaveyam ityādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā manasi tiṣṭhati | lokaḥ sattvalokaḥ | aśeṣaḥ samastaḥ ||

root:
śivo bhūtvā yajeteti bhakto bhūtveti kathyate |
tvameva hi vapuḥ sāraṃ bhaktairadvayaśodhitam || 1.14 ||
commentary: madarthaṃ prasthitasya te pathikāṅganājanāśvāsam amānuṣaṅgikaṃ phalam ity āha—tvām iti || pavanapadavīm ākāśam ārūḍhaṃ tvām | panthānaṃ gacchanti te pathikāḥ || "pathaḥ ṣkan" iti ṣkanpratyayaḥ || teṣāṃ vanitāḥ proṣitabhartṛkāḥ| pratyayāt priyāgamanaviśvāsāt || "pratyayo 'dhīnaśapathajñānaviśvāsahetuṣu" ity amaraḥ || āśvasyatyāḥ viśvasitāḥ || śvasidhātoḥ śatrantāt "ugitaś ca" iti ṅīp | tathodgṛhītālakāntā dṛṣṭiprasārārtham unnamayya dhṛtālakāgrāḥ satyaḥ prekṣiṣyante | atyutkaṇṭhatayā drakṣyantīty arthaḥ || madāgamanena pathikāḥ katham āgamiṣyantīty atrāha—tathā hi | tvayi saṃnaddhe vyāpṛte sati viraheṇa vidhurāṃ vivaśāṃ jāyāṃ ka upekṣeta | na ko 'pīty arthaḥ | anyo 'pi madvyatirikto 'pi yo jano 'ham iva parādhīnavṛttiḥ parāyattajīvanako na syāt | svatantras tu na ko 'py upekṣeteti bhāvaḥ || atrārthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktam—"kāryakāraṇasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ parasparam | samarthanaṃ yatra so 'rthāntaragyāsa udāhṛtaḥ ||" iti lakṣaṇāt ||

root:
avibhāvitasambandho vikalpo 'sau pratītyajaḥ |
tad eṣa eva nirvāṇaṃ mā mṛthāś citta vibhramam || SeNi 35 ||
commentary:
adhunā vikalpo 'pi nirvāṇam iti darśayati—avibhāvitetyādi | avibhāvitasambandho 'viditasambandho 'sau vikalpaḥ prītyasamutpannaḥ | tat tasmād eṣa eva nirvāṇam iti | ataś citta bhrāntiṃ mā kuru | tad uktam—

	yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |

iti | śūnyatā ca nirvāṇam iti ||

root:
anena hi vihāreṇa viharan durjaneṣv api |
pramadājanamadhye 'pi yatir dhīro na khaṇḍyate || 5.21 ||
commentary: api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavo mannibandhane doṣānupalabhante tathāpy aham anapavādyaḥ | nahyahaṃ svatantraḥ kiñcidabhidadhe | āgamānusāriṇas tu me yathāgamaṃ vartamānasya skhalitam api daivād avarjanīyatayāpannam ity upekṣaṇīyam eva | na hi kimapy abhimataṃ vastu nirdoṣaṃ bhavati | doṣāṃs tu samādhāya guṇā upajīvitavyā ity āha āgameti | satāṃ hi mārgo 'yam āgamānusāro nāma | tad iha bahulaṃ guṇā eva | doṣās tu kathañcit santo 'py alpatvād asatkalpā ity upekṣitavyā iti ||

root:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād dṛḍhāśayaḥ | 
yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ nātha sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛk || 14 ||
commentary:
syād etat—yady api evam, tathāpi bhaktāc chādanamātreṇāpi paripālanīya ity atrāha.

yadi nāma bhṛtyakarmakaraṇaṃ tathāpi tatrānavasthāyisvabhāve vicakṣaṇo jñātvaiva pravartate, evaṃ prakṛte 'pi taddharmiṇi kenābhiprāyeṇa he manaḥ, tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam upakaraṇopakṣayam?

root:
a ā i ī u ū e ai o au aṃ aḥ sthito hṛdi |
jñānamūrtir ahaṃ buddho buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām || 26 ||
commentary: saṃprati sahāyasampattiś cāstīty āha-kartum iti || yad garjitaṃ kartṛ mahīm ucchilandhrām udbhūtakandalikām || "kandalyāṃ ca śilīndhrā syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ata evāvandhyāṃ saphalāṃ kartuṃ prabhavati śaknoti | śilīndhrāṇāṃ bhāvisasyasampattisūcakatvād iti bhāvaḥ | tad uktaṃ nimittanidāne—"kālābhrayogād uditāḥ śilīndhrāḥ sampannasasyāṃ kathayanti dhātrīm" iti || tac chravaṇasubhagaṃ śrotrasukham | lokasyeti śeṣaḥ | te tava garjitaṃ śrutvā mānasotkā mānase sarasy unmanasaḥ | utsukā iti yāvat || "utka unmanāḥ iti nipātanāt sādhu || kālāntare mānasasya himaduṣṭatvād dhimasya ca haṃsānāṃ rogahetutvād anyatra gatā haṃsāḥ punarvarṣāsu mānasam eva gacchantīti prasiddhiḥ || bisakisalayānāṃ mṛṇālāgrāṇāṃ chedaiḥ śakalaiḥ | pātheyavantaḥ pathi sādhu pātheyaṃ pathi bhojyam || "pathyatithivasatisvapater ḍhañ" taddantaḥ | mṛṇālāgraśakalasaṃbandhavanta ity arthaḥ | rājahaṃsāḥ haṃsaviśeṣāḥ || "rājahaṃsās tu te cañcucaraṇair lohitaiḥ sitāḥ" ity amaraḥ || nabhasi vyomni bhavatas tava | ākailāsāt kailāsaparyantam || padadvayaṃ caitam | sahāyāḥ sayātrāḥ "sahāyas tu sayātraḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti ||

root:
praṇamya nāthaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam |
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā idam āha sthito 'grataḥ || 6 ||
commentary:
tad eva paraṃ viśvarūpam astīti darśayann āha—na santītyādi | bhāvā bāhyā rūpādayas tattvataḥ paramārthato na santi | kathaṃ tarhi nīlādipratibhāsaḥ | ata āha–śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitā iti | cicchaktisvabhāvaṃ gatāś cidātmāna ity arthaḥ | tarhi saiva paramārthasatī syāt | atas tan nirāsārtham āha—śaktir ityādi | subodham |

etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitam | tad uktaṃ bhargaśikāyāṃ śākteye tantra—

	na san na cāsat sadasan na ca tan nobhayojjhitam | 
	durvijñeyā hi sāvasthā kim apy etad anuttamam || 

iti |

root:
tadvidvāṃso 'nugṛhṇantu cittaśrotraiḥ prasādibhiḥ |
santaḥ praṇayivākyāni gṛhṇanti hy anasūyavaḥ || 1.3 ||
commentary: samprati lokayātrāmādriyamāṇo ye 'tyantaparārthāḥ svopakāram agaṇayanto 'pi paropakārāya yatante santastān pratyāha tad vidvāṃsa iti | asūyavo matsarāḥ tato 'nye 'nasūyava iti ||

root:
trilokam āpūrayantyā brāhmyā madhurayā girā |
pratyabhāṣata guhyendraṃ vajrapāṇiṃ mahābalam || 19 ||
commentary:
smitaṃ saṃdarśyeti trilokam āpūrayantyā vajrapāṇiṃ girā vācā pratyabhāṣata | kiṃbhūtayā | madhurayā | mādhuryaṃ śrutisukhatvāt brāhmyeti brahmasvaropetatvāt | brahmasvara iti brahmaśabdo mahato mahāguṇasyādhivacanaṃ yathoktaṃ |

	brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate 'nekasāhasraparṣadi ||

iti || sāhasraśabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avagantavyaḥ | anekasāhasramayyāṃ parṣadīty arthaḥ || yathā coktaṃ |

	lokadhātuṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ śabdena spharatīti |
	yathābhyantarāḥ śṛṇvanti tathā bāhyā api ||

iti | tatrābhyāntarā ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthitāḥ | bāhyā iti ye lokadhātvantaritāḥ | tena mahattvād brahma | tasya svaro brahmasvaraḥ ||

atha vā brahmā bhagavān śākyamuniḥ | tasya brahmaṇa iyaṃ brāhmī vāk | tayā brāhmyā ekayaiva girā trilokam āpūrayantyā vyāpnuvantyā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣata | tathā coktaṃ |

	ekāpi vāṇi bhavasūdanasya nānābhidhānaiḥ pratideśabhinnaiḥ |
	yathā tathā sarvajanaprabodhahetur bhavaty askhalitā vibhaktā ||

iti ||

root:
kāpi kapolatale militā lapituṃ kimapi śrutimūle |
cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitaṃ pulakairanukūle ||
commentary: tathā kāpi nitambavatī gopī śrutimūle karṇamūle kimapi lapituṃ bhāṣituṃ militā satī dayitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāru yathā syāttathā cucumba | kva sthāne | kapolatale | kimbhūte | anukūle | kaiḥ | pulakaiḥ romāñcaiḥ |

root:
evaṃ te rakṣataś cāpi mṛtyur ācchidya nirdayaḥ |
kāyaṃ dāsyati gṛdhrebhyas tadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi || 5.67 ||
commentary:
tathāpi nātrābhiniveśaḥ kārya ity āha.

ācchidyeti balāt. bhavato gṛhītvā niṣkṛpo mṛtyus tava kāyaṃ gṛdhrebhyo dāsyati. tadāpi na kaścit pratikāro bhaviṣyati ity abhiprāyaḥ.

root:
kuto vā gṛhṇate doṣaṃ sūrayo madvidhoktiṣu | 
neṣyate yaḥ parastho 'pi sa svayaṃ gṛhyate katham || 1.5 ||
commentary: idānīṃ durjanān prati sadaṇḍam āha kuto veti | ye vayaṃ parasthān api doṣān na mṛṣyāmaḥ te kathaṃ svagrantheṣu doṣānupādadīmahi | na cāsmābhir anupāttān doṣān sūrayo grahītum arhantīti ||

root:
tasmāt smṛtir manodvārān nāpaneyā kadācana |
gatāpi pratyupasthāpyā saṃsmṛtyāpāyikīṃ vyathām || 5.29 ||
commentary:
smṛtim adhikṛtyādhunā prāha.

yataḥ smṛter abhāve dūṣaṇam evaṃ syāt. tasmād idam atra doṣaṃ paśyatā smṛtir ālabambhanāsaṃpramoṣalakṣaṇā manodvārān manogṛhapraveśamārgāt nāpaneyā nāpasāryā, sadāvasthāpayitavyety arthaḥ. atha kadācit pramādatas tato 'pagacchet, tadā gatāpi punar nirvartyopasthāpyā tatraivāropayitavyā. katham? saṃsmṛtya manasi nidhāya āpāyikīṃ narakādidurgativyathām.

tatra dvādaśemāḥ smṛtayo niṣphalaspandavarjanārthaṃ tathāgatājñānatikramānupālanavipākagauravasmṛtiprabhṛtayaḥ śikṣāsamuccaye pradarśitāḥ. tata eva vivekenāvadhāryāḥ.

sāpi smṛtis tīvrādarāt samutpadyate. ādaro 'pi śamathamāhātmyam avagamya ātāpena jāyate. etac ca yathāvasaraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ.

root:
mudrās tāvan na buddhyante catasraś ca catuḥkṣaṇāḥ |
yāvan na śabareśasya spṛśyante pādapāṃsavaḥ || SeNi 40 ||
commentary:
mudrāṇāṃ bodhārthaṃ sveṣṭadevatāprabhāvaṃ darśayann āha—mudrās tāvad ityādi | śabareśasyeti siddhaśrīśabarapādasya | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

idānīṃ puṇyapariṇāmanayā grantham upasaṃharann āha—

root:
athavā maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt paṭarūpeṇa sulikhitam |
pūrvavat maṇḍalaṃ likhyaṃ madhye kṛṣṇācalaṃ likhet || 2.15 ||
commentary: paṭarūpeṇeti | paṭaṃ lekhayet iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
alasanimīlitalocanayā pulakāvalilalitakapolam |
śramajalasakalakalevarayā varamadanamadādatilolam ||
commentary:
anupametyādi. kamalaṃ padmaṃ pāṇau yasya sa kamalapāṇir avalokiteśvaro bhagavāñ jayatīti sambandhaḥ. kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? anupamam ity atipraṇītatvamahattvāsaṃsārasthāyitvalakṣaṇair dharmair yuktasyānyasyābhāvād upamārahitaṃ sukham eva rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ. punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? śrīḥ puṇyajñānasambhāralakṣaṇā, tasyā nivāsa āśrayo yaḥ sa tathā. dharmakāyarūpatvena sarvagatatvāt pratiniyatanivāsābhāvād anivāsaḥ.

punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? nirupamāḥ paramarūpayauvanaśṛṅgārādirasamahākaruṇādiyuktatvenopamātikrāntā rūpavajrāditārāparyantadaśadevīrūpā vidyāḥ parivārakatvena yasya sa tathā. saha svābhārūpayā vidyayā vartata iti savidyaḥ. tribhuvanasya tribhuvanavartino janasya yad dhitam āyatipathyaṃ buddhatvādikaṃ, saukhyaṃ tadātve pathyaṃ cakravartitvādikam, tayor yā prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyā, tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ kāro yasya sa tathā. aparinirvāṇadharmakatvenāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpatvenānyathātvalakṣaṇasya vikārasyābhāvād avikāraḥ. evaṃviśiṣṭo bhagavāñ jayati.

kiyantaṃ kālam ity āha—yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ. āśā daśa diśo gaganasvarūpāḥ. yadvā āśāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhavabhogatṛṣṇāḥ. tāsāṃ vikāśā avakāśāḥ pravartanāni, prādurbhāvā iti yāvat. te yāvat tāvad bhagavāñ jayati, sarvebhyo hariharahiraṇyagarbhādibhyaḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavatīty arthaḥ.

atrānupamasukharūpīty anena svārthasaṃpattiḥ kathitā. śrīnivāsa ity anena tadupāyaḥ, puṇyajñānasambhārayoḥ śrīśabdenābhihitatvāt. tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāra ity anena parārthasaṃpattir uktā. nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidya ity anena tadupāyaḥ, tathābhūtadaśadevīdvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyākāraśūnyena sarvākāraparārthasaṃpatteḥ kartum aśakyatvād iti.

root:
anābhogaṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ tac cācintyaṃ pracakṣate |
sañcintya yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi || SeNi 30 ||
commentary:
nanv apratiṣṭhānam acintyatā | sā cintyamānā āvaraṇatayā malam eveti śaṅkānirāsārtham āha—anābhogam ityādi | tac cāpratiṣṭhānam acintyaṃ jñānaṃ na tadvicārāgataṃ kim tarhy anābhogaṃ svarasābhyāgatam | kutaḥ | sañcintya vimṛśya yad acintyaṃ tad yasmād acintyaṃ na bhavati | tad uktaṃ jñānasiddhau—

	bauddhaṃ jñānam anābhogaṃ nirvikalpam ataḥ smṛtam |
	sañcintya kāraṇābhāvān na tu niścintyatā bhavet || 

iti ||

root:
sevitavyāḥ prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate |  
agupte kriyate duḥkhaṃ vyāḍacaurāgnibhūcaraiḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
prayatneneti guptau yatnaḥ prayatnaḥ. tam eva āha—yathā bhedo na jāyata iti. bheda udbhedaḥ svayam eva pareṣāṃ yuktibalād abhyūhaḥ. mantrabhedaś ca bhedaḥ. madauddhatyakopādibhiḥ svayaṃ tayā sahāyena vā parasmai kathanaṃ mantrabhedaḥ. 

aguptau narakapātādir adṛṣṭadoṣaḥ prasiddha eva. dṛṣṭadoṣam apy āha—agupta ityādinā. vyāḍādibhiḥ duḥkhaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ. vyāḍāḥ sarpavyāghrādayaḥ. bhūcarāḥ śāsakā narapiśācādayaḥ.

root:
yāvān sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
madhyamārtho nirāropas tatrāpohavidhī kutaḥ || SeNi 32 ||
commentary:
tad eva sopaskāram āha—yāvān ityādi | yatas tatra madhyamārthe yāvān samāropo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa sarvo nāsti | evaṃvidhaḥ samāropābhāvo vijñānanaye apīṣṭaḥ | ata āha—sarvatheti | tatra hi vijñānasya vastusattvasamāropāspadatvam asti | ato na tatra sarvathā samāropābhāvaḥ |

etena māyopamasiddhānto 'pi pratyuktaḥ | kutaḥ | āstāṃ tāvad atra sarvavikalpo 'dhyavasāyānām apohaviṣayatayā nirāropatvaṃ ca vijñānavāde 'pi nirāropasambhavāt | tato madhyamārtho nirāropo niṣprapañcaḥ | param ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ | vijñānavāde nirvikalpatve 'pi gāḍhataravijñānasadbhāvāvidyāvaśād āhatyollekhābhāve 'pi cetasi tadaiva svasaṃvidgrahāt pṛṣṭhe vedanagrahaḥ sphuṭa eva | 

nanu tavāpy etat samam | pṛṣṭhe sarvavikalpabhāvāt | na | apratiṣṭhānatvenānāstheyasattvānurodhāt saṃvṛtyā vyavahārāt | atas tatrāpohavidhī vidhiniṣedhau kutaḥ | naivety arthaḥ |

root:
vajragarbhe tadagre vā patitaṃ vā kapālake |
na ceṣṭam antarāle 'pi tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhāt || SeNi 22 ||
commentary: nanu ṣaṇṇāṃ kalaśābhiṣekatāpy uktā sarvatra kalaśavyāpārāt | sā tarhi katham | kalaśaśabdasya payodharopalakṣaṇatvena payodharavyāpārād atrāpi sā ghaṭate | tad etat sarvaṃ darśayati—hastetyādi | gatārtham ||

root:
śṛṇu vakṣye mahātantraṃ tantrarājeśvaraṃ param |
nāmnā caikallavīraṃ tu sattvānām āśusiddhaye ||1.7||
commentary: kāpi prauḍhagopī adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā dhyāyati | kim | madhusūdanavadanasarojam | madhudaityaṃ sūditavān marditavāniti madhusūdanaḥ tasya vadanameva sarojaṃ mukhakamalam | kiṃviśiṣṭam | vilāsavilolavilocanakhelanajanitamanojam | vilāsena līlayā vilole ca te vilocane nayane ca tābhyāṃ kṛtvā khelanaṃ tathā saha krīḍā tasmājjanito manojaḥ kandarpo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
praṇamya nāthaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam |
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā idam āha sthito 'grataḥ || 6 ||
commentary:
kiṃ kṛtvā | praṇamya | kaṃ | nātham iti | anāthānāṃ lokānām anuśāsanāt nāthaḥ svāmī | taṃ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭam nātham ity āha saṃbuddham iti samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ na śrāvakaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ vā || bhūyo 'pi nāthaṃ viśinaṣṭi bhagavantam iti bhagasaṃpannatvād bhagavān | caturmārabhaṅgād vā | tathā cāha |

	kleśakarma tathā janma kleśajñeyāvṛtī tathā |
	yena vaipakṣikā bhagnās teneha bhagavān smṛtaḥ || iti ||

anena nairuktena vidhinā kleśādikaṃ bhagnavān iti bhagavān | aiśvaryādiguṇayogād vā | tathā cāha |

	aiśvaryasya samgrasya rūpasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ |
	jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇām bhaga iti smṛtiḥ || iti ||

punar api kiṃbhūtaṃ nātham ity āha tathāgataṃ iti | tathatāṃ śūnyatāṃ gataḥ tathāgataḥ | atha vā yathā te tathāgatā gatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti tathā gacchatīti tathāgataḥ | taṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamyeti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ |

root:
prāyeṇaiva hi mīmāṃsā loke lokāyatīkṛtā | 
tāmāstikapathe kartum ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛto mayā || 1.10 ||
commentary: nanu mīmāṃsāyām api cirantananibandhanāni santīti kiṃ mudhā prayasyate | ata āha prāyeṇeti | lokāyataṃ nāma nāstikānāṃ tantram | tadbhāvamāpāditā nānāpasiddhāntasaṅgraheṇa | tāmāstikapathe kartum ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛta iti | āśaṃsāyāṃ vartamāne 'rthe vā kto varṇanīya iti ||

root:
na bāhūtkṣepakaṃ kaṃcic chabdayed alpasambhrame |
acchaṭādi tu kartavyam anyathā syād asaṃvṛtaḥ || 5.95 ||
commentary:
lokāprasādanivāraṇāyāha.

na bhujam utkṣipya kaṃcid āhvayet, alpaprayojanatāratamye. mahati punar adoṣaḥ. acchaṭādiśabdaṃ tu kuryāt. tadakaraṇe 'samāhitacāritāyām asaṃvṛtaḥ syāt. etāvatā auddhatyaparihāro 'pi darśito bhavati.

root:
tathā ca devīparipṛcchāśivanirnādatantra— 
ratnapuram idaṃ devi kiñjalke jalatāṃ vrajet |
rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
commentary: nanu śaivādīnāṃ kim etad asti | ata āha—ratnapuram ityādi | ratnaṃ maṇiḥ | tad eva puraṃ sthānaṃ yasya sukharūpābhimatasya tad ratnapuram | kiñjalke patitam | jalatāṃ niḥsāratām | rudro bhagavān | yugme samāpattau | śivaḥ kalyāṇāvāhakaḥ | ata eva śreṣṭhaḥ | saiva tattvaṃ śaktiś cidrūpā | parāc chreṣṭhāt parā śreṣṭhā tad eva ||

root:
vibuddhapuṇḍarīkākṣaḥ protphullakamalānanaḥ |
prollālayan vajravaraṃ svakareṇa muhur muhuḥ || 2 ||
commentary:
tad eva sopaskāram āha—yāvān ityādi | yatas tatra madhyamārthe yāvān samāropo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa sarvo nāsti | evaṃvidhaḥ samāropābhāvo vijñānanaye apīṣṭaḥ | ata āha—sarvatheti | tatra hi vijñānasya vastusattvasamāropāspadatvam asti | ato na tatra sarvathā samāropābhāvaḥ |

root:
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā |  
paścāt trividhaṃ yānti kāyavākcittabhedanaiḥ || 9 ||
commentary: nanu sarvabuddhāḥ pañcajñāninaḥ. tat kathaṃ kulabhedaḥ? gotrabhedāt. ādarśādīnām ekaikasya hi cchāyo gotram anādisiddhaṃ bodhisattvānām. anekasya tu cchāyā sattvagotraṃ ṣaṣṭham. ata evāha—kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur iti. saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhety anekacchāyasyāpy ekacchāyā balīyastvāt. trividham iti traividhyam. kāyavākcittabhedanair iti vacanāt svakāyavākcitteṣu sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittādhimokṣas tattvayoga iti gamyata eva.

root:
śaktisaṅgamasaṅkṣobhāc chaktyāveśāvasānikam |
yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate || Seni 13 ||
commentary:
bhagavatsiddhāntavedānte 'pi dṛṣṭāntopalakṣitaṃ prāg uktam āha—śaktītyādi | śaktir iti lalanā | tatsaṅgamaḥ samparkaḥ | tatsaṅkṣobhaḥ sañcālanaṃ tataḥ | śaktyāveśāvasānikam iti śaktyām aṅganāyām āveṣo 'bhiniveśa uttarottaro 'nutarāgas tadavasānikaṃ tatparyantajaṃ sukhaṃ yad brahmatattvasya jñānatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyaṃ svakīyam ucyate | anena bolagarbhatadagrāntarālakapālasthaiḥ sāmyam ācaṣṭe |

	sakalalalanāsamudgatasuratānandakṣaye kāle |
	nodeti saṃvid anyā tāvat kaulāgamābhyudayaḥ ||

iti vacanāt ||

root:
asaṃprajanyacittasya śrutacintitabhāvitam |
sacchidrakumbhajalavan na smṛtāv avatiṣṭhate || 5.25 ||
commentary:
anayoḥ samudāyābhāve doṣam uktvā pratyekam abhāve kathayitum āha.

na vidyate saṃprajanyaṃ yasmiṃs tad asaṃprajanyam. taccittaṃ yasya tasya. śrutacintābhāvanāmayaprajñāpariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu na smaraṇam adhivasati. tanmūlaṃ ca sarvaṃ kalyāṇam. kim iva? yathā sacchidrakumbhe mukhanikśiptam udakam adhastād gacchati nāvatiṣṭhate.

root:
adāntā mattamātaṅgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām |
karoti yām avīcyādau muktaś cittamataṅgajaḥ || 5.2 ||
commentary:
ito 'pi cittam eva rakṣaṇīyam ity āha.

aparikarmitā mattavaravāraṇā na janayanti tāṃ pīḍām iha loke. paraloke avīcyādau yāṃ karoti svacchandatayāvasthitaṃ cittam eva mataṅgaja eva. tathāgatājñāṅkuśena kathaṃcid vaśīkriyamāṇatvāt.

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre maṇḍalapaṭalo dvitīyaḥ || 2.25 ||
commentary: maṇḍalapradhānatvāt maṇḍalapaṭalaḥ || iti dvitāyapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
mahādānapatiḥ śreṣṭho mahāśīladharo 'graṇīḥ |
mahākṣāntidharo dhīro mahāvīryaparākramaḥ || 36 ||
commentary:
evaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyākṣāntikausīdyapratipakṣatayā tad eva dānaśīlakṣāntivīryapāramitātmakam iti | ata āha mahādānetyādi ||

tatra mahādānapatiḥ śreṣṭha iti vajralāsyā | pūjānugrahakāmyayā dīyata iti dānaṃ | tasya dānasya patir dānapatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau dānapatiś ca mahādānapatiḥ | āmiṣābhayadharmābhiṣekātmakacaturdānotsṛjanatayā śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokotkṛṣṭatvāt || mahāśīladharo 'graṇīr iti vajramālā | kāyavākcittānāṃ samādhānāc chīlaṃ | śīla samādhāv iti dhātvarthatvāt | daśākuśalaviratilakṣaṇaṃ prātimokṣasvabhāvaṃ ca | tad dhārayatīti śīladharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau śīladharaś ca mahāśīladharaḥ | ata evāgraṇīḥ purahsara ity arthah || mahākṣāntidharo dhīra iti vajragītā | kṣamaṇaṃ kṣāntis titikṣā tāṃ dhārayatīti kṣāntidharaḥ | mahaṃś cāsau kṣāntidharaś ca mahākṣāntidharaḥ | tataś ca dhīraḥ | mahatsv api duḥkheṣu dhairyāvalambanatvāt || mahāvīryaparākrama iti vajranṛtyā | vīryaṃ kuśala utsāhaḥ | pāpādau tūtsāhaḥ kusīdatvāt kausīdyam eva na vīryaṃ | tasya parākramaḥ sarvalaukikalokottarakuśalamūlaparipūraṇāt | 

ataś ca guhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakaṃ yathākramam ādarśādijñānaniṣpattau svavimokṣamukhaviśuddhibalenānābhogābhirativiśeṣotpādakatvāt ||

root:
yamadūtais tato grastaḥ kālapāśavaśīkṛtaḥ |
narakaṃ nīyate pāpī yadi buddhair api rakṣitaḥ ||1.13||
commentary: yamadūto yamapuruṣaḥ | grasto gṛhītaḥ | kālo mṛtyuḥ | sa hi pāśa iva pāśaḥ | narakamavīcyādikaṃ | buddhairiti buddhapraṇītamahāpratisarādirakṣāvidhibhiḥ ||

root:
viśuddhajñānadehāya trivedīdivyacakṣuṣe |
śreyaḥprāptinimittāya namaḥ somārdhadhāriṇe || 1.1 ||
commentary: vārttikārambhe śiṣṭācāramanuvidadhāno maṅgalaṃ tāvat karoti viśuddheti | dṛṣṭā hi śiṣṭānāṃ pravṛttiḥ sarvakāryeṣu maṅgalācaraṇapūrvikā | maṅgalaṃ ca devatāstutinamaskārādi | asya ca niyogataḥ phalavatkāryāntarārambhasaṃyogāt sākṣād aphalatvāc ca phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam iti nyāyena kāryāntaraśeṣatve 'vadhṛte satyārambhasya samāptiparyantatvād apekṣitāvighnaparisamāptiḥ phalam | apekṣitavidher anapekṣitavidhānaṃ durbalam iti nyāyena phalāntarakalpanāyā durbalatvāt | ato yathā sāmpradāyikam adhyāyānadhyāyādi svādhyāyāvighnārtham evam idam api | tad ayam arthaḥ viśuddhau jñānadehau yasya sa tathoktaḥ | viśuddhaṃ ca bhagavato jñānaṃ rāgādibhir jñānakāraṇānām adūṣitatvād dehaś cāyonijatvād vividhagarbhavedanāvirahāc ca | trivedī ca tasya cakṣur iti gauṇo vādaḥ asandigdhāviparītaspaṣṭavedārthaprakāśakatvāt | divyaṃ cātīndriyārthagocaratvāt | bhautikaṃ hi cakṣuḥ pratyutpannārthaviṣayam | idaṃ tv anāgatādiviṣayaṃ divyam iti | śreyasaś ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārātmano bhagavān nimittam | somārdhadhāriṇe somakalādhāriṇe | nama iti | yady api vigrahādipañcakaṃ devatādhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate tathāpyājyādistotravat pradhānakarmaṇa eva devatāstuter evaṅkṛtāyāḥ phalam ity adoṣa iti ||

root:
bhidyate mūrdhni vajreṇa vṛṣṭikāle na saṃśayaḥ |
tathyam etan mayā devi bhāṣitaṃ ca varānane || 1.18 ||
commentary: vṛṣṭikāla iti | prāyeṇa varṣaṇakāla eva tasya sadbhāvāt | varānane śobhanamukhi ||

root:
vācaḥ pallavayatyumāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ girāṃ jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||
commentary: umāpatidharo vācaḥ pallavayati kevalaṃ komalāṃ vācaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ | na tu girāṃ vāṇīnāṃ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ jānīte | tathā śaraṇaḥ kaviḥ ślāghyaḥ praśastaḥ | kasmin viṣaye | durūhadrute | duḥkhena apyūhituṃ śakyata iti durūhaḥ | durūhaṃ ca drutaṃ ca taṃ tasmin | atiśīghraṃ vaktuṃ samartha ityarthaḥ | tathā ācāryo govardhanaḥ ślāghyaḥ | kaiḥ śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanaiḥ | śṛṅgārottarāṇi śṛṅgārapradhānāni ca satprameyāni utkṛṣṭaprameyāni ca teṣāṃ racanāni | śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanāni taiḥ | tathā dhoyī nāma kavikṣmāpatiḥ kavirājaḥ śrutidharaḥ śrutyā śravaṇena dhārayatītyarthaḥ | asya ślokasya kaviḥ kṣmāpatiḥ rājā lakṣmaṇasenaḥ |

root:
evaṃ saṃkliṣṭam ālokya niṣphalārambhi vā manaḥ |
nigṛhṇīyād dṛḍhaṃ śūraḥ pratipakṣeṇa tat sadā || 5.54 ||
commentary: tvamevātmeśa iti | sarvastāvadātmane spṛhayāluḥ | vastutastu tvameva cidrūpo 'syātmā iti | atastvayyātmani svataḥsiddhā bhaktiḥ kevalaṃ samāveśayuktyā yadi tāṃ jānāti tajjayet sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata eva | niyoge liṅ ||

root:
evaṃ buddhvā tu yaḥ kaścid yogi lobhaviḍambitaḥ |
caṇḍasya maṇḍalādṛṣṭe deśayet tantram uttamam || 1.11 ||
commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

root:
pūrvaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittaṃ sadopasthāpyam īdṛśam |
nirindriyeṇeva mayā sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat sadā || 5.34 ||
commentary:
kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

root:
nānāvidhapralāpeṣu vartamāneṣv anekadhā |
kautūhaleṣu sarveṣu hanyād autsukyam āgatam || 5.45 ||
commentary:
ittham api niṣphalaṃ varjayed ity āha.

anekaprakāre 'saṃbaddhābhidhāne 'paropādhike pravartamāne, āścaryavastuṣu ca samasteṣu svayam api tatkriyāyāṃ darśanaśravaṇāya vākcittasya tāratamyaṃ nivārayet.

root:
kṣamyatāmaparaṃ kadāpi tavedṛśaṃ na karomi |
dehi sundari darśanaṃ mama manmathena dunomi ||
commentary: tathā sā rādhā alolam acañcalaṃ yathā bhavati tathā kapolaṃ na tyajati | kena | paṇitalena | kadā | sāyaṃkāle | kamiva | bālaśaśinamiva | bālaścāsau śaśī ceti | tamiva | samagraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇacandrānukāri bhavati | karatalapihitatadekadeśatvād bālacandreṇopamīyate |

root:
mahārthāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ pavitrām aghanāśanīm |
mañjuśrijñānakāyasya mattaḥ śrotuṃ samudyataḥ || 21 ||
commentary: tvamevātmeśa iti | sarvastāvadātmane spṛhayāluḥ | vastutastu tvameva cidrūpo 'syātmā iti | atastvayyātmani svataḥsiddhā bhaktiḥ kevalaṃ samāveśayuktyā yadi tāṃ jānāti tajjayet sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata eva | niyoge liṅ ||

root:
evam anviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāram atra te |
adhunā vada kasmāt tvaṃ kāyam adyāpi rakṣasi || 5.64 ||
commentary: evaṃ kathitanayena. sādhūktam iti cet, adhunā vada kasmāt tvam adyāpi sarvaguṇavikalam api kāyaṃ rakṣasi? evaṃ vidvān api.

root:
na santi tattvato bhāvāḥ śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitāḥ |
śaktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ sarvāropavināśinī || SeNi 9 ||
commentary:
evam ātmabhāvādīnām utsargaṃ rakṣāṃ ca pratipādya punar vistareṇa rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni pratipādayitum upakramate. utpāditabodhicittena hi bodhisattvena utsṛṣṭasyāpi cātmabhāvasya rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni kāryāṇi. yasmāt-

	paribhogāya sattvānām ātmabhāvādi dīyate |
	arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ kiṃ dattaṃ yan na bhujyate ||

	tasmāt sattvopabhogārtham ātmabhāvādi pālayet |
	kalyāṇamitrānutsargāt sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāt || (Sikṣāsamuccaya 5-6)

tac ca ātmabhāvādiparipālanādi śikṣārakṣaṇād eva syāt. anyathā narakādivinipātagamanāt tan na syāt. ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitumaśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā. cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

root:
saṅkṣepeṇāthavā tāvat paśyet sūtrasamuccayam |
āryanāgārjunābaddhaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca prayatnataḥ || 5.106 ||
commentary: vṛṣṭikāla iti | prāyeṇa varṣaṇakāla eva tasya sadbhāvāt | varānane śobhanamukhi ||

root:
śrījayadevakaveridaṃ kurute mudam e
maṅgalamujjvalagītaṃ jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: maṇḍalapradhānatvāt maṇḍalapaṭalaḥ || iti dvitāyapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
pāramparyeṇa sākṣād vā sattvārthaṃ nānyad ācaret |
sattvānām eva cārthāya sarvaṃ bodhāya nāmayet || 5.101 ||
commentary:
iyam api śikṣāpadamudrāvadhārayitavyety āha.

antataḥ svayamāhārādikriyayā parapreraṇayāparāparadūtapreraṇayā vā, sākṣāt svayam evāmiṣadānādinā vā, yat sattvānāṃ hitasukhahetur na bhavati, tan na kuryāt kārayed vā. na caitad eva kevalam. kiṃcit sattvānām eva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.

root:
nacaitāni parityajya pṛthag loke pramāṇatā |
saṃsāramocakādeśca hiṃsā puṇyatvasammatā || 5 ||
na paścāt puṇyamicchanti kecidevaṃ vigānataḥ |
mlecchāryāṇāṃ prasiddhatvaṃ na dharmasyopapadyate || 6 ||
commentary: nanu sannikṛṣṭārthagocaram eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam | ataḥ prasiddheḥ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthatvaṃ guṇaḥ na doṣāya ata āha na ceti | na ca pratyakṣādīni parityajya loko nāma pramāṇagaṇe pramāṇam upasaṃkhyāyate | varṇavivekasambandhāvadhāraṇayos tu pratyakṣādipramāṇatvaṃ vanasambandhaparihārayor abhidhāsyāma iti | api ca bhaved api prasiddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vyavasthitaiva prasiddhiḥ syāt | sā tv avyavasthitā | tathā hi saṃsāramocakā nāma nāstikā bāhyahiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ | anye tu tapaḥ prajāpatyādi pīḍātmakatvāt parapīḍāvat adharma ....... stu vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakau tadviparītau dharmādharmau saṅgirante | tad evaṃ mlecchāryāṇāṃ parasparavigānān na lokaprasiddhatvaṃ dharmādharmayor upapadyata ity āha saṃsāreti sārdhena ||

root:
atha vajradhara śrīmān durdāntadamakaḥ paraḥ |
trilokavijayī vīro guhyarāṭ kuliśeśvaraḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
padārthas tv adhunā vyākhyāyate || atheti vajradharam adhikṛtyāha tasyādhyeṣakatvena prastutatvāt | āryamāyājālaṣoḍaśasāhasrikamahāyogatantrāntaḥpātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavacchākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītir yā tasyā adhyeṣaṇārthaṃ bhagavān vajradharo mṛdvindriyasattvānugrahārthaṃ | punar apy athety āha | athaśabda ānantarye | atha vajradharo bhṛkuṭītaraṅgapramukhaiḥ sārdham nāthaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā agrataḥ sthita idam āheti saṃbandhaḥ || vajraṃ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ | anena padena gāmbhīryam abhidhīyate | śriyo devatyas tā vidyante yasyāsau śrīmān | anena caudāryaṃ sūcitaṃ | tataś ca kim uktaṃ bhavati | prajñopāyātmako bhagavān vajradhara iti | ata evoktaṃ śrīsaṃvare |

	sarvākāśāvakāśe śrīvajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |

iti | duḥkhena dāmyanta iti durdāntā īśvarādayas teṣāṃ damakaḥ śāsako vajradharavineyakatvāt teṣām īśvarādīnām | utkṛṣṭatvāṭ paro vajradharaḥ | bhūrlokabhuvarlokasvarlokā iti trayo lokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī || atha vā jayakaramadhukarasarvārthasiddhikarās trayo bhrātaras trilokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī | ata eva vīro bhagavān vajradharaḥ arair anabhibhavanīyatvāt || śrītattvasaṃgrahe pañca guhyāni paṭhyante | tathā hi |

	yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ yānti sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
	tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	mārayan sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhakāyaprayogataḥ |
	haraṃs tu paravittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	rāgatulyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti taj jinebhyaḥ samādadat |
	sattvārthāt paradārāṇi sevayan puṇyam āpnuyāt ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	sarvakarmāṇi kurvaṃs tu bahu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ||

iti ||

teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ guhyānāṃ rājā guhyarāṭ | guhyair vā rājata iti guhyarāṭ || kuliśo vajras tasyeśvaraḥ kuliśeśvaraḥ || bhagavān vajradharo 'grataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭa idaṃ vakṣyamānam āheti kriyāpadaṃ sarvatra yojanīyam ||

root:
mādhavikāparimalalalite navamālatijātisugandhau |
munimanasāmapi mohanakāriṇi taruṇākāraṇabandhau ||
commentary: kīrtir yaśaḥ. parivāraḥ dāsīdāsakarmakarādiḥ. upasthānaṃ pādadhāvanamardanādi. ebhir arthi tadabhilāṣaṃ mama cittam. tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat.

root:
duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare |
yair etad dharmasarvasvaṃ cittaṃ guhyaṃ na bhāvitam || 5.17 ||
commentary:
prajñā tu nirvivādā cittam evety āha.

pañcagatisaṃsārajātyādiduḥkhaṃ prahātuṃ tatprahāṇe nirvāṇasukham adhigantuṃ te sattvā mudhā nirarthakā eva bhramanty ambare kāsīpuṣpam iva niṣphalaṃ saṃsāre. yad anuṣṭhitaṃ kvacid api na lagnam iti tad eva mam idhīyate pañcāgnisevāśiroluñcanādivratam. ke punar evaṃ bhramanti? yaiḥ saṃsārabhayabhīrubhiḥ sukhārthibhiś ca dharmasarvasvaṃ sarvalaukikalokottarakarmanidānabhūtaṃ cittaṃ bālānām agocarasvabhāvatayā guhyaṃ na bhāvitaṃ tattvacittatayā punaḥ punaḥ sthirīkṛtam. tasmād iyam atitarāṃ cittam eva. yathopavarṇitam āryagaṇḍavyūhe-

	svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryā. svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvasattvaparipākavinayaḥ. peyālam. tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati-svacittam evopastambhayitavyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ. svacittam eva parisyandayitavyaṃ dharmameghaiḥ. svacittam eva pariśodhayitavyam āvaraṇīyadharmebhyaḥ. svacittam eva dṛḍhīkartavyaṃ vīryeṇa |

ityādi.

root:
na bāhūtkṣepakaṃ kaṃcic chabdayed alpasambhrame |
acchaṭādi tu kartavyam anyathā syād asaṃvṛtaḥ || 5.95 ||
commentary:
idam api bodhisattvenābhyasanīyam ity āha.

dakṣaḥ sarvatra paṭupracāraḥ. utthānasaṃpannaḥ kausīdyāpanayanād vīryasamanvāgataḥ. ata eva svayam eva sarvaṃ karaṇīyam, na parāpekṣā kvacid api karmaṇi kāryā. idam eva nāvakāśa ityādinā darśayati.

root:
santaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ  
sandeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya |  
gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ  
bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā ||
commentary: santaptānām iti || he payoda, tvaṃ santaptānām ātapena vā pravāsaviraheṇa vā saṃjvaritānām || "santāpaḥ sañjvaraḥ samau" ity amaraḥ || śaraṇaṃ payodānenātapakhinnānāṃ proṣitānāṃ svasthānapreraṇayā ca rakṣako 'si || "śaraṇaṃ gṛharakṣitroḥ" ity amaraḥ || tat tasmāt kāraṇād dhanapateḥ kuberasya krodhena viśleṣitasya priyayā viyojitasya me mama sandeśaṃ vārtā priyāyā hara | priyāṃ prati nayety arthaḥ | sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī || sandeśaharaṇenāvayoḥ santāpaṃ nudety arthaḥ | kutra sthāne sā sthitā tatsthānasya vā kiṃ vyāvartakaṃ tatrāha—gantavyeti || bahir bhavaṃ bāhyam || "bahirdevapañcajanebhyaś ca" iti yañ || bāhya udyāne sthitasya harasya śirasi yā candrikā tayā dhautāni nirmalāni harmyāṇi dhanikabhavanāni yasyāṃ sā tathoktā || "harmyādi dhanināṃ vāsaḥ" ity amaraḥ || anena vyāvartakam uktam || alakā nāmālaketi prasiddhā yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ vasatiḥ sthānaṃ te tava gantavyā | tvayā gantavyety arthaḥ || "kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā" iti ṣaṣṭhī ||

root:
upadeśo hi bhavati jñānaṃ tasyeti yojyate |
jñāyate yena tajjñānamekādhikaraṇatvataḥ || 9 ||
commentary: paṭarūpeṇeti | paṭaṃ lekhayet iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
bhavadbhaktimahāvidyā yeṣāmabhyāsamāgatā |
vidyāvidyobhayasyāpi ta ete tattvavedinaḥ || 1.12 ||
commentary: he keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa | dhṛtaṃ kacchapasya rūpaṃ yena sa tathā saṃbuddhiḥ | tava pṛṣṭhe kṣitiḥ pṛthvī tiṣṭhati | kiṃbhūte | ativipulatare | atiśayena vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe | dharaṇyāḥ bhūmerdharaṇaṃ tena kiṇaḥ mṛtaraktagranthiḥ | sa eva cakraṃ cakrākāraḥ tena gariṣṭhaṃ gurutaram | tasmin | jagadīśa hare iti sarvatra yojyam |

root:
mudrās tāvan na buddhyante catasraś ca catuḥkṣaṇāḥ |
yāvan na śabareśasya spṛśyante pādapāṃsavaḥ || SeNi 40 ||
commentary: pumvapuṣīti | prajñāsamparkonmukhe iti bhāvaḥ | hitaṃ tatkathanaṃ pañcākāreṇeti | nirmitādhārādheyaprapañcarūpeṇautpattikrameṇa ādikarmikāṇām etadvyātirekeṇa kathayitum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre ’bhiṣekapaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || 3.31 ||
commentary:
atra punar ādaram utpādayituṃ śāstrakāra āha.

añjaliṃ kṛtvā prārthayāmi. kimartham? smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca. na kevalāṃ smṛtim, nāpi kevalaṃ saṃprajanyam iti parasparāpekṣayā cakāradvayam. tatra smṛtir āryaratnacūḍasūtre 'bhihitā-

	yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati. yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti. yayā smṛtyā utpathe kumārge vā na patati. yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ na dadāti. iyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti.

saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyaṃ smṛtir ucyate—vihitapratiṣiddhayor yathāyogaṃ smaraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ. yac cāha—smṛtir ālambanāsaṃpramoṣa iti.

saṃprajanyaṃ tu prajñāpāramitāyām uktam-

	caraṃś carāmīti prajānāti. sthitaḥ sthito 'smīti prajānāti. niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇo 'smīti prajānāti. śayānaḥ śayito 'smīti prajānāti. yathā yathāsya kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathainaṃ prajānāti. peyālam. so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānacārī bhavati. ālokite vilokite saṃmiñjite prasārite saṃghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇe 'śite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodana āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tūṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānacārī bhavatīti.

idam eva vakṣyati—

	etad eva samāsena saṃprajanyasya lakṣaṇam |
	yat kāyacittāvasthāyāḥ pratyavekṣā muhurmuhuḥ || (Bodhicaryāvatāra 5.108)

iti.

root:
smitaṃ saṃdarśya lokānām apāyatrayaśodhanam |
trailokyābhāsakaraṇaṃ caturmārāriśāsanam || 18 ||
commentary: tāṃ rādhāṃ bhṛśamatyarthaṃ ramayāmi krīḍayāmi | kimbhūtām | hṛdi saṃgatām | hṛdaye saṃgatāṃ saṃlagnām | katham | aniśaṃ vāraṃvāram | kimiti vitarke | vane vanamadhye | anusarāmi | anugacchāmi | kimiha nikuñje vṛthā vilapāmi | mithyā paridevanaṃ karomi | kiṃ vitarke paripraśne kṣepe nindāprakāśayoriti vistaraḥ |

root:
tasmāt svadhiṣṭhitaṃ cittaṃ mayā kāryaṃ surakṣitam |
cittarakṣāvrataṃ muktvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ || 5.18 ||
commentary:
ittham api niṣphalaṃ varjayed ity āha.

anekaprakāre 'saṃbaddhābhidhāne 'paropādhike pravartamāne, āścaryavastuṣu ca samasteṣu svayam api tatkriyāyāṃ darśanaśravaṇāya vākcittasya tāratamyaṃ nivārayet.

root:
kuru padme yathā kāryaṃ dhairyaṃ dhairyaprayogataḥ |
svayaṃ caṇḍamahāroṣaḥ sthito hy atra mahāsukham || 3.28 ||
commentary: rajakītyādinoddeśaḥ. rañjanād ityādinā nirdeśaḥ. sattvānām iti vijñānānām.

root:
śaktisaṅgamasaṅkṣobhāc chaktyāveśāvasānikam |
yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate || Seni 13 ||
commentary: sthitveti || he megha, vane caranti te vanacarāḥ || tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam" iti bahulagrahaṇād lug bhavati || teṣāṃ vadhūbhir muktāḥ kuñjā latāgṛhā yatra tasmin || nikuñjakuñjau vā klībe latādipihitodare ity amaraḥ || tatra te nayanavinodo 'stīty arthaḥ | tasmin āmrakūṭe muhūrtam alpakālam | na tu ciraṃ svakāryavirodhād iti bhāvaḥ || "muhūrtam alpakāle syād ghaṭikādvitaye 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || sthitvā viśramya | toyotsargeṇa "tvām āsāra-" ity uktavarṣeṇena drutataragatir lāghavād dhetor atikṣipragamanaḥ san | tasmād āmrakūṭāt param anantaraṃ tatparaṃ vartma mārgaṃ tīrṇo 'tikrāntaḥ | upalaiḥ pāṣāṇair viṣame vindhyasyādreḥ pāde prasyantaparvate || "pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ" ity amaraḥ || viśīrṇāṃ samantato visṛmarām || etena kasyāścit kāmukyā priyatamacaraṇapāto 'pi dhvanyate || revāṃ narmadām || "revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekhalakanyakā" ity amaraḥ || gajasyāṅge śarīre bhaktayo racanāḥ | revā iti yāvat || "bhaktir niṣevaṇe bhāge racanāyām" iti śabdārṇave || tāsāṃ chedair bhaṅgibhir bhābhir viracitāṃ bhūtiṃ śṛṅgāram iva bhasitam iva vā || "bhūtir mātaṅgaśṛṅgāre jātau bhasmani saṃpadi" iti viśvaḥ || drakṣyasi | ayam api mahāṃs te nayana kautukalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaś carma bhaviṣyati |
upānaccarmamātreṇa channā bhavati medinī || 5.13 ||
commentary:
atrāśakyatāyām apy upāyena pravṛttau dṛṣṭāntopadarśanena śakyatām āha.

kaṇṭakādyupaghātarakṣaṇārthaṃ pṛthvī chādayitum ucitā. na caitac chakyam, tāvataś carmaṇo 'bhāvāt, bhāve 'pi chādanasyāśakyatvāt. upāyena punaḥ śakyam. upānahaś carmaṇā kevalena sarvā bhūmiś chāditā bhavati.

root:
candrakacārumayūraśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍalavalayitakeśam |
pracurapurandaradhanuranurañjitameduramudirasuveśam ||
commentary: punaḥ kathambhūtam | candra kacārumayūraśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍalavalayitakeśam | candrakāśca candrākārāsteścāravaḥ sundarāḥ te ca mayūraśikhaṇḍakā mayūrapicchāni teṣāṃ maṇḍalaṃ nikaraḥ tena valayitā veṣṭitāḥ keśā yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pracurapurandaradhanuranurañjitameduramudirasuveśam | pracuraṃ vistīrṇaṃ ca tat purandaradhanuśca tenānurañjito bhūṣitaḥ sa cāsau meduraḥ snigdhaḥ mudiro nīlameghaśca tasyeva veṣo yasya sa tathā tam | ayaṃ śyāmaḥ pītavasanena śakracāpayuktanīlameghavatpratīyate |

root:
navamaṃ madhyame tasya madhye khaḍgaṃ sunīlakam |
vajreṇāṅkitaṃ taṃ ca vajrakarttikapālayutam || 2.9 ||
commentary: vajreṇāṅkitam iti khaḍgasthaśrīkhaṇḍādhobhāge | evaṃ sarvatra karttikāyās tu muṣtyardhabhāge ||

root:
gambhīraśūnyapratibhāsamātra-
śāntātisūkṣmānabhilāpyaśabdaiḥ |
nirlepanīrūpanirañjanādyair
bhrāntir na kāryāparasādhyasattve || 20 ||
commentary: gambhīraśūnyaṃ pratibhāsamātraṃ śāntātisūkṣmam anabhilāpyaṃ nirlepaṃ nīrupam nirañjanādi, ādiśabdāt śivaṃ nirākāraṃ niṣprapañcam anādinidhanam ityādiśabdair bhrāntir na kartavyāparasādhyasattve 'parasya sādhyasya sattve sattāyām. ebhiḥ śabdair eva param api kiñcit sādhyaṃ kathitād astīti bhrāntir na kartavyā. athavā nātikathitam eva sādhyam ebhiḥ sarvair abhidhīyata iti niścayaḥ.

root:
maṇḍale caṇḍaroṣasya praviṣṭo yaḥ samāhitaḥ |
śraddhāyatnaparaś caṇḍe tasya tantraṃ tu deśayet || 1.9 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre tantrāvatāraṇapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ || 1.20 ||
commentary:
aparam api tadabhāve dūṣaṇam āha.

asaṃprajanyam eva saṃprajanyābhāvaḥ kleśasvabhāvaś cauraḥ, kuśaladhanāpaharaṇāt. tena smṛtimoṣānusāriṇā rakṣapālabhūtāyāḥ smṛteḥ pramoṣam abhāvam anusṛtya muṣitā viluptakuśaladhanāḥ santaḥ upacityāpi puṇyāni kuśaladhanānāṃ saṃcayaṃ kṛtvāpi durgatiparāyaṇā bhavanti.

root:
anupamasukharūpī śrīnivāso 'nivāso
nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidyaḥ |
tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāro 'vikāro
jayati kamalapāṇir yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
anupametyādi. kamalaṃ padmaṃ pāṇau yasya sa kamalapāṇir avalokiteśvaro bhagavāñ jayatīti sambandhaḥ. kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? anupamam ity atipraṇītatvamahattvāsaṃsārasthāyitvalakṣaṇair dharmair yuktasyānyasyābhāvād upamārahitaṃ sukham eva rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ. punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? śrīḥ puṇyajñānasambhāralakṣaṇā, tasyā nivāsa āśrayo yaḥ sa tathā. dharmakāyarūpatvena sarvagatatvāt pratiniyatanivāsābhāvād anivāsaḥ.

punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? nirupamāḥ paramarūpayauvanaśṛṅgārādirasamahākaruṇādiyuktatvenopamātikrāntā rūpavajrāditārāparyantadaśadevīrūpā vidyāḥ parivārakatvena yasya sa tathā. saha svābhārūpayā vidyayā vartata iti savidyaḥ. tribhuvanasya tribhuvanavartino janasya yad dhitam āyatipathyaṃ buddhatvādikaṃ, saukhyaṃ tadātve pathyaṃ cakravartitvādikam, tayor yā prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyā, tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ kāro yasya sa tathā. aparinirvāṇadharmakatvenāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpatvenānyathātvalakṣaṇasya vikārasyābhāvād avikāraḥ. evaṃviśiṣṭo bhagavāñ jayati.

kiyantaṃ kālam ity āha—yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ. āśā daśa diśo gaganasvarūpāḥ. yadvā āśāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhavabhogatṛṣṇāḥ. tāsāṃ vikāśā avakāśāḥ pravartanāni, prādurbhāvā iti yāvat. te yāvat tāvad bhagavāñ jayati, sarvebhyo hariharahiraṇyagarbhādibhyaḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavatīty arthaḥ.

atrānupamasukharūpīty anena svārthasaṃpattiḥ kathitā. śrīnivāsa ity anena tadupāyaḥ, puṇyajñānasambhārayoḥ śrīśabdenābhihitatvāt. tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāra ity anena parārthasaṃpattir uktā. nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidya ity anena tadupāyaḥ, tathābhūtadaśadevīdvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyākāraśūnyena sarvākāraparārthasaṃpatteḥ kartum aśakyatvād iti.

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadhikaṃ yadi manasā naṭaṇīyam |
harivirahākulavallavayuvatisakhīvacanaṃ paṭhanīyam ||
commentary: sotsavām iti sānandām | uccaiḥśayyām iti hastordhvocchrayām | mahāśayyām iti dantādibaddhāṃ | vikāla iti madhyāhnāt sūryodayakālaṃ yāvat ||

root:
pañcayogiprabhedena pañcamaṇḍalakalpanam |
kuryād ekāgracittena pūrvasevākṛtaśramaḥ || 2.23 ||
commentary:
lokalokottarakulam iti | lokṛ darśane | lokyata iti lokaḥ | tasya kulaṃ lokalokottarakulaṃ padmakulam ity arthaḥ ||

lokālokakulaṃ mahad iti | lokānām āloko lokālokaḥ | akṣobhyaḥ | ādarśajñānātmakatvāt | tasya kulaṃ lokālokakulaṃ mahad vajrakulam evāgryaṃ vairocanādīnāṃ bodhicittasvabhāvatvāt | tasya kulaṃ mahāmudrākulam ity arthaḥ || mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad iti | sarvatathāgatānāṃ traidhātukadharmarājyābhiṣekapradānān mahoṣṇīṣatvam | tasya kulaṃ mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad ratnakulam ity arthaḥ ||

āryanāmasaṃgītiṭīkāyāṃ nāmamantrārthāvalokinyāṃ ṣaṭkulāvalokanādhikāras tṛtīyaḥ || gāthe dve ||

root:
śikṣāsamuccayo 'vaśyaṃ draṣṭavyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ |
vistareṇa sadācāro yasmāt tatra pradarśitaḥ || 5.105 ||
commentary:
śikśāsamuccaye 'pi bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyam upadiṣṭam iti tad api nirūpaṇīyam ity āha.

śikśāsamuccayo 'pi svayam ebhir eva kṛtaḥ. avaśyaṃ niyamena. draṣṭavyaḥ punaḥpunar asakṛt, abhyasanīya iti bhāvaḥ. kutaḥ? yasmāt satāṃ bodhisattvānām ācaraṇam ācāra itikartavyatā. tatra śikṣāsamuccaye vistareṇa prabandhena pradarśitaḥ vispaṣṭīkṛtya prakāśitaḥ.

root:
tyajen na jīvitaṃ tasmād aśuddhe karuṇāśaye |
tulyāśaye tu tat tyājyam itthaṃ na parihīyate || 5.87 ||
commentary: lobhaḥ khānapānadhanapratigrahaḥ tena viḍambito bhartsitaḥ | caṇḍasyeti mukhyavṛttyā | etanmaṇḍalapraveśo yukta iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
vyādhyākulo naro yadvan na kṣamaḥ sarvakarmasu |
tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu || 5.24 ||
commentary:
kaḥ punar anayor vyatireke doṣaḥ, yenaite yatnena rakṣaṇīye kathite ity āha.

rogopahatasāmarthyo yathā puruṣaḥ sarvakarmasu gamanabhojanādiṣv akarmaṇyo bhavati, tathā smṛtisaṃprajanyābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ sarvakarmasu dhyānādhyayanādilakṣaṇeṣu.

root:
ullālayadbhiḥ svakaraiḥ prasphuradvajrakoṭibhiḥ |
prajñopāyamahākaruṇājagadarthakaraiḥ paraiḥ || 4 ||
commentary: athetyādi | maṇḍalavyatirekeṇābhiṣekasyāsadbhāvāt tantraśravaṇādhikāro na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ | pañcamānam ity ekasyāpi pañcaprakāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tu pañcānāṃ yathā kramaṃ ||

root:
dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭhite vadet |
sacchatradaṇḍaśastre ca nāvaguṇṭhitamastake || 5.88 ||
commentary: mohacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahāmoha iti || mahāmaheti pūrvavat | mahāmoho vairocanaḥ | dhiyāṃ moho dhīmohaḥ | mūḍhaś cāsau dhī mohaś ca mūḍhadhīmohaḥ | tasya sūdano vināśakaḥ || krodhacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahākrodha iti | tathaiva mahāmaheti | mahākrodha ity amoghasiddhiḥ | mahākrodharipur mahān iti | sattvāsattvaviṣayatvād mahākrodhaḥ | tasya sa eva mahāripur iti ||

root:
kī santu harisa vihohia śunnahi karasi paveśa |
tojju nimantaṇa karia manua cchai lohāśeṣa || rāgavajryāḥ || 4.29 ||
commentary: sthitveti || he megha, vane caranti te vanacarāḥ || tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam" iti bahulagrahaṇād lug bhavati || teṣāṃ vadhūbhir muktāḥ kuñjā latāgṛhā yatra tasmin || nikuñjakuñjau vā klībe latādipihitodare ity amaraḥ || tatra te nayanavinodo 'stīty arthaḥ | tasmin āmrakūṭe muhūrtam alpakālam | na tu ciraṃ svakāryavirodhād iti bhāvaḥ || "muhūrtam alpakāle syād ghaṭikādvitaye 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || sthitvā viśramya | toyotsargeṇa "tvām āsāra-" ity uktavarṣeṇena drutataragatir lāghavād dhetor atikṣipragamanaḥ san | tasmād āmrakūṭāt param anantaraṃ tatparaṃ vartma mārgaṃ tīrṇo 'tikrāntaḥ | upalaiḥ pāṣāṇair viṣame vindhyasyādreḥ pāde prasyantaparvate || "pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ" ity amaraḥ || viśīrṇāṃ samantato visṛmarām || etena kasyāścit kāmukyā priyatamacaraṇapāto 'pi dhvanyate || revāṃ narmadām || "revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekhalakanyakā" ity amaraḥ || gajasyāṅge śarīre bhaktayo racanāḥ | revā iti yāvat || "bhaktir niṣevaṇe bhāge racanāyām" iti śabdārṇave || tāsāṃ chedair bhaṅgibhir bhābhir viracitāṃ bhūtiṃ śṛṅgāram iva bhasitam iva vā || "bhūtir mātaṅgaśṛṅgāre jātau bhasmani saṃpadi" iti viśvaḥ || drakṣyasi | ayam api mahāṃs te nayana kautukalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhaṇamukulitapulakitacūte |
vṛndāvanavipine parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhaṇamukulitapulakitacūte | sphurantī puṣpavantī cāsau atimuktalatā ca vāsantī | tasyāḥ parirambhaṇaṃ kartari ṣaṣṭhī | tena mukulitaḥ pulakitaḥ romodgamaśca cūta āmravṛkṣo yatra sa tathā tasmin | kasmin sthāne harirviharati | vṛndāvanavipine | vṛndāvanākhyaṃ yadvipinaṃ vanaṃ tattasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte | parisare samīpe parigataṃ samantādgataṃ tacca tadyamunājalaṃ ca tena pūte pavitrībhūte tasmin |

root:
rakṣasīmaṃ manaḥ kasmād ātmīkṛtya samucchrayam |
tvattaś cet pṛthag evāyaṃ tenātra tava ko vyayaḥ || 5.60 ||
commentary: madhusūdanasya murāreḥ uro vakṣo vo yuṣmākaṃ priyam apekṣitam anupūrayatu | karotvityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtam uraḥ | padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritam | padmāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ payodharau tayostaṭī parisaraḥ pārśvabhāgaḥ tasyāḥ parirambhaḥ upagūhanaṃ tena lagnaṃ ca tat kāśmīraṃ kuṅkumaṃ ca tena mudritam | tatstanākāramaṇḍalākṛticihnitam | mamedaṃ murāreruro na tvanyasyāḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa mudritaṃ cihnitam | anyo 'pi svavastuni dravye vā granthimudrāṅkalakṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtamiva | vyaktānurāgamiva | antaḥsthitaḥ san bahirniḥsṛtya vyaktaḥ āvirbhūtaḥ anurāgaḥ prema yasmin tattathā tadiva | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | khelavanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūram | khelat krīḍaṃścāsau anaṅgaśca tena khedaḥ prayāsaḥ tena svedāmbu svedarūpaṃ nīraṃ tasya pūraḥ pravāhaḥ samūho yatra tattathā tasmin tat | gītārthaṃ ślokena sūcayati |

root:
mukhapāko bhavet tasya yadi buddhasamo 'pi hi | 
śraddhāhīno 'thavā śiṣyaḥ śṛṇute jijñāsanāya ca || 1.17 ||
commentary: hanyād iti māmakyāṃ mātari kāmacittam adhiṣṭhāya pitur akṣobhyasya māraṇaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ bhakṣayet svadeha evāntar bhāvayet | etenaitad uktaṃ bhavati | krodhādveṣālape jātāmāraṇārthāndhacintakāḥ | na sidhyanti māraṇenaiva krodhabhāvanayā sthitāḥ | kāmayed iti akṣobhyasya sthāne sthitveti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
vajraṃ ḍombī bhaven mudrā padmaṃ nartī tathaiva ca |  
karma rajakī samākhyātā brāhmaṇī ca tathāgatā || 6 ||
commentary: eṣāṃ kulānāmuttamatve kimetāsāmityāha—vajramityādi |

root:
saṃpūrya dānādiguṇān aśeṣān
saṃbuddhakṛtyaṃ sakalaṃ ca kṛtvā |
yad bhūtakoṭeḥ karaṇaṃ ca sākṣāt
sādhyaṃ tad apy asti nirodharūpam || 7 ||
commentary: saṃpūryetyādi. dānādipāramitā eva guṇā, guṇyante 'bhyasyanta iti kṛtvā. tān saṃpūrya paripūrṇān kṛtvā, yat saṃbuddhānāṃ kṛtyaṃ sakalam avaśyakartavyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad api kṛtvā, bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇāyāś cittacaittanirodhātmikāyā yat sākṣāt karaṇaṃ tad api sādhyam astīti pāramitānayasthā evaṃ bruvate caturthaṃ sādhyam iti.

root:
mīmāṃsāśāstratejobhir viśeṣeṇoj jvalīkṛte | 
vedārthajñānaratne me tṛṣṇātīva vijṛmbhate || 1.9 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ prativacanāntaraṃ ṣaṭkulāvalokanam adhikṛtyāha | atha śākyamunir bhagavānityādi | tatra sakalaṃ mantrakulaṃ mahad iti grahaṇakavākyam etat sāmānyenopāttaṃ | tad vyavalokya girāṃ pater mañjuśrījñānasattvasya saṃbandhinī yānutpādadharmiṇī gāthā tām imāṃ bhāṣate smeti | vakṣyamāṇakriyāpadena saha saṃbandhaḥ ||

mantravidyādharakulam iti | vidyāṃ dhārayatīti vidyādharaḥ | mantrātmakaś cāsau vidyādharaś ca mantravidyādharaḥ | na dhāraṇyātmakaḥ | tasya kulaṃ mantravidyādharakulaṃ karmakulam ity arthaḥ || kulatrayam iti kāyavākcittasvabhāvatvād vairocanakulaṃ ||

root:
anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |
murārimārādupadarśayantyasau sakhī samakṣaṃ punarāha rādhikām ||
commentary: adhyeṣaṇānantaraṃ prativacanam āha | atha śākyamunir ityādi | śākyakulānāṃ muniḥ kāyavākcittamaunayogān muniḥ | bhagavān saṃbuddha iti gatārthaḥ | dvipadottama iti dvipadā devamanuṣyāḥ | teṣām uttamaḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ | svajihvāṃ nirṇamayyopasaṃhṛtya svamukhād iti svamukha āyatām iti dīrghāṃ sphītām iti bahalatarāṃ śubhām iti dakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhanibhāṃ | sarvadharmālayāṃ ca ||

root:
ānandāḥ pratimudraṃ syur mahāmudrāṃ vinā punaḥ |
āgamāc ca svasaṃvitteḥ sadguror upadeśataḥ || SeNi 27 ||
commentary:
adhunā pratyekaṃ mudrāṇāṃ caturānandasvabhāvatām āha—ānandā ityādi | mudrāṃ mudrāṃ pratyānandāś catvāro mahāmudrāṃ vihāya jñeyāḥ | etadartham eva cāgamād ityādinā hetutrayam āha | tathā hy āgamaḥ—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ityādinā hevajrādiṣu vicitrādīnām ānandāditvam uktam | tataś ca yatraiva vicitrādisambhavas tatraivānandādivyavasthā | tatsambhavaś ca mudrātraya eva na mahāmudrāyām | ayaṃ cārthaḥ svasaṃvedanarūpaḥ sphuṭa eva | sadgurūpadeśaś ca vicitretyādivakṣyamāṇa iti ||

root:
yato nivāryate yatra yad eva ca niyujyate |
tal lokacittarakṣārthaṃ śikṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā samācaret || 5.107 ||
commentary:
niyamena śikṣādarśane 'pi sākalyena sarveṣām upayogam āha.

yato heyād akaraṇīyān nivāryate, na karaṇīyam etad iti pratiṣidhyate yatra śikśāsamuccaye sūtrasamuccaye vā. yad eva karma kartavyatayā niyujyate vidhīyate, tat prasiddhaṃ vihitaṃ vā. lokānāṃ cittam āśayaḥ tasya rakṣārtham, tadyathā vikopitaṃ na syāt. śikṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā śikṣāsamuccayādiṣu. pratipādaṃ samācaret, yatra yad yathā yujyate, tatra tathā vyavaharet. anyathā arthasaṃmūḍhavyavahārasyāpattikaśmalatā syāt.

etāvatā ātmabhāvasya śuddhir ākhyātā. yad āha-

	ātmabhāvasya kā śuddhiḥ pāpakleśaviśodhanam |
	saṃbuddhoktyanusāreṇa yatnābhāve tvapāyagaḥ || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 19)

iti.

root:
kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tyaktvā sātamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt |
śuddhaṃ sākṣāc chakyate naiva kartuṃ
tenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasya || 10 ||
commentary: nāryaḥ striyaḥ | sarvastrīṇāṃ dehaḥ puruṣasamparkonmukhaḥ tasmin sthitā ||

root:
vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam ityādi susthitaṃ katham |
maṇyantargatam ityādi sadguroḥ suṣṭhu saṅgatam || SeNi 23 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ vicitrasusthāpanārtham āha—vicitram ityādi | sadguror ityādinā

	vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam || 

ity uddeśāt | atra hy ādigrahaṇād gṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitraṃ vivakṣitam |

nanu ghṛṣṭiparyantam iti katham gamyate |

	bāhubhyāṃ ca samāliṅgya prajñāṃ vai ṣoḍaśābdikām |
	ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogād ācāryasecanaṃ matam || 

iti nirdeśāt | atra ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogaḥ padmavajrasparśo vivakṣitaḥ | 

nanv ayam ācāryasekaḥ | ādāv ācāryaś ca vicitram iti kuto jñeyaḥ |

	ānandādyāḥ kramaśo jñeyāś catuḥsecanasaṅkhyayā || 

iti pratinirdeśāt | atrānandādyāś catvāraḥ—

	ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthaṃ tat punas tathā | 

iti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ jñeyāḥ | ānandaś ca vicitra eva kṣaṇa iti ghṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitram |

	vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam || 

ity uddeśān maṇyagraṃ yāvat paramaḥ sukharūpatvāt paramasya | 

nanv etat katham | 

	paramānande tu samprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe |
	śāstā brūyān mahāsattva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukham || 

iti nirdeśāt | atraiva nānātvavarjite kṣana ityādy arthasadbhāvād iti sarvasustham | maṇyantargatam ityādi ca gatārtham | 

yadi ghṛṣṭiparyantam ānandaḥ sa cācāryo maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ sa ca guhyas tarhi—

	hasitaśuddhyā tv ācārya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |
	prajñā pāṇyavāpatau tu tat punar dvandvatantrake || 

iti katham | bāhyotpattyā tan neyam | tarhy udakābhiṣekādīnām ācāryatoktā yā sā katham | sāpi bāhyotpattyā jñeyā | tathāgatāśvāsānande cācāryatā gambhīrotpattyā vajradharāśvāsānadne cotpannena | caturmudrāpakṣe ca pariniṣpannenācāryatvena karmudrā boddhavyā ||

root:
dattvāsmai vetanaṃ tasmāt svārthaṃ kuru mano 'dhunā |
na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate || 5.69 ||
commentary:
ekayādvitīyayānyastriyā. gṛhipravrajitayor idam iha sādhāraṇam ity anyagrahaṇam. na kuryād yānādi. saṃkṣepeṇa saṃkalayya darśayann āha. lokānāṃ yat prasādajanakaṃ na bhavati, tat sarva dṛṣṭvā śāstre vyavahāre vā. pṛṣṭvā vijñān. varjayet. anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati—dṛṣṭe 'pi yadbādhākaram evaṃvidhaṃ tadvarjayet āpattir bhavatīti. yaduktam—

	ratnameghe jinenoktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ |
	yenāprasādaḥ sattvānāṃ tad yatnena parityajet || (Śikṣasamuccaya 12)

iti.

yathāha- katame ca te bodhisattvasamudācārāḥ? yāvadiha bodhisattvo nāghaḥsthāne viharati, nākāle | nākāle bhāṇī bhavati | nākālajño bhavati | nādeśajño bhavati | yatonidānamasyāntike sattvā aprasādaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ | sa sarvasattvānurakṣayā ātmanaśca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ samyagīryāpatho bhavati, mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī asaṃsargabahulaḥ pravivekābhimukhaḥ suprasannamukhaḥ iti ||

teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ  
gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā |  
tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yasmāt  
sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi ||
commentary: tasyeti || rājāno yakṣāḥ || "rājā prabhau nṛpe candre yakṣe kṣatriyaśakrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || rājñāṃ rājā rājarājaḥ kuberaḥ || "rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ" ity amaraḥ | "rājāhaḥ sakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭacpratyayaḥ || tasyānucaro yakṣaḥ | antarbāṣpo dhīrodāttatvād antaḥ stambhitāśruḥ san | kautukādhānahetor abhilāṣotpādakāraṇasya || "kautukaṃ cābhilāṣesyād utsave narmaharṣayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || tasya meghasya puro 'gre katham api | garīyasā prayatnenety arthaḥ || "jñānahetuvivakṣāyām apy ādi katham avyayam | katham ādi tathāpy antaṃ yatnagauravabāḍhayoḥ" ity ujjvalaḥ || sthitvā ciraṃ dadhyau cintayām āsa || "dhyai cintāyām" iti dhātor liṭ || manovikāropaśamanaparyantam iti śeṣaḥ || vikārahetum āha meghāloka iti || meghāloke meghadarśane sati sukhino 'pi priyādijanasaṅgatasyāpi cetaś cittam anyathābhūtā vṛttir vyāpāro yasya tadanyathāvṛtti bhavati | vikṛtim āpadyata ity arthaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini kaṇṭhāliṅganārthini jane | dūre saṃsthā sthitir yasya tasmin dūrasaṃsthe sati kiṃ punaḥ | virahiṇaḥ kim uta vaktavyam ity arthaḥ | virahiṇāṃ meghasandarśanam uddīpanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ || arthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ daṇḍinā - "jñeyaḥ so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiñcana | tatsādhanasamarthasya nyāso yo 'nyasya vastunaḥ" iti ||

commentary: idaṃ gītaṃ śrījayadevabhaṇitam | udayati rājate kimbhūtam | haricaraṇasmṛtisāram | hareścaraṇau tayoḥ smṛtiḥ smaraṇam tatra sāraṃ mukhyasevanabhūtam | punaḥ kimbhūtam | anugatamadanavikāram | anugato 'nusphurito madanena vikāro yasmin | pathikavadhūjanajanitavilāpe ityasyābhiprāyaṃ vasante ślokābhyāṃ spaṣṭayati |

commentary: kadācid iti | kadācit kasyāṃcit samādhidaśāyāṃ kvāpi hṛdayacakrādau yogena cittavṛttinirodhena, īśa svāmin, asi tvaṃ labhya ityeṣā vañcanā | anyathā samādhivyutthānādyabhimatāsu kakṣyāsu kathaṃ bhaktimatāṃ prakāśase |

sātatyābhiniveśotthaṃ pratipakṣottham eva ca |
guṇopakārikṣetre ca duḥkhite ca mahac chubham || 5.81 ||
commentary:
tatprasaṅgena anyad api darśayann āha.

samādānena kriyamāṇam. abhiniveśotthaṃ tīvraprasādajanitam. pratipakṣotthaṃ kleśapratipakṣaśūnyatādibhāvanāprasūtam. guṇakṣetraṃ buddhabodhisattvādi. upakārikṣetraṃ mātāpitādi. duḥkhitā glānādayaḥ. eteṣu svalpamati kṛtam aprameyaśubhahetur upajāyate.

root:
yātītair bhāṣitā buddhair bhāṣiṣyante hy anāgatāḥ |
pratyutpannāś ca saṃbuddhā yāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ || 12 ||
commentary: nanu sarvabuddhāḥ pañcajñāninaḥ. tat kathaṃ kulabhedaḥ? gotrabhedāt. ādarśādīnām ekaikasya hi cchāyo gotram anādisiddhaṃ bodhisattvānām. anekasya tu cchāyā sattvagotraṃ ṣaṣṭham. ata evāha—kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur iti. saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhety anekacchāyasyāpy ekacchāyā balīyastvāt. trividham iti traividhyam. kāyavākcittabhedanair iti vacanāt svakāyavākcitteṣu sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittādhimokṣas tattvayoga iti gamyata eva.

munijanamānasahaṃsa jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: kiṃbhūta | he dinamaṇimaṇḍalamaṇḍana | dinasyāhno maṇiḥ sūryaḥ tasya maṇḍalaṃ tad maṇḍayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he bhavakhaṇḍana | ātmabhaktānāṃ sevakānāṃ bhavo janma khaṇḍayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | muktiṃ dadātītyarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | hai munijanamānasahaṃsa | munayaśca te janāśca teṣāṃ mānasāni tatra haṃsaḥ tasya saṃbodhane | svacchatayā śuddhabhāvena hṛdayasya mānasasarovarasya śabdacchalena tulyatā | jaya jaya deva hare pratipad‌ayojaneyamityarthaḥ |

commentary: rādhāṃ prati sahacarī sakhī sarasaṃ yathā syāttathā yadagre gītena vakṣyamāṇaṃ idameva ūce uvāca | rasena saha vartata iti sarasam | tatkriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ napuṃsakameva | kiṃbhūtām rādhām | valadbādhāṃ valantī vardhamānā bādhā vyathā yasyāstām | kasmin kāle | vasante | kiṃbhūtām bhramantīṃ calantīm | kasmin | kāntāre durge pathi mārge | kairavayavaiḥ | caraṇādibhiḥ | kiṃbhūtaiḥ | vāsantīkusumasukumāraiḥ | vāsantī mādhavīlatā | tasyāḥ kusumāni | tadvat sukumārā mṛdulāḥ taiḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtām | bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām | bahudhā anekaprakāreṇa athavā bahuvāraṃ vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇānusaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇaṃ yayā sā tathā tām| kayā hetubhūtayā| amandaṃ atyarthaṃ yathā syāttathā kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā | dāhahetutvāt kandarpa eva jvaraḥ athavā kandarpeṇa jvarastena janitā prādurbhūtā jīvanacintā tayā ākulā vyākulā tasyāḥ bhāvastayā |

commentary: niryūhaṃ dvāranirgamaṃ | tadardhena niryūhārdhena | tasyās tv iti ||

root:
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |  
tiṣṭhetau mantradevau ca niṣprapañcasvabhāvataḥ || 11 ||
commentary:
satyadvayam adhikṛtyāha—nāsti ityādi. nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'stīti bhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ. bhāvakaḥ kartā. bhāvanā kriyā. dvayam idaṃ bhāvanīyāt pṛthag naiva draṣṭavyam. devatāmantrābhyām anyo nāham. bhāvanāpi tayoḥ prakāśarūpataiva, nānyety eṣa tattvādhimokṣaḥ kartavya ity arthaḥ. tattvaṃ satyaṃ bhūtam iti paryāyāḥ. atas tattvapaṭale satyadvayaṃ vaktavyam.

tatra sarva eṣa vistaraḥ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramaudāryasādhanam adhikṛtyoktam. paramagāmbhīryasādhanaṃ paramārthasatyam adhikṛtyāha—mantram ityādi. tāv api devatāmantrau paramārthato na staḥ. kutaḥ? yathāpratibhāsam asattvād iti bhāvaḥ.

paramārthatas tarhi, kathaṃ tau sta ity āha—santiṣṭheta ityādi. prapañcair viparyāso bhrāntir ity eko 'rthaḥ. tatra sarvabhrāntīnām agocaratvād dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. tanaiva samyagjñānena sabījasaṃkleśakṣayāt pratiṣṭhādehabhoganirbhāsānāṃ ca vijñaptīnāṃ prahāṇād anāsravo dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. trayam idaṃ viśuddhākāśanibham anantam aprapañcam dharmakāyam ity arthaḥ. tad eva svabhāvaḥ tena svabhāvena sākṣātkarttavyāv iti bhāvaḥ.
