dhārmikādhārmikatvābhyāṃ pīḍānugrahakāriṇau |

idaṃ puṇya midaṃ pāpamityetasmin padadvaye |
ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāmalpaṃ śāstraprayojanam || 3 ||
commentary: prasiddhimeva darśayati dhārmiketi hyantena | anugrahakāriṇi hi laukikā dhārmikaśabdaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante | pīḍākāriṇi cādhārmikaśabdam | yaśca dharmam ācarati sa dhārmikaḥ | tad yady anugraho dharmaḥ tad evam upapadyate nānyatheti | etad eva bhagavato vyāsasyāpy abhimatam iti darśayati tatheti prayojanamantena | nirviṣayaprayogāsambhavāt tadviṣayam idamā pratinirdiśati | tad ayam arthaḥ viśiṣṭaviṣaye puṇyapāpapadadvaye ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vidyamāne tenaiva dharmādharmapramitisiddher anarthakaṃ śāstram iti | nanv evaṃ puṇyapāpapramāṇakau dharmādharmāvuktau na lokapramāṇakau | naivam | tatprayogasyaiva lokāyattatvāt | tasmādayam anupālambha iti ||

commentary:
idam api bodhisattvenābhyasanīyam ity āha.

dakṣaḥ sarvatra paṭupracāraḥ. utthānasaṃpannaḥ kausīdyāpanayanād vīryasamanvāgataḥ. ata eva svayam eva sarvaṃ karaṇīyam, na parāpekṣā kvacid api karmaṇi kāryā. idam eva nāvakāśa ityādinā darśayati.

commentary:
syād etat—kim anyasminn asann api doṣa ucyate ity atrāha.

carmam ayaṃ puṭam. svamativiśeṣeṇa pṛthak kuru svakāyād apasāraya. asthighaṭitapañjarād yantrāt prajñātmakena śastreṇa māṃsakartanena.

commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

commentary:

ityādinā hevajrādiṣu vicitrādīnām ānandāditvam uktam | tataś ca yatraiva vicitrādisambhavas tatraivānandādivyavasthā | tatsambhavaś ca mudrātraya eva na mahāmudrāyām | ayaṃ cārthaḥ svasaṃvedanarūpaḥ sphuṭa eva | sadgurūpadeśaś ca vicitretyādivakṣyamāṇa iti ||

tato hi deśayet tantraṃ triṣu lokeṣu durlabham |
aśrutaṃ deśayed yo ’pi so ’pi gacchaty adhogatim || 1.16 ||
commentary:
tad eva prajñāpariśuddhimātrāpekṣayā yathoktaśūnyatāprabhedamukhena maitreyādiṣoḍaśasamādhyātmakam ity ata āha ||

tatra mahāmaitrīmayo 'meya iti maitreyaḥ | mitram asyāstīti maitraṃ | paścān ṅibantaṃ | tataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitrīmayo maitrīsvabhāvaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau maitrīmayaś ca mahāmaitrīmayaḥ | ata evāmeyaḥ sakalasattvadhātāv ekaputraprematvāt || mahākāruṇiko 'gradhīr iti mañjuśrīḥ | mahākaruṇā anālambanātmikā | sā yasyāsti sa mahākāruṇikaḥ | agradhīr iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānam | tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati | audāryagāmbhīryātmako 'sau bhagavān iti || mahāprājño mahādhīmān iti gandhahastī | mahatī prajñā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇātmikā sā yasyāsti sa prājñaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau prājñaś ca mahāprājñaḥ | ata eva mahādhīmān || mahopāyo mahākṛtīti jñānaketuḥ | mahān upāyo yasyāsau mahopāyaḥ | tataś ca mahākṛtī mahāpaṇḍitaḥ sarvasattvāśayānuśayajñatayā saddharmaprakāśakatvāt ||

root:
jayanti bhaktipīyūṣarasāsavavaronmadāḥ |
advitīyā api sadā tvaddvitīyā api prabho || 5 ||
commentary:
sāmānyāpattiśodhanāyāha.

triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ, triṣkṛtvo divasasya. triskandhaḥ trayāṇāṃ skandhānāṃ pāpadeśanāpuṇyānumodanābodhipariṇāmanānāṃ samāhāraḥ. triskandhaṃ pravartayet. śeṣā mūlāyā anyāḥ. athavā, saṃcitya kṛtā yāḥ pratikṛtās tābhyo 'nyāḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣeṇāsaṃprajānatā vā kṛtāḥ. tāsāṃ praśamaḥ pratikaraṇaṃ tena triskandhaparivartanena bodhicittasya jinānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ samāśrayaṇāc ca. etena vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādayo darśitā bhavanti.

tatra pāpaśodhanaṃ caturdharmakasūtre deśitam—

	caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati. katamaiś caturbhiḥ? yad uta vidūṣaṇāsamudācāreṇa, pratipakṣasamudācāreṇa, pratyāpattibalena, āśrayabalena ca. tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā vipratisārarūpāt savigarhaṇā pāpadeśanā, tadanuṣṭhānaṃ tatsamudācāraḥ. tatra pratipakṣasamudācāro 'kuśalapratipakṣaḥ kuśalam, tatsamudācāraḥ, kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyantam abhiyogaḥ. tatra pratyāpattibalaṃ saṃvarasamādānād akaraṇasaṃvaralābhaḥ | tatrāśrayabalaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghaśaraṇagamanam, anutsṛṣṭabodhicittatā ca. sa balavatsaṃniśrayeṇa na śakyate pāpenābhibhavitum. ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavat.

iit. viśeṣatas tu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ ca deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktāḥ. tāḥ śikṣāsamuccaye draṣṭavyāḥ.

sarvāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivam ekākinā deśayitavyāḥ. tatreyaṃ deśanā—aham evaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmīty ārabhya yāvat saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi, namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya. namo vajrapramardine ityārabhya yāvat.

upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ.

iti vistaram uktvāha-iti hi śāriputra bodhisattvena imān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaviśuddhiḥ kāryā. tasyaivaṃ pāpaviśuddhasya ta eva buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti. peyālam. na tat śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad bodhisattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanena āpattikaukṛtyān niḥsarati, samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate. etat sākalyena śikṣāsamuccaye veditavyam.

ukto vidūṣaṇāsamudācāraḥ. pratipakṣasamudācārapratyāpattibale 'pi vistareṇa śikṣāsamuccayād eva draṣṭavye. āryamaitreyavimokṣe tu bodhicittena pāpaviśuddhir uktā. taccoktam eva prāk. jināśrayāt pāpaviśuddhau sūkarikāvadānam udāhāryam.

	ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim |
	prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te ||

evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāṭhaḥ. anenāśrayabalamuktam.

root:
tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ kautukādhānahetor  
antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau |  
meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ  
kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe ||
commentary: tasyeti || rājāno yakṣāḥ || "rājā prabhau nṛpe candre yakṣe kṣatriyaśakrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || rājñāṃ rājā rājarājaḥ kuberaḥ || "rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ" ity amaraḥ | "rājāhaḥ sakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭacpratyayaḥ || tasyānucaro yakṣaḥ | antarbāṣpo dhīrodāttatvād antaḥ stambhitāśruḥ san | kautukādhānahetor abhilāṣotpādakāraṇasya || "kautukaṃ cābhilāṣesyād utsave narmaharṣayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || tasya meghasya puro 'gre katham api | garīyasā prayatnenety arthaḥ || "jñānahetuvivakṣāyām apy ādi katham avyayam | katham ādi tathāpy antaṃ yatnagauravabāḍhayoḥ" ity ujjvalaḥ || sthitvā ciraṃ dadhyau cintayām āsa || "dhyai cintāyām" iti dhātor liṭ || manovikāropaśamanaparyantam iti śeṣaḥ || vikārahetum āha meghāloka iti || meghāloke meghadarśane sati sukhino 'pi priyādijanasaṅgatasyāpi cetaś cittam anyathābhūtā vṛttir vyāpāro yasya tadanyathāvṛtti bhavati | vikṛtim āpadyata ity arthaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini kaṇṭhāliṅganārthini jane | dūre saṃsthā sthitir yasya tasmin dūrasaṃsthe sati kiṃ punaḥ | virahiṇaḥ kim uta vaktavyam ity arthaḥ | virahiṇāṃ meghasandarśanam uddīpanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ || arthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ daṇḍinā - "jñeyaḥ so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiñcana | tatsādhanasamarthasya nyāso yo 'nyasya vastunaḥ" iti ||

root:
ānandāḥ pratimudraṃ syur mahāmudrāṃ vinā punaḥ |
āgamāc ca svasaṃvitteḥ sadguror upadeśataḥ || SeNi 27 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ punar evam ity uktam evārthaṃ spaṣṭayann āha.

taskarāś caurāḥ, teṣāṃ saṃghāto avatāragaveṣakaḥ piśācavad avatāramārgaprekṣī, chidrānveṣaṇatatpara ityarthaḥ. prāpyāvatāraṃ praveśamārgam āsādya muṣṇāti. tato hanti śobhanagataye jīvitapratilambhaṃ kuśalapātheyābhāvāt.

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudraiva dharmamudrā vipākajā |
vilakṣaṇaṃ mahāmudrā vimardaḥ samayo bhavet || SeNi 38 ||
commentary:
anantaroktam evaikaikamudrāyā ekaikānandatvaṃ sphuṭayati—vicitram ityādi | gatārtham ||

nanu caturmudrānvayānugato 'yaṃ granthaḥ | sa ca yoginītantrānusāreṇa na yogatantrānusāreṇeti cet | tan na | ucyate—

	āryanāgārjunair uktaṃ śrīsamājānusārataḥ |
	pañcabhiś ca kramair yat tac caturmudrāsu kathyate || (1)

	kramayor mantramūrtitvacinnidhyaptī yathākramam |
	te caikamudrayokte 'tra mantramūrtimanaḥsthiteḥ || (3)

	dharmamudrāsukhaṃ yasmāt saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya bhūtakoṭitvaṃ mahāmudrārtha ucyate || (3)

	phalaṃ samayamudrāyā dvayor advayavedanam |
	kramāṇāṃ mīlanaṃ divyaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam || (4) 

tathā ca pradīpoddyotanaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyāyām ācāryacandrakīrtipādair uktam—

	utpattikrama ādau syān mantramūrtiprasādhakaḥ |
	cittanidhyaptimātraṃ tu dvitīyaḥ krama ucyate ||

	tṛtīyas tu kramo ramyaḥ saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya saṃvṛteḥ śuddhiś caturthaḥ krama ucyate ||

	pañcamo yuganaddhākhyo yat satyadvayayojanam | 
	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

root:
kulānāṃ pañcabhūtānāṃ pañcaskandhasvarūpiṇām |  
kulyate gaṇyate 'neneti kulam ity abhidhīyate || 10 ||
commentary: evaṃ pañcakulāny adhikṛty āha—kulānām ityādi. pañceti pañcakam. svakāye bhūtānāṃ yat pañcakam tat kulānāṃ draṣṭavyam, pañcasu bhūteṣv ayaṃ kulādhimokṣāt. pañcaskandhasvarūpiṇām iti ātmanaḥ skandhapañcake 'pi kulapañcakādhimokṣāt. kulyata ity asaṃkhyāto buddhabodhisattvānāṃ rāśir ekaikena gotreṇa kulyate saṃkhyāyate. tasmāt pañcakulānīty arthaḥ.

root:
dṛśyase purato gatāgatameva me vidadhāsi |
kiṃ pureva sasaṃbhramaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ na dadāsi ||
commentary:
śrīvajramaṇḍālaṃkāratantre dvādaśatathāgatabhūmayaḥ paṭhyante ||

	samantaprabhā mahābhūmiḥ sūryamaṇḍalavac ca sā |
	amṛtaprabhā dvitīyā tu candravat suprabhāsvarā ||
	gaganaprabhā tṛtīyā tu gaganabhūmipratiṣṭhitā |
	vajraprabhā tu yā bhūmiś caturthī sā manoramā ||
	dṛḍhādhyāśayayogena vajreti parikalpyate |
	pañcamī ratnaprabhā nāma abhiṣeke pratiṣṭhitā ||
	ṣaṣṭhī padmaprabhā nāma padmavat suvirājate |
	svabhāvaśuddhadharmatvāt nirmalā niṣparigrahā ||
	saptamī karmaprabhā nāma buddhakarmakarī smṛtā |
	aṣṭamy anupamā nāma upamā tatra na vidyate ||
	navamī nirupamā nāma sarvopamāprativedhataḥ |
	daśamī prajñāprabhā nāma buddhabhūmīr anuttarā ||
	ekādaśī sarvajñatā mahābhūmiḥ prabhāsvarā |
	dvādaśī pratyātmavedyā tu yogijñānaprapūrikā || iti ||

etā dvādaśatathāgatbhūmayo 'kārādidvādaśasvaraiḥ pariniṣpannā veditavyāḥ ||
buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām ity atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānām | hṛdi sthito 'ham iti sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | jñānamūrtir iti jñānakāyasvabhāvatvāt | buddha iti yathāvasthitapadārthāvabodhāt ||

root:
sākṣādbhavanmaye nātha sarvasmin bhuvanāntare |
kiṃ na bhaktimatāṃ kṣetraṃ mantraḥ kvaiṣāṃ na siddhyati || 1.4 ||
commentary: bhaktimatāṃ vyākhyātarūpabhaktiśālināṃ sarvatra bhuvanaviṣaye kiṃ na kṣetraṃ parasiddhisamudayasthānam, kva ca eṣāṃ mananatrāṇadharmo mantro na siddhyati | yataḥ sākṣāditi samāveśadṛṣṭyā na kathāmātreṇa bhavanmayameva sarvaṃ bhuvanameṣām |

iyaṃ te dhāraṇī ramyā sevyā buddhaiḥ prakāśitā |
atikrāmati yo mūḍhaḥ siddhis tasya na cottamā || 3.23 ||
commentary: dhāriṇīti paramasukhadhāraṇāt | prakāśitety ajñātā | atikrāmatīti bhagavato ’nujñānaṃ laṃghayati | siddhir iti mahāsukhasiddhiḥ | uttameti samyak saṃbodhirūpatvāt ||

root:
pratipakṣe sthito naiva tattvāsakto 'pi naiva yaḥ |
gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasya mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati || SeNi 36 ||
commentary:
tasmāc cittam evātra kāraṇaṃ nānyad ity ata āha.

pāpakarmopaskṛtaṃ cittam eva, teṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān kathitavān. nāparaṃ kiṃcit. yata evam, tasmān na trijagati pāpacittād aparaḥ kaścid bhayahetur asti. tasmāc cittam eva vaśīkartavyam | yad uktam āryaratnameghe—

	cittapūrvagamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. citte parijñāte sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti ||

api ca—

	cittena nīyate lokaś cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati |
	cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham ||

	cittaṃ bhramate 'lātavat. cittaṃ vibhramate taraṅgavat. cittaṃ dahate davāgnivat. cittaṃ rohayate mahāmbuvat.

iti ca.

evaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sūpasthitasmṛtir viharati, na ca cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati. api tu cittam evāsya vaśaṃ gacchati. cittenāsya vaśībhūtena sarve dharmā vaśībhavantīti.

pralayapayodhijale dhṛtavānasi vedaṃ
vihitavahitracaritramakhedam |
keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: he keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra | dhṛtaṃ mīnasya śarīraṃ yena sa tathā | tasya saṃbodhanam | he dhṛtamīnaśarīra | akhedaṃ yathā syāttathā tvaṃ vedaṃ dhṛtavānasi | kasmin | pralayapayodhijale | pralaye saṃvartakāle payodhirarṇavastasya jalaṃ tasmin | mahāpralayakāle parameśvaro vedaṃ svīkṛtya brahmāṇamutpādya tasmai prayacchati | yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrva yo 'sau vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai | iti śrutiḥ | kiṃbhūtaṃ vedam | vihitavahitracaritram | vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ vahitrasyapotasya caritraṃ ācaritaṃ yena sa tathā | vahitraṃ sāgaratārakaṃ bhavati | vedo 'pi nityanaimittikakarmapratipādanadvāreṇa saṃsārasāgaratārako bhavatītyarthaḥ | jaganti īṣṭe niyamayatīti jagadīśaḥ | tasya saṃbodhanaṃ he jagadīśa | he hare smṛtaḥ san harati saṃsārakleśamiti hariḥ tasya saṃbodhanaṃ | he hare | tvaṃ jaya | svamāyayā śatrusaṃharaṇadvāreṇa svabhaktaparipālanena sarvotkṛṣṭo bhava |

commentary: evam ityādi | evam anena prakāreṇa bhagavān guhyendro vajrapāṇis tathāgatam adhyeṣya | tatra guhyā yakṣā aḍakavatīnivāsinas teṣām indro rājā | ata eva guhyendra ity ucyate || kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā prahvakāyaḥ praṇatakāyo 'grataḥ sthita iti || saṃskārapūrvikā prārthanā adhyeṣaṇā | saṃskāro 'tra praṇāmādi ||

śāstrādau tena vaktavyaḥ sambandhaḥ saprayojanaḥ || 1.17 ||
commentary:
aparam api niṣphalavarjanāya prātimokṣoddiṣṭam ācaret ity āha.

commentary: asau sakhī rādhāṃ prati punarāha abravīt | kiṃ kurvatī satī | ārāt samīpe samakṣaṃ sakhīnāmagre pratyakṣaṃ yathā syāttathā murāriṃ śrīkṛṣṇam upadarśayantī | kiṃbhūtam | anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramam anekāśca tāḥ nāryaśca tāsāṃ parirambhaḥ āśleṣaḥ tatra saṃbhramo yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | sphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam mano hartuṃ śīlamasya sa tathā | vilāso hāsaḥ tatra lālasaḥ kāmo yasya sa tathā sphuraṃścāsau manohārī vilāsalālasaśca tam anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |

bhagavan jñānakāyasya mahoṣṇīṣasya gīṣpateḥ |
mañjuśrījñānasattvasya jñānamūrteḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 10 ||
commentary:
atha bhagavan jñānakāyasyetyādi || he bhagavn mañjuśrījñānasattvasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti vakṣyamāṇena kriyāpadena saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃviśiṣṭasya jñānakāyasyeti | jñānam eva kāyo jñānakāyas tasya jñānakāyasyety ādarśajñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣasyeti | mahān uṣṇīṣo 'syeti mahoṣṇīṣas tasya mahoṣṇīṣasyeti samatājñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣatvaṃ sarvatathāgatabhiṣekātmakatvāt || giṣpater iti | girāṃ śabdānāṃ patiḥ svāmī gīṣpatis tasya gīṣpateḥ pratyavekṣaṇājñānadvāreṇa || jñānamūrter iti | jñānam eva mūrtir jñānamūrtis tasya jñānamūrter iti kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānadvāreṇa || svayaṃbhuva iti svayaṃ bhavatīti svayaṃbhūr bhāvanābalād bhavatīty arthaḥ | tathā coktaṃ śrīparamādye |

	samantabhadrajñānasya svayam evāvabhotsyate |

iti || atas tasya svayaṃbhuva iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānadvāreṇa || kim uktaṃ bhavati | pañcajñānātmako bhagavān mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | mañjuḥ komalā śrīr yasyāsau mañjuśrīḥ | jñānasattva iti | sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | mañjuśrīś cāsau jñānasattvaś ceti mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | nāyaṃ daśabhūmīśvaro bodhisattvaḥ kiṃ tarhy advayajñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā saiva mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ || ata evāha dignāgapādaḥ |

	prajñāpāramitā jñānam advayaṃ sā tathāgataḥ ||

iti || tasya mañjuśrījñānasattvasya pañcajñānātmakasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti ||

root:
pratipakṣe sthito naiva tattvāsakto 'pi naiva yaḥ |
gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasya mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati || SeNi 36 ||
commentary:
ajātajñānabodhena mahāmudrā yathā labhyate tad darśayati—pratipakṣa ityādi | pratipakṣa iti svabhāvaguṇasāranirūpaṇatayā dānaśīlakṣamāvīryadhyānaprajñātmakapratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅge 'manasikāreṇa varjanāt sthito naiva yaḥ | pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇyā sāsravarūpādipañcopādānaskandhādyātmakavipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇir api draṣṭavyā | tadabhāva etadabhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvāt | tattvāsakto 'pīti svabhāvādinirūpaṇatayā śūnyatātathatādyātmakatattvanirūpaṇavikalpe 'py āsaktaḥ saṃsakto naiva yaḥ | gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasyeti prathamabhūmyādisarvākārajñatāntaprāptinirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgarūpaṃ phale gārddhyaṃ kāṅkṣā yasya nāsti | mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati labhate | etenāpratiṣṭhānānāroparūpajagadātmatayā vipakṣapratipakṣatattvaphalāsaṅgavigamena sarvāsaṅgavinirmuktāṃ mahāmudrām ācaṣṭe |

tarhi mahāmudrāyāṃ dānapāramitādīnāṃ kim abhāva eva | na | tasyā eva sarvapāramitādyātmakapuṇyajñānasambhāradvayarūpatvāt | tad uktaṃ viśeṣacintibrahmaparipṛcchāmahāyānasūtre—

	yaḥ sarvakleśaparityāgaḥ idaṃ dānaṃ | yo 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ idaṃ śīlaṃ | yālakṣaṇatā iyaṃ kṣāntiḥ | yo vivekaḥ idaṃ vīryam | yad apratiṣṭhānam idaṃ dhyānam | yāprapañcatā iyaṃ prajñā |

etenāpratiṣṭhānāprapañcarūpaiva prajñāpāramiteti sthitam | tad uktaṃ saptaśatikāyām—

	bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi tadā kutra pratiṣṭhāya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi | mañjuśrīr āha—yasminn ahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | apratiṣṭhito 'haṃ tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | bhagavān āha—apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā | mañjuśrir āha—saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yan na kvacit pratiṣṭhānam | bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi katarat te kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaya upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | mañjuśrīr āha—na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiñcit kuśalamūlam upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | nāsau bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyacid dharmasyopacayo vāpacayo vā | na sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā yā kasyacid dharmasyopacayāya vāpacayāya vā pratyupasthitā | sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti nāpi buddhadharmān upādatte |

ityādi ||

root:
tāni sparśasukhāni te ca taralāḥ snigdhā dṛśorvibhramāstadvaktrāmbujasaurabhaṃ sa ca sudhāsyandī girāṃ vakrimā |
sa bimbādharamādhurīti viṣayāsaṅge 'pi cenmānasaṃ tasyāṃ lagnasamādhi hanta virahavyādhiḥ kathaṃ vardhate ||
commentary: yadi rādhikāyāṃ mānasaṃ manaḥ lagnasamādhi viṣayāsaṅge satyapi | hanteti harṣaviṣādayoḥ tarhi virahasya vyādhiḥ pīḍā | kathaṃ viṣayāsaṅgaḥ | iti anena prakāreṇa | adhunāpi | dṛśornetrayorvibhramāḥ vilāsāḥ svayameva tajjātīyā eva | kimbhūtāḥ | taralāḥ snigdhāḥ taralāśca te snigdhāśceti | yadatra svabhāvasaṃpratyayaḥ | vaktrāmbujasaurabhaṃ saugandhyaṃ yena sa ca | athāpi | girāṃ vācāṃ vakrimā vakrabhāvaḥ sa eva vartate | sudhāsyandī sudhāṃ syandituṃ śīlamasyeti sa tathā | yāsvāditā sapadi bimbādharamādhurī saiva tajjājīyaivāsvādyate | madhurasya bhāvaḥ mādhuryam | bimbādharasya mādhurī sā iti viśeṣā jñeyā |

root:
kuto vā gṛhṇate doṣaṃ sūrayo madvidhoktiṣu | 
neṣyate yaḥ parastho 'pi sa svayaṃ gṛhyate katham || 1.5 ||
commentary: he rādhe kṣamyatām | aparam īdṛśam aparādhaṃ tava kadāpi kasmin kāle 'pi na karomi | ato he sundari rādhe | ātmadarśanaṃ dehi | kasya | mama | kimiti | yato 'haṃ manmathena kandarpeṇa dunomi tāpamanubhavāmi |

root:
yathā kathañ cid ārabdhā trayīmārgānusāriṇī | 
vāgvṛttiralpasārāpi śraddadhānasya śobhate || 1.8 ||
commentary: kiñcāstu tāvad asmādṛśānāṃ kavipravīrāṇām āgamānusāriṇyo vācaḥ śobhanta iti | anyasyāpi śraddadhānasya trayīmārgānusāriṇī yathākathañcidārabdhā kliṣṭā alpasārāpi vāgvṛttiḥ śobhate | asmākaṃ tu bahusārā akleśanirmitā śobhatetarām ity āha yatheti ||

root:
mahārūpo mahākāyo mahāvarṇo mahāvapuḥ |
mahānāmā mahodāro mahāvipulamaṇḍalaḥ || 33 ||
commentary: tathā kācidaṅganā amuṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ kareṇa dukūle vicakarṣa ākṛṣṭavatī | kasmin sthāne | yamunājalakūle | yamunāyāḥ jalakūlaṃ tīraṃ tasmin | kena nimittena | kelikalākutukena | kelau kāmakrīḍāyāṃ kalāstāsu kutukaṃ vinodastena | kimbhūtam | mañjulavañjulakuñjagatam | mañjulaḥ sundaro yo vañjulaḥ tasya kuñje sthitam |

root:
autpattikagirā doṣaḥ kāraṇasya nivāryate |
abādhā 'vyatirekeṇa svatastena pramāṇatā || 10 ||
commentary:
padārthas tv adhunā vyākhyāyate || atheti vajradharam adhikṛtyāha tasyādhyeṣakatvena prastutatvāt | āryamāyājālaṣoḍaśasāhasrikamahāyogatantrāntaḥpātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavacchākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītir yā tasyā adhyeṣaṇārthaṃ bhagavān vajradharo mṛdvindriyasattvānugrahārthaṃ | punar apy athety āha | athaśabda ānantarye | atha vajradharo bhṛkuṭītaraṅgapramukhaiḥ sārdham nāthaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā agrataḥ sthita idam āheti saṃbandhaḥ || vajraṃ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ | anena padena gāmbhīryam abhidhīyate | śriyo devatyas tā vidyante yasyāsau śrīmān | anena caudāryaṃ sūcitaṃ | tataś ca kim uktaṃ bhavati | prajñopāyātmako bhagavān vajradhara iti | ata evoktaṃ śrīsaṃvare |

	sarvākāśāvakāśe śrīvajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |

iti | duḥkhena dāmyanta iti durdāntā īśvarādayas teṣāṃ damakaḥ śāsako vajradharavineyakatvāt teṣām īśvarādīnām | utkṛṣṭatvāṭ paro vajradharaḥ | bhūrlokabhuvarlokasvarlokā iti trayo lokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī || atha vā jayakaramadhukarasarvārthasiddhikarās trayo bhrātaras trilokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī | ata eva vīro bhagavān vajradharaḥ arair anabhibhavanīyatvāt || śrītattvasaṃgrahe pañca guhyāni paṭhyante | tathā hi |

	yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ yānti sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
	tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	mārayan sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhakāyaprayogataḥ |
	haraṃs tu paravittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	rāgatulyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti taj jinebhyaḥ samādadat |
	sattvārthāt paradārāṇi sevayan puṇyam āpnuyāt ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	sarvakarmāṇi kurvaṃs tu bahu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ||

iti ||

teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ guhyānāṃ rājā guhyarāṭ | guhyair vā rājata iti guhyarāṭ || kuliśo vajras tasyeśvaraḥ kuliśeśvaraḥ || bhagavān vajradharo 'grataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭa idaṃ vakṣyamānam āheti kriyāpadaṃ sarvatra yojanīyam ||

root:
sa mahāvyādhibhir grasto viṣṭhāmūtramalīkṛtaḥ |
ṣaṇmāsābhyantare tasya mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati || 1.12 ||
commentary: adhyeṣaṇānantaraṃ prativacanam āha | atha śākyamunir ityādi | śākyakulānāṃ muniḥ kāyavākcittamaunayogān muniḥ | bhagavān saṃbuddha iti gatārthaḥ | dvipadottama iti dvipadā devamanuṣyāḥ | teṣām uttamaḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ | svajihvāṃ nirṇamayyopasaṃhṛtya svamukhād iti svamukha āyatām iti dīrghāṃ sphītām iti bahalatarāṃ śubhām iti dakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhanibhāṃ | sarvadharmālayāṃ ca ||

root:
sarva eva bhavallābhaheturbhaktimatāṃ vibho |
saṃvinmārgo 'yamāhlādaduḥkhamohaistridhā sthitaḥ || 1.10 ||
commentary: nanu sannikṛṣṭārthagocaram eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam | ataḥ prasiddheḥ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthatvaṃ guṇaḥ na doṣāya ata āha na ceti | na ca pratyakṣādīni parityajya loko nāma pramāṇagaṇe pramāṇam upasaṃkhyāyate | varṇavivekasambandhāvadhāraṇayos tu pratyakṣādipramāṇatvaṃ vanasambandhaparihārayor abhidhāsyāma iti | api ca bhaved api prasiddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vyavasthitaiva prasiddhiḥ syāt | sā tv avyavasthitā | tathā hi saṃsāramocakā nāma nāstikā bāhyahiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ | anye tu tapaḥ prajāpatyādi pīḍātmakatvāt parapīḍāvat adharma ....... stu vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakau tadviparītau dharmādharmau saṅgirante | tad evaṃ mlecchāryāṇāṃ parasparavigānān na lokaprasiddhatvaṃ dharmādharmayor upapadyata ity āha saṃsāreti sārdhena ||

root:
bolagarbhe ca sākāraṃ nirākāraṃ tadagrataḥ |
madhyamāṃ varṇayanty eke neti no gurudarśanam || SeNi 21 ||
commentary:
samprati yācanāprakāram āha—jātam iti || he megha tvāṃ bhuvaneṣu vidite bhuvanavidite || "niṣṭhā" iti bhūtārthe ktaḥ | "matibuddhi-" ityādinā vartamānārthatve 'pi "ktasya ca vartamāne" iti bhuvanaśabdasya ṣaṣṭhyantatāniyamāt samāso na syāt | "tena ca pūjāyām" iti niṣedhāt || puṣkarāś cāvartakāś ca kecin meghānāṃ śreṣṭhās teṣāṃ vaṃśe jātam | mahākulaprasūtam ity arthaḥ | kāmarūpam icchādhīnavigraham | durgādisañcārakṣamam ity arthaḥ | maghona indrasya prakṛtipuruṣaṃ pradhānapuruṣaṃ jānāmi | tena mahākulaprasūtatvādiguṇayogitvena hetunā vidhivaśād daivāyattatvāt || "vidhir vidhāne daive ca" ity amaraḥ || vaśam āyatte || "vaśam icchāprabhutvayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dūre bandhur yasya sa dūrabandhur viyuktabhāryo 'haṃ tvayy arthitvaṃ gataḥ ||
nanu yācakasya yācñāyāṃ yācyaguṇotkarṣaḥ kutropayujyata ity āśaṅkya daivād yācñābhaṅge 'pi lāghavadoṣābhāva evopayoga ity āha-yācñeti | tathā hi | adhiguṇe 'dhikaguṇe puṃsi viṣaye yācñā moghā niṣphalāpi varam īṣatpriyam | dātur guṇāḍhyatvāt priyatvaṃ yācñāvaiphalyādīṣatpriyatvam iti bhāvaḥ || adhame nirguṇe yācñā labdhakāmāpi saphalāpi na varam | īṣatpriyam api na bhavatīty arthaḥ || "daivād vṛte varaḥ śreṣṭhe triṣu klībaṃ manāk priye" ity amaraḥ || arthāntaranyāsānuprāṇitaḥ preyo 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ daṇḍinā-"preyaḥ priyatarākhyānam" iti || etad ādye pādatraye caturthapādasthenārthāntaranyāsenopajīvitam iti suvyaktam etat ||

root:
vyādhyākulo naro yadvan na kṣamaḥ sarvakarmasu |
tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu || 5.24 ||
commentary:
sa hi śayyāṃ parikalpayannevaṃ parikalpayedityupadarśayannāha-

bhagavato mahānirvāṇaśayyām iva śayyāṃ parikalpayet. abhimatayā diśā śiro vidhāya, dakṣiṇena pārśvena, pādasyopari pādam ādhāya, dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum upadhānaṃ kṛtvā, vāmaṃ ca prasārya jaṅghopari niveśya, cīvaraiḥ susaṃvṛtakāyaḥ, smṛtaḥ, saṃprajānānaḥ, utthānasaṃjñī, ālokasaṃjñī, śayitaḥ, nācittakamiddhāvaṣṭabdhaḥ. na ca nidrāsukham ākhādayet, na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti. laghutthānaḥ śīghram evottiṣṭhet. na tu jṛmbhikāṃ gātramoṭanaṃ kurvann ālasyopahitaś cireṇa. etebhya eva sarvebhyaḥ pūrvam eva.

root:
stanavinihitamapi hāramudāram |
sa manute kṛśatanuratibhāram || 
rādhikā virahe tava keśava ||
commentary: he keśava | sā rādhikā tava virahe viśleṣe kṛśatanurdurbalā | stane vinihitaṃ kucamaṇḍale āropitaṃ tam udāraṃ sundaraṃ hāraṃ muktālaṅkāraṃ bhāramiva manute | kalayati jānāti | kṛśā tanuryasyāḥ sā tathā | stanayorvinihito nyastastam |

gaganasamaśarīraṃ lakṣaṇair bhūṣitāṅgaṃ
nirupamasukhapūrṇaṃ svābhayā saṃgataṃ ca |
sphuradamitamunīndraiḥ sarvasattvārthakāri
pravadati punar anyaḥ sādhyam ucchedaśūnyam || 11 ||
commentary: athetyādi | maṇḍalavyatirekeṇābhiṣekasyāsadbhāvāt tantraśravaṇādhikāro na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ | pañcamānam ity ekasyāpi pañcaprakāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tu pañcānāṃ yathā kramaṃ ||

root:
dantakāṣṭhasya kheṭasya visarjanam apāvṛtam |
neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeś cāpi garhitam || 5.91 ||
commentary: sādhu vajradharetyādi | te tava vajrapāṇeḥ sādhu | śrīmān he vajradhara yat yasmāt tvaṃ mañjuśrījñānakāyasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ mattaḥ śrotuṃ samudyatas tat tasmāt he guhyakādhipa te tava sādhu deśayāmīti saṃbandhaḥ || kimarthaṃ tvayāhaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ | jagaddhitārthāyeti | jagadanugrahāya mahākaruṇayānvitaḥ san ||

root:
jaladapaṭalavaladinduvinindakacandanatilakalalāṭam |
pīnapayodharaparisaramardananirdayahṛdayakapāṭam ||
commentary: athetyādi | gāḍheneti sātiśayapīḍanena | devi devīti | sattvārthaṃ pratyekābhiprāyeṇātimahāpremnā dviruktiḥ | ramyaṃ kamanīyatvāt | rahasyaṃ gopanīyatvāt śrāvakādidharmapravṛtteṣu | sāraṃ pāramitāmahāyānoktaṃ tattvaṃ tasmād api sārataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ | sarvabuddhair iti vajrasattvanirmitair dīpaṃkarādibhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ ||

root:
sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhaṇamukulitapulakitacūte |
vṛndāvanavipine parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte ||
commentary:
atha bhagavan jñānakāyasyetyādi || he bhagavn mañjuśrījñānasattvasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti vakṣyamāṇena kriyāpadena saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃviśiṣṭasya jñānakāyasyeti | jñānam eva kāyo jñānakāyas tasya jñānakāyasyety ādarśajñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣasyeti | mahān uṣṇīṣo 'syeti mahoṣṇīṣas tasya mahoṣṇīṣasyeti samatājñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣatvaṃ sarvatathāgatabhiṣekātmakatvāt || giṣpater iti | girāṃ śabdānāṃ patiḥ svāmī gīṣpatis tasya gīṣpateḥ pratyavekṣaṇājñānadvāreṇa || jñānamūrter iti | jñānam eva mūrtir jñānamūrtis tasya jñānamūrter iti kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānadvāreṇa || svayaṃbhuva iti svayaṃ bhavatīti svayaṃbhūr bhāvanābalād bhavatīty arthaḥ | tathā coktaṃ śrīparamādye |

	samantabhadrajñānasya svayam evāvabhotsyate |

iti || atas tasya svayaṃbhuva iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānadvāreṇa || kim uktaṃ bhavati | pañcajñānātmako bhagavān mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | mañjuḥ komalā śrīr yasyāsau mañjuśrīḥ | jñānasattva iti | sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | mañjuśrīś cāsau jñānasattvaś ceti mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | nāyaṃ daśabhūmīśvaro bodhisattvaḥ kiṃ tarhy advayajñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā saiva mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ || ata evāha dignāgapādaḥ |

	prajñāpāramitā jñānam advayaṃ sā tathāgataḥ ||

iti || tasya mañjuśrījñānasattvasya pañcajñānātmakasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti ||

root:
rātriṃ divaṃ ca triskandhaṃ trikālaṃ ca pravartayet |
śeṣāpattiśamas tena bodhicittajināśrayāt || 5.98 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:
yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā |
tāsv avasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ || 5.99 ||
commentary: punar aniyamena darśayann āha. svayam ātmanā parāyatto vā sattvārthakriyāyāṃ pravṛttaḥ.

root:
asaṃprajanyacittasya śrutacintitabhāvitam |
sacchidrakumbhajalavan na smṛtāv avatiṣṭhate || 5.25 ||
commentary: anenaiva jagadekarūpatām āha—yad yad ityādi | sugamam ||

root:
cittaṃ rakṣitukāmānāṃ mayaiṣa kriyate 'ñjaliḥ |
smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca sarvayatnena rakṣata || 5.23 ||
commentary: prakṣiptam api vyākhyāyate—ambha iti || ambhobindūnāṃ varṣodabindūnāṃ grahaṇe | "sarvaṃ sahāpatitam ambu na cātakasya hitam" iti śāstrād bhūspṛṣṭodakasya teṣāṃ rogahetutvād antarāla eva svīkāre caturāṃś cātakān vīkṣyamāṇāḥ kautukāt paśyantaḥ śreṇībhūtā baddhapaṅktiḥ || abhūtatadbhāve cviḥ || balākā bakapaṅktīḥ parigaṇanayaikā dve tisra iti saṅkhyānena nirdiśanto hastena darśayantaḥ siddhāḥ stanitasamaye tvaṅgarjitakāle sotkampāny utkampapūrvakāṇi priyasahacarīṇāṃ saṃbhrameṇāliṅgitāny āsādya | svayaṃ grahaṇāśleṣasukham anubhūyety arthaḥ || tvāṃ mānāyaṣyanti | tvannimittatvāt sukhalābhasyeti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
atha vadasi tadā | tasya śiṣyasya hṛdaye khaḍgam arpayitvedaṃ paṭhet |
atitīkṣṇo hy ayaṃ khaḍgaś caṇḍaroṣakare sthitaḥ |
bhedayet samayaṃ yas tu tasya chedanatatparaḥ || 3.19 ||
commentary: nanu mīmāṃsāyām api cirantananibandhanāni santīti kiṃ mudhā prayasyate | ata āha prāyeṇeti | lokāyataṃ nāma nāstikānāṃ tantram | tadbhāvamāpāditā nānāpasiddhāntasaṅgraheṇa | tāmāstikapathe kartum ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛta iti | āśaṃsāyāṃ vartamāne 'rthe vā kto varṇanīya iti ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre ’bhiṣekapaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || 3.31 ||
commentary:
abhiṣekapradhānaḥ paṭalaḥ || 
iti tṛtīyapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
upadeśo hi bhavati jñānaṃ tasyeti yojyate |
jñāyate yena tajjñānamekādhikaraṇatvataḥ || 9 ||
commentary: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa aupattikas tu śabdasyārthena sambandhas tasyāgnihotrādilakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittam ity uktvā katham iti praśnānantaram upadeśo hi bhavatīti sautram upadeśapadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tatra na jñāyate kenāsya sambandha iti yogyapadānvayaṃ darśayati upadeśa iti | tasya dharmasyopadeśo jñānaṃ pramāṇam iti | nanūpadeśo granthasandarbhātmā jñānaṃ cārthāvagrahaḥ | katham anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ata āha jñāyata iti | bhāvasādhano hi jñānaśabdo nopadeśaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ labhate | ayaṃ tu jñāyate 'neneti karaṇasādhana iti yuktaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti ||
